[22] etāhi tīhi vijjāhi, tevijjo hoti brāhmaṇo..
[22] dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jitvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ..
[21] ``kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. (apa0 therī 2.3.244-313).

[03] arahattaṃ ^a^V0.0082^ea^ pana patvā pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ahosi. tattha sātisayaṃ katādhikārattā aparabhāge taṃ satthā jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sā ekadivasaṃ mahākassapattherassa guṇābhitthavanapubbakaṃ attano katakiccatādivibhāvanamukhena udānaṃ udānentī --
[22] etāhi tīhi vijjāhi, tevijjo hoti brāhmaṇo..
[22] dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ..

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ^b^putto buddhassa dāyādo^eb^ti buddhānubuddhabhāvato sammāsambuddhassa anujātasuto tato eva tassa dāyabhūtassa navalokuttaradhammassa ādānena dāyādo kassapo lokiyalokuttarehi samādhīhi suṭṭhu samāhitacittatāya ^b^susamāhito. pubbenivāsaṃ yovedī^eb^ti yo mahākassapatthero pubbenivāsaṃ attano paresañca nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pākaṭaṃ katvā avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. ^b^saggāpāyañca passatī^eb^ti chabbīsatidevalokabhedaṃ saggaṃ catubbidhaṃ apāyañca dibbacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passati.

[03] ^b^atho jātikkhayaṃ patto^eb^ti tato paraṃ jātikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ patto. ^b^abhiññāya^eb^ abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena abhiññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānitvā pariññeyyaṃ parijānitvā ^a^P0.0075^ea^, pahātabbaṃ pahāya ^a^V0.0083^ea^, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatvā ^b^vosito^eb^ niṭṭhaṃ patto katakicco. āsavakkhayapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ monaṃ pattattā ^b^muni^eb^.

[03] ^b^tatheva bhaddākāpilānī^eb^ti yathā mahākassapo etāhi yathāvuttāhi tīhi vijjāhi tevijjo maccuhāyī ca, tatheva bhaddākāpilānī tevijjā maccuhāyinīti. tato eva ^b^dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhana^eb^nti attānameva paraṃ viya katvā dasseti.

[03] idāni yathā therassa paṭipatti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā, evaṃ mamapīti dassentī ^b^``disvā ādīnava''^eb^nti osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^tyamha khīṇāsavā dantā^eb^ti te mayaṃ mahākassapatthero ahañca uttamena damena dantā sabbaso khīṇāsavā ca amha. ^b^sītibhūtāmha nibbutā^eb^ti tato eva kilesapariḷāhābhāvato sītibhūtā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbutā ca amha bhavāmāti attho.

[03] pañcakanipāte ^a^M0.0078^ea^ ^a^V0.0084^ea^ ^b^paṇṇavīsati vassānī^eb^tiādikā aññatarāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devadahanagare mahāpajāpatigotamiyā dhātī hutvā vaḍḍhesi. nāmagottato pana apaññātā ahosi. sā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā pabbajitakāle sayampi pabbajitvā pañcavīsati saṃvaccharāni kāmarāgena upaddutā accharāsaṅghātamattampi kālaṃ cittekaggataṃ alabhantī bāhā paggayha kandamānā dhammadinnātheriyā santike dhammaṃ sutvā kāmehi vinivattitamānasā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanamanuyañjantī na cirasseva chaḷabhiññā hutvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] bāhā paggayha kandantī, vihāraṃ pāvisiṃ ahaṃ..
[21] ``sā bhikkhuniṃ upāgacchiṃ, yā me saddhāyikā ahu.
[27] iddhīpi me sacchikatā, patto me āsavakkhayo.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0079^ea^ ^b^nāccharāsaṅghātamattampī^eb^ti accharāghaṭitamattampi khaṇaṃ aṅguliphoṭanamattampi kālanti attho. ^b^cittassūpasamajjhaga^eb^nti cittassa upasamaṃ cittekaggaṃ na ajjhaganti yojanā, na paṭilabhinti attho.
[03] ^b^kāmarāgenavassutā^eb^ti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātesu vatthukāmesu daḷhatarābhinivesitāya bahalena chandarāgena tintacittā.
[03] ^b^cetopariccañāṇañcā^eb^ti cetopariyañāṇañca visodhitanti sambandho, adhigatanti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^mattā vaṇṇena rūpenā^eb^tiādikā vimalāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ aññatarāya rūpūpajīviniyā itthiyā dhītā hutvā nibbatti. ^b^vimalā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi. sā vayappattā tatheva jīvikaṃ kappentī ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ vesāliyaṃ ^a^P0.0077^ea^ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā hutvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā theraṃ uddissa palobhanakammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi. ``titthiyehi uyyojitā tathā akāsī''ti keci vadanti. thero tassā asubhavibhāvanamukhena santajjanaṃ katvā ovādamadāsi. taṃ heṭṭhā theragāthāya āgatameva, tathā pana therena ovāde dinne sā saṃvegajātā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhā upāsikā ^a^V0.0086^ea^ hutvā aparabhāge bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā ghaṭentī vāyamantī hetusampannatāya na cirasseva arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] akāsiṃ vividhaṃ māyaṃ, ujjhagghantī bahuṃ janaṃ..
[21] ``sabbe yogā samucchinnā, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.

[03] tattha ^b^mattā vaṇṇena rūpenā^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇena ceva rūpasampattiyā ca. ^b^sobhaggenā^eb^ti subhagabhāvena. ^b^yasenā^eb^ti parivārasampattiyā. ^b^mattā^eb^ vaṇṇamadarūpamadasobhaggamadaparivāramadavasena madaṃ āpannāti attho. ^b^yobbanena cupatthaddhā^eb^ti yobbanamadena uparūpari thaddhā yobbananimittena ahaṅkārena upatthaddhacittā anupasantamānasā. ^b^aññāsamatimaññiha^eb^nti aññā itthiyo attano vaṇṇādiguṇehi sabbathāpi atikkamitvā maññiṃ ahaṃ. aññāsaṃ vā itthīnaṃ vaṇṇādiguṇe atimaññiṃ atikkamitvā amaññiṃ avamānaṃ akāsiṃ.

[03] ^b^vibhūsitvā^eb^ ^a^P0.0078^ea^ ^b^imaṃ kāyaṃ, sucittaṃ bālalāpana^eb^nti imaṃ nānāvidhāsucibharitaṃ jegucchaṃ ahaṃ mamāti bālānaṃ lāpanato vācanato bālalāpanaṃ mama kāyaṃ chavirāgakaraṇakesaṭṭhapanādinā sucittaṃ ^a^V0.0087^ea^ vatthābharaṇehi vibhūsitvā sumaṇḍitapasāditaṃ katvā. ^b^aṭṭhāsiṃ vesidvāramhi, luddo pāsamivoḍḍiyā^eb^ti migaluddo viya migānaṃ bandhanatthāya daṇḍavākurādimigapāsaṃ, mārassa pāsabhūtaṃ yathāvuttaṃ mama kāyaṃ vesidvāramhi vesiyā gharadvāre oḍḍiyitvā aṭṭhāsiṃ.

[03] ^b^piḷandhanaṃ vidaṃsentī, guyhaṃ pakāsikaṃ bahu^eb^nti ūrujaghanathanadassanādikaṃ guyhañceva pādajāṇusirādikaṃ pakāsañcāti guyhaṃ pakāsikañca bahuṃ nānappakāraṃ piḷandhanaṃ ābharaṇaṃ dassentī. ^b^akāsiṃ vividhaṃ māyaṃ, ujjhagghantī bahuṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0081^ea^ ^b^jana^eb^nti yobbanamadamattaṃ bahuṃ bālajanaṃ vippalambhetuṃ hasantī gandhamālāvatthābharaṇādīhi sarīrasabhāvapaṭicchādanena hasavilāsabhāvādīhi tehi ca vividhaṃ nānappakāraṃ vañcanaṃ akāsiṃ.

[03] ^b^sājja piṇḍaṃ caritvāna...pe0... avitakkassa lābhinī^eb^ti sā ahaṃ evaṃ pamādavihārinī samānā ajja idāni ayyassa mahāmoggallānattherassa ovāde ṭhatvā sāsane pabbajitvā muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutā hutvā piṇḍaṃ caritvāna bhikkhāhāraṃ bhuñjitvā ^b^nisinnā^eb^ rukkhamūlamhi rukkhamūle vivittāsane nisinnā dutiyajjhānapādakassa aggaphalassa adhigamena avitakkassa lābhinī amhīti yojanā.
[03] ^b^sabbe yogā^eb^ti kāmayogādayo cattāropi yogā. ^b^samucchinnā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggādinā yathārahaṃ sammadeva ucchinnā pahīnā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ayoniso manasikārā^eb^tiādikā sīhāya theriyā gāthā ^a^P0.0079^ea^. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ sīhasenāpatino bhaginiyā dhītā hutvā nibbatti. tassā ``mātulassa nāmaṃ karomā''ti ^b^sīhā^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. sā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā sīhassa senāpatino dhamme desiyamāne taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbaji. pabbajitvā ca vipassanaṃ ārabhitvāpi bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe vidhāvantaṃ cittaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkontī satta saṃvaccharāni micchāvitakkehi bādhīyamānā cittassādaṃ alabhantī ``kiṃ me iminā pāpajīvitena ^a^V0.0088^ea^, ubbandhitvā marissāmī''ti pāsaṃ gahetvā rukkhasākhāyaṃ laggitvā taṃ attano kaṇṭhe paṭimuñcantī pubbāciṇṇavasena vipassanāya cittaṃ abhinīhari, antimabhavikatāya pāsassa bandhanaṃ gīvaṭṭhāne ahosi, ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā sā tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha ^a^M0.0082^ea^ paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. arahattaṃ pattasamakālameva ca pāsabandho gīvato muccitvā vinivatti. sā arahatte patiṭṭhitā udānavasena --
[21] ``kisā paṇḍu vivaṇṇā ca, satta vassāni cārihaṃ.
[22] nāhaṃ divā vā rattiṃ vā, sukhaṃ vindiṃ sudukkhitā..
[22] varaṃ me idha ubbandhaṃ, yañca hīnaṃ punācare..
[22] pakkhipiṃ pāsaṃ gīvāyaṃ, atha cittaṃ vimucci me''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ayoniso manasikārā^eb^ti anupāyamanasikārena, asubhe subhanti vipallāsaggāhena. ^b^kāmarāgena aṭṭitā^eb^ti kāmaguṇesu chandarāgena pīḷitā. ^b^ahosiṃ uddhatā pubbe, citte avasavattinī^eb^ti pubbe mama citte mayhaṃ vase avattamāne ^a^P0.0080^ea^ uddhatā nānārammaṇe vikkhittacittā asamāhitā ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^pariyuṭṭhitā klesehi, subhasaññānuvattinī^eb^ti pariyuṭṭhānapattehi kāmarāgādikilesehi abhibhūtā ^a^V0.0089^ea^ rūpādīsu subhanti pavattāya kāmasaññāya anuvattanasīlā. ^b^samaṃ cittassa na labhiṃ, rāgacittavasānugā^eb^ti kāmarāgasampayuttacittassa vasaṃ anugacchantī īsakampi cittassa samaṃ cetosamathaṃ cittekaggataṃ na labhiṃ.

[03] ^b^kisā paṇḍu vivaṇṇā cā^eb^ti evaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhāvena kisā dhamanisanthatagattā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā tato eva vivaṇṇā vigatachavivaṇṇā ca hutvā. ^b^satta vassānī^eb^ti satta saṃvaccharāni. ^b^cāriha^eb^nti cariṃ ahaṃ. ^b^nāhaṃ divā vā^eb^ ^a^M0.0083^ea^ ^b^rattiṃ vā, sukhaṃ vindiṃ sudukkhitā^eb^ti evamahaṃ sattasu saṃvaccharesu kilesadukkhena dukkhitā ekadāpi divā vā rattiṃ vā samaṇasukhaṃ na paṭilabhiṃ.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti kilesapariyuṭṭhānena samaṇasukhālābhabhāvato. ^b^rajjuṃ gahetvāna pāvisiṃ, vanamantara^eb^nti pāsarajjuṃ ādāya vanantaraṃ pāvisiṃ. kimatthaṃ pāvisīti ce āha -- ^b^``varaṃ me idha ubbandhaṃ, yañca hīnaṃ punācare''^eb^ti yadahaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ asakkontī hīnaṃ gihibhāvaṃ puna ācare ācareyyaṃ anutiṭṭheyyaṃ, tato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena imasmiṃ vanantare ubbandhaṃ bandhitvā maraṇaṃ me varaṃ seṭṭhanti attho. ^b^atha cittaṃ vimucci me^eb^ti yadā rukkhasākhāya bandhapāsaṃ gīvāyaṃ pakkhipi, atha tadanantarameva vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāmaggena ghaṭitattā maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbāsavehi mama cittaṃ vimucci vimuttaṃ ahosīti.

[01] ^b^āturaṃ asuci^eb^ntiādikā sundarīnandāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare ^a^P0.0081^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā, satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ jhāyinīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ upacinantī kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbatti. ^b^nandā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu. aparabhāge rūpasampattiyā sundarīnandā, janapadakalyāṇīti ca paññāyittha. sā amhākaṃ bhagavati sabbaññutaṃ patvā anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ gantvā nandakumārañca rāhulakumārañca pabbājetvā gate suddhodanamahārāje ca parinibbute mahāpajāpatigotamiyā rāhulamātāya ca pabbajitāya cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā cakkavattirajjaṃ ^a^V0.0090^ea^ pahāya pabbajitvā loke aggapuggalo buddho jāto, puttopissa rāhulakumāro pabbaji, bhattāpi me nandarājā, mātāpi ^a^M0.0084^ea^ mahāpajāpatigotamī, bhaginīpi rāhulamātā pabbajitā, idānāhaṃ gehe kiṃ karissāmi, pabbajissāmī''ti bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā ñātisinehena pabbaji, no saddhāya. tasmā pabbajitvāpi rūpaṃ nissāya uppannamadā. ``satthā rūpaṃ vivaṇṇeti garahati, anekapariyāyena rūpe ādīnavaṃ dassetī''ti buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchatītiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā abhirūpanandāya vatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ayaṃ pana viseso -- satthārā nimmitaṃ itthirūpaṃ anukkamena jarābhibhūtaṃ disvā aniccato dukkhato anattato manasikarontiyā theriyā kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ ahosi. taṃ disvā satthā tassā sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desento --
[21] ``yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ.

[03] sā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā ^a^P0.0082^ea^ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. tassā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto ``nande, imasmiṃ sarīre appamattakopi sāro natthi, maṃsalohitalepano jarādīnaṃ vāsabhūto, aṭṭhipuñjamatto evāya''nti dassetuṃ --
[22] yattha jarā ca maccu ca, māno makkho ca ohito''ti.. (dha0 pa0 150) --
[03] sā ^a^V0.0091^ea^ desanāvasāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.3.166-219) --
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[22] datvā tassa mahādānaṃ, pasannā sehi pāṇibhi..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] nandāti nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvikā..
[21] ``taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ.
[21] ``siriyā ^a^V0.0093^ea^ rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ.
[22] tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu..
[22] tasmimpi nagare ramme, ṭhapetvā taṃ yasodharaṃ..
[22] nandenapi vinā bhūtā, agāre kinnu acchasi..
[22] kātuñca vadate mātā, na cāhaṃ tattha ussukā..
[21] ``tamahaṃ ehi subhage, yenattho taṃ vadehi me.
[22] kulaṃ te nāmagottañca, vada me yadi te piyaṃ..
[21] ``tato sīsaṃ mamaṅge sā, katvā sayi sulocanā.
[22] mahādukkhe nimuggamhi, saraṇaṃ hohi me sakhī..
[22] doḷā lolāva te kaṇṇā, vevaṇṇaṃ samupāgatā..
[22] disvā saṃviggacittaṃ maṃ, imā gāthā abhāsatha..
[21] ``yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ.
[22] jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena ^b^``āturaṃ asuci''^eb^ntiādinā satthārā desitāhi tīhi gāthāhi saddhiṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^evametaṃ avekkhantī...pe0... dakkhisa^eb^nti etaṃ āturādisabhāvaṃ kāyaṃ evaṃ ``yathā idaṃ tathā eta''ntiādinā vuttappakārena ^b^rattindivaṃ^eb^ sabbakālaṃ atanditā hutvā parato ghosahetukaṃ sutamayañāṇaṃ muñcitvā, ^b^tato^eb^ taṃnimittaṃ attani sambhūtattā ^b^sakāya^eb^bhāvanāmayāya ^b^paññāya^eb^ yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena abhinibbijjha, kathaṃ nu kho ^b^dakkhisaṃ^eb^ passissanti ābhogapurecārikena pubbabhāgañāṇacakkhunā ^b^avekkhantī^eb^ vicinantīti attho.

[03] tenāha ^b^``tassā me appamattāyā''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- tassā me satiavippavāsena ^b^appamattāya yoniso^eb^ upāyena aniccādivasena vipassanāpaññāya ^b^vicinantiyā^eb^ vīmaṃsantiyā, ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto ^b^kāyo^eb^ sasantānaparasantānavibhāgato ^b^santarabāhiro^eb^ yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭho.

[03] ^b^atha^eb^ tathā dassanato pacchā ^b^nibbindahaṃ kāye^eb^ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya attabhāve nibbindiṃ, visesatova ajjhattasantāne ^b^virajji^eb^ virāgaṃ āpajjiṃ, ahaṃ yathābhūtāya appamādapaṭipattiyā ^a^V0.0097^ea^ matthakappattiyā ^b^appamattā^eb^ sabbaso saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā ^b^visaṃyuttā^eb^ upasantā ca nibbutā ca amhīti.

[03] ^b^aggiṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0087^ea^ ^b^candañcā^eb^tiādikā nanduttarāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe kammāsadhammanigame brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^a^M0.0090^ea^, ekaccāni vijjāṭṭhānāni sippāyatanāni ca uggahetvā nigaṇṭhapabbajjaṃ upagantvā, vādappasutā jambusākhaṃ gahetvā bhaddākuṇḍalakesā viya jambudīpatale vicarantī mahāmoggallānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā parājayaṃ pattā therassa ovāde ṭhatvā sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontī na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] chamāya seyyaṃ kappemi, rattiṃ bhattaṃ na bhuñjahaṃ..
[21] ``sabbe bhavā samucchinnā, icchā ca patthanāpi ca.

[03] tattha ^b^aggiṃ candañca sūriyañca, devatā ca namassiha^eb^nti aggippamukhā devāti indānaṃ devānaṃ ārādhanatthaṃ āhutiṃ paggahetvā aggiñca, māse māse sukkapakkhassa dutiyāya candañca, divase divase sāyaṃ pātaṃ sūriyañca, aññā ca bāhirā hiraññagabbhādayo devatā ca, visuddhimaggaṃ gavesantī namassihaṃ namakkāraṃ ahaṃ akāsiṃ. ^b^nadītitthāni^eb^ ^a^P0.0088^ea^ ^b^gantvāna, udakaṃ oruhāmiha^eb^nti gaṅgādīnaṃ nadīnaṃ pūjātitthāni upagantvā sāyaṃ pātaṃ udakaṃ otarāmi udake nimujjitvā aṅgasiñcanaṃ karomi.

[03] ^b^bahūvatasamādānā^eb^ti pañcātapatappanādi bahuvidhavatasamādānā. gāthāsukhatthaṃ bahūti dīghakaraṇaṃ. ^b^aḍḍhaṃ sīsassa olikhi^eb^nti mayhaṃ sīsassa aḍḍhameva ^a^M0.0091^ea^ muṇḍemi. keci ``aḍḍhaṃ sīsassa olikhinti kesakalāpassa aḍḍhaṃ jaṭābandhanavasena bandhitvā aḍḍhaṃ vissajjesi''nti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^chamāya seyyaṃ kappemī^eb^ti thaṇḍilasāyinī hutvā anantarahitāya bhūmiyā sayāmi. ^b^rattiṃ bhattaṃ na bhuñjaha^eb^nti rattūparatā hutvā rattiyaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhuñjiṃ.

[03] ^b^vibhūsāmaṇḍanaratā^eb^ti cirakālaṃ attakilamathānuyogena kilantakāyā ``evaṃ sarīrassa kilamanena natthi paññāsuddhi. sace pana indriyānaṃ tosanavasena sarīrassa tappanena suddhi siyā''ti mantvā imaṃ kāyaṃ anuggaṇhantī vibhūsāyaṃ maṇḍane ca ratā vatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkaraṇe gandhamālādīhi maṇḍane ca abhiratā. ^b^nhāpanucchādanehi cā^eb^ti sambāhanādīni kāretvā nhāpanena ucchādanena ca. ^b^upakāsiṃ imaṃ kāya^eb^nti imaṃ mama kāyaṃ anuggaṇhiṃ santappesiṃ. ^b^kāmarāgena aṭṭitā^eb^ti evaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulā hutvā ayonisomanasikārapaccayā pariyuṭṭhitena kāmarāgena aṭṭitā abhiṇhaṃ upaddutā ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^tato saddhaṃ labhitvānā^eb^ti evaṃ samādinnavatāni bhinditvā kāyadaḷhībahulā vādappasutā hutvā tattha tattha vicarantī tato pacchā aparabhāge mahāmoggallānattherassa santike laddhovādānusāsanā saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā. ^b^disvā kāyaṃ yathābhūta^eb^nti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya imaṃ mama kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ disvā anāgāmimaggena sabbaso kāmarāgo samūhato. tato paraṃ aggamaggena ^b^sabbe bhavā samucchinnā, icchā ca patthanāpi cā^eb^ti paccuppannavisayābhilāsasaṅkhātā icchā ca āyatibhavābhilāsasaṅkhātā patthanāpi sabbe bhavāpi samucchinnāti ^a^V0.0099^ea^ yojanā ^a^P0.0089^ea^. ^b^santiṃ pāpuṇi cetaso^eb^ti accantaṃ santiṃ arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃ adhigacchinti attho.

[01] ^b^saddhāya^eb^ ^a^M0.0092^ea^ ^b^pabbajitvānā^eb^tiādikā mittākāḷiyā theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe kammāsadhammanigame brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pattā mahāsatipaṭṭhānadesanāya paṭiladdhasaddhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā satta saṃvaccharāni lābhasakkāragiddhikā hutvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontī tattha tattha vicaritvā aparabhāge yoniso ummujjantī saṃvegajātā hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] kilesānaṃ vasaṃ gantvā, sāmaññatthaṃ na bujjhihaṃ..
[21] ``appakaṃ jīvitaṃ mayhaṃ, jarā byādhi ca maddati.
[22] purāyaṃ bhijjati kāyo, na me kālo pamajjituṃ..
[22] vimuttacittā uṭṭhāsiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0100^ea^ ^b^vicariṃhaṃ tena tena, lābhasakkāraussukā^eb^ti lābhe ca sakkāre ca ussukā yuttappayuttā hutvā tena tena bāhusaccadhammakathādinā lābhuppādahetunā vicariṃ ahaṃ.

[03] ^b^riñcitvā paramaṃ attha^eb^nti jhānavipassanāmaggaphalādiṃ uttamaṃ atthaṃ jahitvā chaḍḍetvā. ^b^hīnamatthaṃ aseviha^eb^nti catupaccayasaṅkhātāamisabhāvato ^a^P0.0090^ea^ hīnaṃ lāmakaṃ atthaṃ ayoniso pariyesanāya paṭiseviṃ ahaṃ. ^b^kilesānaṃ vasaṃ gantvā^eb^ti mānamadataṇhādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ vasaṃ upagantvā ^b^sāmaññatthaṃ^eb^ samaṇakiccaṃ ^b^na bujjhiṃ^eb^ na jāniṃ ahaṃ.

[03] ^b^nisinnāya^eb^ ^a^M0.0093^ea^ ^b^vihārake^eb^ti mama vasanakaovarake nisinnāya ahu saṃvego. kathanti ce, āha ^b^``ummaggapaṭipannāmhī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^ummaggapaṭipannāmhī^eb^ti yāvadeva anupādāya parinibbānatthamidaṃ sāsanaṃ, tattha sāsane pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ amanasikarontī tassa ummaggapaṭipannā amhīti. ^b^taṇhāya vasamāgatā^eb^ti paccayuppādanataṇhāya vasaṃ upagatā.

[03] ^b^appakaṃ jīvitaṃ mayha^eb^nti paricchinnakālā vajjitato bahūpaddavato ca mama jīvitaṃ appakaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ. ^b^jarā byādhi ca maddatī^eb^ti tañca samantato āpatitvā nippothentā pabbatā viya jarā byādhi ca maddati nimmathati. ``maddare''tipi pāṭho. ^b^purāyaṃ bhijjati kāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ kāyo bhijjati purā. yasmā tassa ekaṃsiko bhedo, tasmā ^b^na me kālo pamajjituṃ^eb^ ayaṃ kālo aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjito navamo khaṇo, so pamajjituṃ na yuttoti tassāhuṃ saṃvegoti yojanā.

[03] ^b^yathābhūtamavekkhantī^eb^ti evaṃ jātasaṃvegā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccādimanasikārena yathābhūtamavekkhantī. kiṃ avekkhantīti āha ^b^``khandhānaṃ udayabbaya''^eb^nti. ``avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.50) samapaññāsappabhedānaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ uppādanirodhañca udayabbayānupassanāya avekkhantī vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaso kilesehi ca bhavehi ca vimuttacittā uṭṭhāsiṃ, ubhato uṭṭhānena maggena bhavattayato cāti vuṭṭhitā ahosiṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^agārasmiṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0101^ea^ ^a^P0.0091^ea^ ^b^vasantī^eb^tiādikā sakulāya theriyā gāthā. ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare ānandassa rañño dhītā hutvā nibbattā, satthu vemātikabhaginī ^b^nandā^eb^ti nāmena. sā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā ussāhajātā adhikārakammaṃ katvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthentī paṇidhānamakāsi. sā tattha yāvajīvaṃ ^a^M0.0094^ea^ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantī kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekacārinī vicarantī ekadivasaṃ telabhikkhāya āhiṇḍitvā telaṃ labhitvā tena telena satthu cetiye sabbarattiṃ dīpapūjaṃ akāsi. sā tato cutā tāvatiṃse nibbattitvā suvisuddhadibbacakkhukā hutvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesuyeva saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. ^b^sakulā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi. sā viññutaṃ pattā satthu jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe paṭiladdhasaddhā upāsikā hutvā aparabhāge aññatarassa khīṇāsavattherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvegā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭentī vāyamantī na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.3.131-165) --
[22] surūpā sadhanā cāpi, dayitā ca sirīmatī..
[21] ``tato avoca maṃ satthā, nande lacchasi patthitaṃ.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] sakulā nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvikā..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[22] pajjalanti mahādīpā, tattha tattha gatāya me..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātā vippakule ahaṃ.

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā katādhikāratāya dibbacakkhuñāṇe ciṇṇavasī ahosi. tena naṃ satthā dibbacakkhukānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajātā udānavasena --

[03] tattha ^b^agārasmiṃ vasantīhaṃ, dhammaṃ sutvāna bhikkhuno^eb^ti ahaṃ pubbe agāramajjhe vasamānā aññatarassa bhinnakilesassa bhikkhuno santike catusaccagabbhaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā. ^b^addasaṃ virajaṃ dhammaṃ, nibbānaṃ padamaccuta^eb^nti rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvena virajaṃ, vānato nikkhantattā nibbānaṃ, cavanābhāvato adhigatānaṃ accutihetutāya ca nibbānaṃ accutaṃ, padanti ca laddhanāmaṃ asaṅkhatadhammaṃ, sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitena dassanasaṅkhātena dhammacakkhunā addasaṃ passiṃ.

[03] ^b^sikkhamānā ahaṃ santī^eb^ti ahaṃ sikkhamānāva samānā pabbajitvā vasse aparipuṇṇe eva. ^b^bhāventī maggamañjasa^eb^nti majjhimapaṭipattibhāvato añjasaṃ uparimaggaṃ uppādentī. ^b^tadekaṭṭhe ca āsave^eb^ti rāgadosehi sahajekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca tatiyamaggavajjhe āsave ^b^pahāsiṃ^eb^ samucchindiṃ.

[03] ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ ^a^V0.0106^ea^ ^b^upasampajjā^eb^ti vasse paripuṇṇe upasampajjitvā bhikkhunī hutvā. ^b^vimala^eb^nti avijjādīhi upakkilesehi vimuttatāya vigatamalaṃ, ^b^sādhu^eb^ sakkacca sammadeva ^a^M0.0098^ea^ ^b^bhāvitaṃ,^eb^ sādhūhi vā buddhādīhi ^b^bhāvitaṃ^eb^ uppāditaṃ dibbacakkhu visodhitanti sambandho.

[03] ^b^saṅkhāre^eb^ti tebhūmakasaṅkhāre. ^b^parato^eb^ti anattato. ^b^hetujāte^eb^ti paccayuppanne. ^b^palokite^eb^ti palujjanasabhāve ^a^P0.0095^ea^ pabhaṅgune paññācakkhunā disvā. ^b^pahāsiṃ āsave sabbe^eb^ti aggamaggena avasiṭṭhe sabbepi āsave pajahiṃ, khepesinti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^dasa putte vijāyitvā^eb^tiādikā soṇāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, adhikārakammaṃ katvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā, tato cutā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappattā patikulaṃ gatā dasa puttadhītaro labhitvā ^b^bahuputtikā^eb^ti paññāyittha. sā sāmike pabbajite vayappatte puttadhītaro gharāvāse patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ puttānaṃ vibhajitvā adāsi, na kiñci attano ṭhapesi. taṃ puttā ca dhītaro ca katipāhameva upaṭṭhahitvā paribhavaṃ akaṃsu. sā ``kiṃ mayhaṃ imehi paribhavāya ghare vasantiyā''ti bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. taṃ bhikkhuniyo pabbājesuṃ. sā laddhūpasampadā ``ahaṃ mahallikākāle pabbajitvā appamattāya bhavitabba''nti bhikkhunīnaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karontī ``sabbarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī''ti heṭṭhāpāsāde ekathambhaṃ hatthena gahetvā taṃ avijahamānā samaṇadhammaṃ karontī caṅkamamānāpi ``andhakāre ṭhāne rukkhādīsu yattha katthaci me sīsaṃ paṭihaññeyyā''ti rukkhaṃ hatthena gahetvā taṃ avijahamānāva samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. tato paṭṭhāya sā āraddhavīriyatāya pākaṭā ahosi. satthā tassā ñāṇaparipākaṃ disvā ^a^M0.0099^ea^ ^a^P0.0096^ea^ gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisinno viya attānaṃ dassetvā --
[22] ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato dhammamuttama''nti.. (dha0 pa0 115) --
[25] gāthaṃ abhāsi. sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.3.220-243) --
[22] upetvā taṃ munivaraṃ, assosiṃ madhuraṃ vacaṃ..
[22] taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, kāraṃ katvāna satthuno..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] soṇāti nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvikā..
[21] ``taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ.
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātā seṭṭhikule ahaṃ.
[22] amittānampi rucitā, mama pageva te siyā..
[22] pabbajittha sa me bhattā, devadevassa sāsane..
[21] ``ahampi tattha gacchissaṃ, sampatto yattha me pati.
[22] culle ṭhapetvā āsīnā, tato cittaṃ samādahiṃ..
[22] taṃ sutvā mudito nātho, imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsatha..
[03] atha naṃ bhagavā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sā ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] tassā dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, kese chetvāna pabbajiṃ..
[22] pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmi, yattha me vusitaṃ pure..
[22] dhi tavatthu jare jamme, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^rūpasamussaye^eb^ti rūpasaṅkhāte samussaye. ayañhi rūpasaddo ``cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.60) rūpāyatane āgato. ``yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna''ntiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.181) rūpakkhandhe. ``piyarūpe sātarūpe ^a^V0.0110^ea^ rajjatī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.409) sabhāve. ``bahiddhā rūpāni passatī''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.338; a0 ni0 1.427-434) kasiṇāyatane. ``rūpī rūpāni passatī''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.339; a0 ni0 1.435-442) rūpajhāne. ``aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.306) rūpakāye. idhāpi rūpakāyeva daṭṭhabbo. ^b^samussaya^eb^saddopi aṭṭhīnaṃ sarīrassa pariyāyo. ``satanti samussayā''tiādīsu aṭṭhisarīrapariyāye. ``āturaṃ asuciṃ pūtiṃ, passa nande samussaya''ntiādīsu (theragā0 19) sarīre. idhāpi sarīre eva daṭṭhabbo. tena vuttaṃ -- ``rūpasamussaye''ti, rūpasaṅkhāte samussaye sarīreti attho. ṭhatvāti vacanaseso. asmiṃ rūpasamussayeti hi imasmiṃ rūpasamussaye ṭhatvā imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ nissāya dasa putte vijāyitvāti yojanā. ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā dasaputtavijāyanahetu. sā hi paṭhamavayaṃ atikkamitvā puttake ^a^M0.0102^ea^ vijāyantī anukkamena dubbalasarīrā jarājiṇṇā ca ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tatohaṃ dubbalā jiṇṇā''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti tato, ^b^tassā^eb^ti vā tassā santike. puna tassāti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ, tāyāti attho. ^b^sikkhamānāyā^eb^ti tissopi sikkhā sikkhamānā.

[01] ^b^anantarāvimokkhāsi^eb^nti aggamaggassa anantarā uppannavimokkhā āsiṃ. rūpī rūpāni passatītiādayo hi aṭṭhapi vimokkhā anantaravimokkhā nāma na honti. maggānantaraṃ anuppattā hi phalavimokkhā phalasamāpattikāle pavattamānāpi paṭhamamaggānantarameva samuppattito ^a^P0.0099^ea^ taṃ upādāya anantaravimokkhā nāma, yathā maggasamādhi ānantarikasamādhīti vuccati. ^b^anupādāya nibbutā^eb^ti rūpādīsu kiñcipi aggahetvā kilesaparinibbānena nibbutā āsiṃ.

[03] evaṃ vijjāttayaṃ vibhāvetvā arahattaphalena kūṭaṃ gaṇhantī udānetvā, idāni jarāya cirakālaṃ upaddutasarīraṃ vigarahantī saha vatthunā tassa samatikkantabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``pañcakkhandhā pariññātā''^eb^ti osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^dhi tavatthu jare jamme^eb^ti aṅgānaṃ sithilabhāvakaraṇādinā jare jamme lāmake hīne tava tuyhaṃ dhi atthu dhikāro hotu. ^b^natthi dāni punabbhavo^eb^ti tasmā tvaṃ mayā atikkantā abhibhūtāsīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^lūnakesī^eb^tiādikā ^a^V0.0111^ea^ bhaddāya kuṇḍalakesāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle ^b^kikissa^eb^ kāsirañño gehe sattannaṃ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā, vīsati vassasahassāni dasa sīlāni samādāya komāribrahmacariyaṃ carantī saṅghassa vasanapariveṇaṃ kāretvā, ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhikule nibbatti. ^b^bhaddā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi. sā mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamānā vayappattā, tasmiṃyeva nagare purohitassa puttaṃ sattukaṃ nāma coraṃ sahoḍḍhaṃ gahetvā rājāṇāya nagaraguttikena māretuṃ āghātanaṃ niyyamānaṃ, sīhapañjarena olokentī disvā ^a^P0.0100^ea^ paṭibaddhacittā hutvā sace taṃ labhāmi, jīvissāmi; no ce, marissāmīti sayane adhomukhī nipajji.

[03] athassā pitā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ekadhītutāya balavasineho sahassalañjaṃ datvā upāyeneva coraṃ vissajjāpetvā gandhodakena nhāpetvā sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā pāsādaṃ pesesi. bhaddāpi paripuṇṇamanorathā atirekālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā taṃ paricarati. sattuko katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā tassā ābharaṇesu uppannalobho bhadde, ahaṃ nagaraguttikena gahitamattova corapapāte adhivatthāya devatāya ``sacāhaṃ jīvitaṃ labhāmi, tuyhaṃ balikammaṃ upasaṃharissāmī''ti patthanaṃ āyāciṃ, tasmā balikammaṃ sajjāpehīti. sā ``tassa manaṃ pūressāmī''ti balikammaṃ sajjāpetvā sabbābharaṇavibhūsitā sāmikena saddhiṃ ekaṃ yānaṃ abhiruyha ``devatāya balikammaṃ karissāmī''ti corapapātaṃ abhiruhituṃ āraddhā.

[01] sattuko cintesi -- ``sabbesu abhiruhantesu imissā ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā''ti parivārajanaṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā tameva balibhājanaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbataṃ abhiruhanto tāya saddhiṃ piyakathaṃ na kathesi. sā iṅgiteneva tassādhippāyaṃ aññāsi. sattuko, ``bhadde, tava uttarasāṭakaṃ omuñcitvā kāyārūḷhapasādhanaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ karohī''ti. sā, ``sāmi, mayhaṃ ko aparādho''ti? ``kiṃ nu maṃ, bāle,`balikammatthaṃ āgato'ti saññaṃ karosi? balikammāpadesena pana tava ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ āgato''ti. ``kassa pana, ayya, pasādhanaṃ, kassa aha''nti? ``nāhaṃ etaṃ vibhāgaṃ jānāmī''ti ^a^V0.0112^ea^. ``hotu, ayya, ekaṃ pana me adhippāyaṃ pūrehi, alaṅkataniyāmena ^a^M0.0104^ea^ ca āliṅgituṃ dehī''ti. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. sā tena sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ ñatvā purato āliṅgitvā pacchato āliṅgantī viya pabbatapapāte pātesi. so patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ ahosi. tāya kataṃ acchariyaṃ disvā pabbate adhivatthā devatā kosallaṃ vibhāventī imā gāthā abhāsi --
[21] ``na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito.
[22] itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā..
[21] ``na ^a^P0.0101^ea^ hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito.
[22] itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, lahuṃ atthavicintikā''ti.. (apa0 therī0 2.3.31-32).

[03] tato bhaddā cintesi -- ``na sakkā mayā iminā niyāmena gehaṃ gantuṃ, itova gantvā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajissāmī''ti nigaṇṭhārāmaṃ gantvā nigaṇṭhe pabbajjaṃ yāci. atha naṃ te āhaṃsu -- ``kena niyāmena pabbajjā hotū''ti? ``yaṃ tumhākaṃ pabbajjāya uttamaṃ, tadeva karothā''ti. te ``sādhū''ti tassā tālaṭṭhinā kese luñcitvā pabbājesuṃ. puna kesā vaḍḍhantā kuṇḍalāvaṭṭā hutvā vaḍḍhesuṃ. tato paṭṭhāya sā ^b^kuṇḍalakesā^eb^ti nāma jātā. sā tattha uggahetabbaṃ samayaṃ vādamaggañca uggahetvā ``ettakaṃ nāma ime jānanti, ito uttari viseso natthī''ti ñatvā tato apakkamitvā yattha yattha paṇḍitā atthi, tattha tattha gantvā tesaṃ jānanasippaṃ uggahetvā attanā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ adisvā yaṃ yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pavisati, tassa dvāre vālukārāsiṃ katvā tattha jambusākhaṃ ṭhapetvā ``yo mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ sakkoti, so imaṃ sākhaṃ maddatū''ti samīpe ṭhitadārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. sattāhampi jambusākhāya tatheva ṭhitāya taṃ gahetvā pakkamati.

[03] tena ca samayena amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavane viharati. kuṇḍalakesāpi vuttanayena gāmanigamarājadhānīsu vicarantī sāvatthiṃ patvā nagaradvāre vālukārāsimhi jambusākhaṃ ṭhapetvā dārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā sāvatthiṃ pāvisi.

[03] athāyasmā ^a^M0.0105^ea^ ^a^V0.0113^ea^ dhammasenāpati ekakova nagaraṃ pavisanto taṃ sākhaṃ disvā taṃ dametukāmo dārake pucchi -- ``kasmāyaṃ sākhā evaṃ ṭhapitā''ti? dārakā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. thero ``yadi evaṃ imaṃ sākhaṃ maddathā''ti āha. dārakā taṃ maddiṃsu. kuṇḍalakesā katabhattakiccā nagarato nikkhamantī taṃ sākhaṃ madditaṃ disvā ``kenidaṃ maddita''nti pucchitvā therena maddāpitabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``apakkhiko vādo na sobhatī''ti sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā vīthito vīthiṃ vicarantī ``passeyyātha samaṇehi ^a^P0.0102^ea^ sakyaputtiyehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ vāda''nti ugghosetvā mahājanaparivutā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ``kiṃ tumhehi mama jambusākhā maddāpitā''ti pucchi. ``āma, mayā maddāpitā''ti. ``evaṃ sante tumhehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ vādo hotū''ti. ``hotu, bhadde''ti. ``kassa pucchā, kassa vissajjanā''ti? ``pucchā nāma amhākaṃ pattā, tvaṃ yaṃ attano jānanakaṃ pucchā''ti. sā sabbameva attano jānanakaṃ vādaṃ pucchi. thero taṃ sabbaṃ vissajjesi. sā upari pucchitabbaṃ ajānantī tuṇhī ahosi. atha naṃ thero āha -- ``tayā bahuṃ pucchitaṃ, mayampi taṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchāmā''ti. ``pucchatha, bhante''ti. thero ``ekaṃ nāma ki''nti imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. kuṇḍalakesā neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passantī andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya hutvā ``na jānāmi, bhante''ti āha. ``tvaṃ ettakampi ajānantī aññaṃ kiṃ jānissasī''ti vatvā dhammaṃ desesi. sā therassa pādesu patitvā, ``bhante, tumhe saraṇaṃ gacchāmī''ti āha. ``mā maṃ tvaṃ, bhadde, saraṇaṃ gaccha, sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ bhagavantameva saraṇaṃ gacchā''ti. ``evaṃ karissāmi, bhante''ti sā sāyanhasamaye dhammadesanāvelāyaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. satthā tassā ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā --
[22] ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā supasammatī''ti.. --
[25] imaṃ gāthamāha. gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.3.1-54) --
[21] ``taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, dānaṃ datvā mahesino.
[22] samijjhissati taṃ sabbaṃ, sukhinī hohi nibbutā..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[21] ``anujāni na no tāto, agāreva tadā mayaṃ.
[22] dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, sattamī saṅghadāyikā..
[22] jātā seṭṭhikule phīte, yadāhaṃ yobbane ṭhitā..
[21] ``coraṃ vadhatthaṃ nīyantaṃ, disvā rattā tahiṃ ahaṃ.
[22] pitā me taṃ sahassena, mocayitvā vadhā tato..
[21] ``adāsi tassa maṃ tāto, viditvāna manaṃ mama.
[22] sabbaṃ harassu bhaddante, mañca dāsīti sāvaya..
[22] na cāhaṃ abhijānāmi, aññaṃ piyataraṃ tayā..
[22] na ca dāni puno atthi, mama tuyhañca saṅgamo..
[21] ``na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito.
[22] itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā..
[21] ``na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito.
[22] migaṃ uṇṇā yathā evaṃ, tadāhaṃ sattukaṃ vadhiṃ..
[21] ``saṇḍāsena ca kese me, luñcitvā sabbaso tadā.
[22] samayaṃ taṃ vicintesiṃ, suvāno mānusaṃ karaṃ..
[22] te avocuṃ vijānanti, taṃ atthaṃ sakyabhikkhavo..
[22] tathā sabbepi saṅkhāre, īdisaṃ cintayiṃ tadā..
[22] ñāṇaṃ me vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, buddhaseṭṭhassa sāsane..

[03] arahattaṃ ^a^V0.0119^ea^ pana patvā tāvadeva pabbajjaṃ yāci. satthā tassā pabbajjaṃ anujāni. sā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvāna pabbajitvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmentī attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] ehi bhaddeti maṃ avaca, sā me āsūpasampadā..
[21] ``ciṇṇā aṅgā ca magadhā, vajjī kāsī ca kosalā.
[21] ``puññaṃ vata pasavi bahuṃ, sappañño vatāyaṃ upāsako.
[22] yo bhaddāya cīvaraṃ adāsi, vippamuttāya sabbaganthehī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^lūnakesī^eb^ti lūnā luñcitā kesā mayhanti lūnakesī, nigaṇṭhesu pabbajjāya tālaṭṭhinā luñcitakesā, taṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^paṅkadharī^eb^ti dantakaṭṭhassa akhādanena dantesu malapaṅkadhāraṇato paṅkadharī. ^b^ekasāṭī^eb^ti nigaṇṭhacārittavasena ekasāṭikā. ^b^pure cari^eb^nti pubbe nigaṇṭhī hutvā evaṃ vicariṃ. ^b^avajje vajjamatinī^eb^ti nhānucchādanadantakaṭṭhakhādanādike anavajje sāvajjasaññī. ^b^vajje cāvajjadassinī^eb^ti mānamakkhapalāsavipallāsādike sāvajje anavajjadiṭṭhī.

[03] ^b^divāvihārā nikkhammā^eb^ti attano divāvihāraṭṭhānato nikkhamitvā. ayampi ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ ^a^V0.0120^ea^ therena samāgatā tassa pañhassa vissajjanena dhammadesanāya ca nihatamānadabbā pasannamānasā hutvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitukāmāva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā.

[03] ^b^nihacca jāṇuṃ vanditvā^eb^ti jāṇudvayaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihantvā patiṭṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā. ^b^sammukhā añjaliṃ aka^eb^nti satthu sammukhā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ akāsiṃ. ^b^ehi, bhaddeti maṃ avaca, sā me āsūpasampadā^eb^ti yaṃ maṃ bhagavā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca yācitvā ṭhitaṃ ^a^M0.0111^ea^ ``ehi, bhadde, bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbaja upasampajjassū''ti avaca āṇāpesi. sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā āsi ahosi.

[03] ^b^ciṇṇā^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā aññābyākaraṇagāthā. tattha ^b^ciṇṇā aṅgā ca magadhā^eb^ti ye ime aṅgā ca magadhā ca vajjī ca kāsī ca kosalā ca janapadā pubbe sāṇāya mayā raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantiyā ciṇṇā caritā, tesuyeva satthārā samāgamato paṭṭhāya anaṇā niddosā apagatakilesā hutvā paññāsa saṃvaccharāni raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ abhuñjiṃ ^a^P0.0108^ea^ ahaṃ.
[03] yena abhippasannamānasena upāsakena attano cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, tassa puññavisesakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākarontī ^b^``puññaṃ vata pasavī bahu''^eb^nti osānagāthamāha. sā suviññeyyāva.

[03] ^b^naṅgalehi kasaṃ khetta^eb^ntiādikā paṭācārāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā, ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. sā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī kassapabuddhakāle kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ caritvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pariveṇaṃ akāsi. sā tato cutā devaloke ^a^V0.0121^ea^ nibbattā, ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe nibbattitvā vayappattā attano gehe ekena kammakārena saddhiṃ kilesasanthavaṃ akāsi. taṃ mātāpitaro samajātikassa kumārassa dātuṃ divasaṃ saṇṭhapesuṃ. taṃ ñatvā sā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā tena katasanthavena purisena saddhiṃ aggadvārena nikkhamitvā ekasmiṃ gāmake vasantī gabbhinī ahosi. sā ^a^M0.0112^ea^ paripakke gabbhe ``kiṃ idha anāthavāsena, kulagehaṃ gacchāma, sāmī''ti vatvā tasmiṃ ``ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā''ti kālakkhepaṃ karonte ``nāyaṃ bālo maṃ nessatī''ti tasmiṃ bahi gate gehe paṭisāmetabbaṃ paṭisāmetvā ``kulagharaṃ gatāti mayhaṃ sāmikassa kathethā''ti paṭivissakagharavāsīnaṃ ācikkhitvā ``ekikāva kulagharaṃ gamissāmī''ti maggaṃ paṭipajji ^a^P0.0109^ea^. so āgantvā gehe taṃ apassanto paṭivissake pucchitvā ``kulagharaṃ gatā''ti sutvā ``maṃ nissāya kuladhītā anāthā jātā''ti padānupadaṃ gantvā sampāpuṇi. tassā antarāmagge eva gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. sā pasutakālato paṭṭhāya paṭippassaddhagamanussukkā sāmikaṃ gahetvā nivatti. dutiyavārampi gabbhinī ahosītiādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] ayaṃ pana viseso -- yadā tassā antarāmagge kammajavātā caliṃsu, tadā mahāakālamegho udapādi. samantato vijjulatāhi ādittaṃ viya meghathanitehi bhijjamānaṃ viya ca udakadhārānipātanirantaraṃ nabhaṃ ahosi. sā taṃ disvā, ``sāmi, me anovassakaṃ ṭhānaṃ jānāhī''ti āha. so ito cito ca olokento ekaṃ tiṇasañchannaṃ gumbaṃ disvā tattha gantvā hatthagatāya vāsiyā tasmiṃ gumbe daṇḍake chinditukāmo tiṇehi sañchāditavammikasīsante uṭṭhitarukkhadaṇḍakaṃ chindi. tāvadeva ca naṃ tato vammikato nikkhamitvā ghoraviso āsīviso ḍaṃsi. so tattheva patitvā kālamakāsi. sā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantī tassa āgamanaṃ olokentī dvepi dārake vātavuṭṭhiṃ asahamāne viravante urantare katvā, dvīhi jāṇukehi dvīhi hatthehi ca bhūmiṃ uppīḷetvā yathāṭhitāva rattiṃ vītināmetvā vibhātāya rattiyā maṃsapesivaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ puttaṃ pilotikacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā hatthehi urehi ca pariggahetvā, itaraṃ ``ehi, tāta, pitā te ito gato''ti vatvā sāmikena gatamaggena gacchantī taṃ vammikasamīpe kālaṅkataṃ nisinnaṃ disvā ``maṃ nissāya mama sāmiko mato''ti rodantī paridevantī sakalarattiṃ devena vuṭṭhattā jaṇṇukappamāṇaṃ thanappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ savantiṃ antarāmagge nadiṃ patvā, attano mandabuddhitāya dubbalatāya ca dvīhi dārakehi saddhiṃ udakaṃ otarituṃ avisahantī jeṭṭhaputtaṃ orimatīre ṭhapetvā itaraṃ ^a^M0.0113^ea^ ādāya paratīraṃ gantvā sākhābhaṅgaṃ attharitvā ^a^V0.0122^ea^ tattha pilotikacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā ``itarassa santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti bālaputtakaṃ pahātuṃ asakkontī punappunaṃ nivattitvā olokayamānā nadiṃ otarati.

[03] athassā ^a^P0.0110^ea^ nadīmajjhaṃ gatakāle eko seno taṃ dārakaṃ disvā ``maṃsapesī''ti saññāya ākāsato bhassi. sā taṃ disvā ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā ``sūsū''ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ nicchāresi. seno dūrabhāvena taṃ anādiyanto kumāraṃ gahetvā vehāsaṃ uppati. orimatīre ṭhito putto ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā mahāsaddaṃ nicchārayamānaṃ disvā ``maṃ sandhāya vadatī''ti saññāya vegena udake pati. iti bālaputtako senena, jeṭṭhaputtako udakena hato. sā ``eko me putto senena gahito, eko udakena vūḷho, panthe me pati mato''ti rodantī paridevantī gacchantī sāvatthito āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ purisaṃ disvā pucchi -- ``kattha vāsikosi, tātā''ti? ``sāvatthivāsikomhi, ammā''ti. ``sāvatthiyaṃ asukavīthiyaṃ asukakulaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ jānāsi, tātā''ti? ``jānāmi, amma, taṃ pana mā pucchi, aññaṃ pucchā''ti. ``aññena me payojanaṃ natthi, tadeva pucchāmi, tātā''ti. ``amma, tvaṃ attano anācikkhituṃ na desi, ajja te sabbarattiṃ devo vassanto diṭṭho''ti? ``diṭṭho me, tāta, mayhameva so sabbarattiṃ vuṭṭho, taṃ kāraṇaṃ pacchā kathessāmi, etasmiṃ tāva me seṭṭhigehe pavattiṃ kathehī''ti. ``amma, ajja rattiyaṃ seṭṭhi ca bhariyā ca seṭṭhiputto cāti tayopi jane avattharamānaṃ gehaṃ pati, te ekacitakāyaṃ jhāyanti, svāyaṃ dhūmo paññāyati, ammā''ti. sā tasmiṃ khaṇe nivatthavatthampi patamānaṃ na sañjāni. sokummattattaṃ patvā jātarūpeneva --
[21] ``ubho puttā kālaṅkatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato.
[22] mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitamhi ḍayhare''ti.. (apa0 therī 2.2.498) --

[03] tato ^a^M0.0114^ea^ paṭṭhāya tassā nivāsanamattenapi paṭena acaraṇato patitācārattā ^b^paṭācārā^eb^tveva samaññā ahosi. taṃ disvā manussā ``gaccha, ummattike''ti keci ^a^P0.0111^ea^ kacavaraṃ matthake khipanti, aññe paṃsuṃ okiranti, apare leḍḍuṃ khipanti. satthā jetavane mahāparisāmajjhe nisīditvā ^a^V0.0123^ea^ dhammaṃ desento taṃ tathā paribbhamantiṃ disvā ñāṇaparipākañca oloketvā yathā vihārābhimukhī āgacchati, tathā akāsi. parisā taṃ disvā ``imissā ummattikāya ito āgantuṃ mādatthā''ti āha. ``bhagavā mā naṃ vārayitthā''ti vatvā avidūraṭṭhānaṃ āgatakāle ``satiṃ paṭilabha bhaginī''ti āha. sā tāvadeva buddhānubhāvena satiṃ paṭilabhitvā nivatthavatthassa patitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ukkuṭikaṃ upanisajjāya nisīdi. eko puriso uttarasāṭakaṃ khipi. sā taṃ nivāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, ``bhante, avassayo me hotha, ekaṃ me puttaṃ seno gaṇhi, eko udakena vūḷho, panthe pati mato, mātāpitaro bhātā ca gehena avatthaṭā matā ekacitakasmiṃ jhāyantī''ti sā sokakāraṇaṃ ācikkhi. satthā ``paṭācāre, mā cintayi, tava avassayo bhavituṃ samatthasseva santikaṃ āgatāsi. yathā hi tvaṃ idāni puttādīnaṃ maraṇanimittaṃ assūni pavattesi, evaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre puttādīnaṃ maraṇahetu pavattitaṃ assu catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato bahutara''nti dassento --
[21] ``catūsu samuddesu jalaṃ parittakaṃ, tato bahuṃ assujalaṃ anappakaṃ.
[22] dukkhena phuṭṭhassa narassa socanā, kiṃ kāraṇā amma tuvaṃ pamajjasī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.112 paṭācārātherīvatthu) --

[03] evaṃ satthari anamataggapariyāyakathaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 2.125-126) kathente tassā soko tanutarabhāvaṃ agamāsi. atha naṃ tanubhūtasokaṃ ñatvā ``paṭācāre, puttādayo ^a^M0.0115^ea^ nāma paralokaṃ gacchantassa tāṇaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā saraṇaṃ vā bhavituṃ na sakkontī''ti vijjamānāpi te na santi eva, tasmā ^a^P0.0112^ea^ paṇḍitena attano sīlaṃ visodhetvā nibbānagāmimaggoyeva sādhetabboti dassento --
[21] ``na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā.

[25] imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi. desanāvasāne paṭācārā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. satthā taṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. sā laddhūpasampadā uparimaggatthāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī ekadivasaṃ ghaṭena udakaṃ ādāya pāde dhovantī udakaṃ āsiñci. taṃ thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā pacchijji, dutiyavāraṃ āsittaṃ tato dūraṃ agamāsi, tatiyavāraṃ āsittaṃ tatopi dūrataraṃ agamāsi. sā tadeva ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā tayo vaye paricchinditvā ``mayā paṭhamaṃ āsittaudakaṃ viya ime sattā paṭhamavayepi maranti, tato dūraṃ gataṃ dutiyavāraṃ āsittaṃ udakaṃ viya majjhimavayepi, tato dūrataraṃ gataṃ tatiyavāraṃ āsittaṃ udakaṃ viya pacchimavayepi marantiyevā''ti cintesi. satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā tassā sammukhe ṭhatvā kathento viya ``evametaṃ, paṭācāre, sabbepime sattā maraṇadhammā, tasmā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ apassantassa vassasataṃ jīvato taṃ passantassa ekāhampi ekakkhaṇampi jīvitaṃ seyyo''ti imamatthaṃ dassento --
[22] ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato udayabbaya''nti.. (dha0 pa0 113) --
[25] gāthamāha. gāthāpariyosāne paṭācārā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.2.468-511) --
[21] ``yā tayā vaṇṇitā vīra, ito aṭṭhamake muni.
[21] ``tadā avoca maṃ satthā, bhadde mā bhāyi assasa.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[21] ``anujāni na no tāto, agāreva tadā mayaṃ.
[22] dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, sattamī saṅghadāyikā..
[21] ``ahaṃ uppalavaṇṇā ca, khemā bhaddā ca bhikkhunī.
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātā seṭṭhikule ahaṃ.
[22] naraṃ jārapatiṃ disvā, tena saddhiṃ agacchahaṃ..
[21] ``tato me sāmi āgantvā, sambhāvesi pathe mamaṃ.
[22] tadā me kammajā vātā, uppannā atidāruṇā..
[22] dabbatthāya tadā gantvā, sāmi sappena mārito..
[21] ``ubho ^a^P0.0115^ea^ puttā kālaṅkatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato.
[22] mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitamhi ḍayhare..
[21] ``tadā kisā ca paṇḍu ca, anāthā dīnamānasā.
[21] ``tato avoca maṃ satthā, putte mā soci assasa.
[22] attānaṃ te gavesassu, kiṃ niratthaṃ vihaññasi..
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0128^ea^ santi puttā tāṇāya, na ñātī nāpi bandhavā.
[21] ``jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā sekkhakāle attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā uparivisesassa nibbattitākāraṃ vibhāventī udānavasena --
[27] tato dīpaṃ gahetvāna, vihāraṃ pāvisiṃ ahaṃ.
[22] padīpasseva nibbānaṃ, vimokkho ahu cetaso''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^kasa^eb^nti kasantā kasikammaṃ karontā. bahutthe hi idaṃ ekavacanaṃ. ^b^pavapa^eb^nti bījāni vapantā. ^b^chamā^eb^ti chamāyaṃ. bhummatthe hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- ime māṇavā sattā naṅgalehi phālehi khettaṃ kasantā yathādhippāyaṃ khettabhūmiyaṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇabhedāni bījāni vapantā taṃhetu taṃnimittaṃ attānaṃ puttadārādīni posentā hutvā dhanaṃ ^a^M0.0120^ea^ paṭilabhanti. evaṃ imasmiṃ loke yoniso payutto paccattapurisakāro nāma saphalo saudayo.

[03] tattha ^b^kimahaṃ sīlasampannā, satthusāsanakārikā. nibbānaṃ nādhigacchāmi, akusītā anuddhatā^eb^ti ahaṃ suvisuddhasīlā āraddhavīriyatāya akusītā ajjhattaṃ susamāhitacittatāya anuddhatā ca hutvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ karontī kasmā nibbānaṃ nādhigacchāmi, adhigamissāmi evāti.

[03] evaṃ pana cintetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī ekadivasaṃ pādadhovanaudake nimittaṃ gaṇhi. tenāha ^b^``pāde pakkhālayitvānā''^eb^tiādi ^a^P0.0117^ea^. tassattho -- ahaṃ pāde dhovantī pādapakkhālanahetu tikkhattuṃ āsittesu udakesu thalato ninnamāgataṃ pādodakaṃ disvā nimittaṃ karomi.

[03] ``yathā ^a^V0.0130^ea^ idaṃ udakaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ, evaṃ sattānaṃ āyusaṅkhārā''ti evaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, tadanusārena dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, anattalakkhaṇañca upadhāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentī ^b^tato cittaṃ samādhesiṃ, assaṃ bhadraṃvajāniya^eb^nti yathā assaṃ bhadraṃ ājāniyaṃ kusalo sārathi sukhena sāreti, evaṃ mayhaṃ cittaṃ sukheneva samādhesiṃ, vipassanāsamādhinā samāhitaṃ akāsiṃ. evaṃ pana vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentī utusappāyanijigisāya ovarakaṃ pavisantī andhakāravidhamanatthaṃ dīpaṃ gahetvā gabbhaṃ pavisitvā dīpaṃ ṭhapetvā mañcake nisinnamattāva dīpaṃ vijjhāpetuṃ aggaḷasūciyā dīpavaṭṭiṃ ākaḍḍhiṃ, tāvadeva utusappāyalābhena tassā cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosi, vipassanāvīthiṃ otari, maggena ghaṭṭesi. tato maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaso āsavānaṃ khayo ahosi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``tato dīpaṃ gahetvāna...pe0... vimokkho ahu cetaso''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^seyyaṃ olokayitvānā^eb^ti dīpālokena seyyaṃ passitvā.

[03] ^b^sūci^eb^nti aggaḷasūciṃ. ^b^vaṭṭiṃ okassayāmī^eb^ti dīpaṃ vijjhāpetuṃ telābhimukhaṃ dīpavaṭṭiṃ ākaḍḍhemi. ^b^vimokkho^eb^ti kilesehi vimokkho. so pana yasmā paramatthato cittassa santati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``cetaso''^eb^ti. yathā pana vaṭṭitelādike paccaye sati uppajjanāraho padīpo tadabhāve anuppajjanato ^a^M0.0121^ea^ nibbutoti vuccati, evaṃ kilesādipaccaye sati uppajjanārahaṃ cittaṃ tadabhāve anuppajjanato vimuttanti vuccatīti āha -- ``padīpasseva nibbānaṃ, vimokkho ahu cetaso''ti.

[03] ^b^musalāni^eb^ ^a^P0.0118^ea^ ^b^gahetvānā^eb^tiādikā tiṃsamattānaṃ therīnaṃ gāthā. tāpi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantiyo anukkamena upacitavimokkhasambhārā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakakammasañcoditā tattha tattha kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā paṭācārāya theriyā santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajitvā parisuddhasīlā vattapaṭivattaṃ paripūrentiyo viharanti. athekadivasaṃ paṭācārātherī tāsaṃ ovādaṃ dentī --
[22] cetosamathamanuyuttā, karotha buddhasāsana''nti.. -- imā dve gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ime sattā jīvitahetu musalāni gahetvā paresaṃ dhaññaṃ koṭṭenti, udukkhalakammaṃ karonti. aññampi edisaṃ nihīnakammaṃ katvā puttadāraṃ posentā yathārahaṃ dhanampi saṃharanti. taṃ pana nesaṃ kammaṃ nihīnaṃ gammaṃ pothujjanikaṃ dukkhaṃ anatthasañhitañca. tasmā edisaṃ saṃkilesikapapañcaṃ vajjetvā ^b^karotha buddhasāsanaṃ^eb^ sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambuddhasāsanaṃ karotha sampādetha attano santāne nibbattetha. tattha kāraṇamāha -- ^b^``yaṃ katvā nānutappatī''^eb^ti, yassa karaṇahetu etarahi āyatiñca ^a^M0.0122^ea^ anutāpaṃ nāpajjati. idāni tassa karaṇe pubbakiccaṃ anuyogavidhiñca dassetuṃ, ^b^``khippaṃ pādāni dhovitvā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha yasmā adhovitapādassa avikkhālitamukhassa ca nisajjasukhaṃ utusappāyalābho ca na hoti, pāde pana dhovitvā mukhañca vikkhāletvā ekamante nisinnassa tadubhayaṃ labhati, tasmā ^b^khippaṃ^eb^ imaṃ yathāladdhaṃ khaṇaṃ avirādhentiyo ^a^P0.0119^ea^ ^b^pādāni^eb^ attano pāde dhovitvā ^b^ekamante^eb^ vivitte okāse ^b^nisīdatha^eb^ nisajjatha. aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittarucike ārammaṇe attano cittaṃ upanibandhitvā ^b^cetosamathamanuyuttā^eb^ samāhitena cittena catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāvasena buddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ ^b^karotha^eb^ sampādethāti.

[03] atha tā bhikkhuniyo tassā theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanāya kammaṃ karontiyo ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā hetusampannatāya ca saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā ovādagāthāhi saddhiṃ --

[03] tattha ^b^tassā tā vacanaṃ sutvā, paṭācārāya sāsana^eb^nti tassā paṭācārāya theriyā kilesapaṭisattusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanabhūtaṃ ovādavacanaṃ, ^b^tā^eb^ tiṃsamattā bhikkhuniyo sutvā paṭissutvā sirasā sampaṭicchitvā.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhāya^eb^ ^a^M0.0123^ea^ ^b^pāde vandiṃsu, katā te anusāsanī^eb^ti yathāsampaṭicchitaṃ tassā sāsanaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne nisīditvā bhāventiyo bhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ ārocetuṃ nisinnāsanato uṭṭhāya tassā santikaṃ ^a^P0.0120^ea^ gantvā ``mahātheri tavānusāsanī yathānusiṭṭhaṃ amhehi katā''ti vatvā tassā pāde pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandiṃsu. ^b^indaṃva devā tidasā, saṅgāme aparājita^eb^nti devāsurasaṅgāme aparājitaṃ vijitāviṃ indaṃ tāvatiṃsā devā viya mahātheri, mayaṃ taṃ purakkhatvā viharissāma aññassa kattabbassa abhāvato. tasmā ``tevijjāmha anāsavā''ti attano kataññubhāvaṃ pavedentī idameva tāsaṃ aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi. yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^duggatāhaṃ pure āsi^eb^ntiādikā candāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī anukkamena sambhatavimokkhasambhārā paripakkañāṇā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇagāme apaññātassa ^a^V0.0133^ea^ brāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tassā nibbattito paṭṭhāyaṃ taṃ kulaṃ bhogehi parikkhayaṃ gataṃ. sā anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā dukkhena jīvati. atha tasmiṃ gehe ahivātarogo uppajji. tenassā sabbepi ñātakā maraṇabyasanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. sā ñātikkhaye jāte aññattha jīvituṃ asakkontī kapālahatthā kule kule vicaritvā laddhaladdhena bhikkhāhārena yāpentī ekadivasaṃ paṭācārāya theriyā bhattavissaggaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. bhikkhuniyo taṃ dukkhitaṃ khuddābhibhūtaṃ disvāna sañjātakāruññā piyasamudācārena saṅgahetvā tattha vijjamānena upacāramanoharena āhārena santappesuṃ. sā tāsaṃ ācārasīle pasīditvā theriyā santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. tassā therī dhammaṃ kathesi. sā taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasannā saṃsāre ca sañjātasaṃvegā ^a^P0.0121^ea^ pabbaji ^a^M0.0124^ea^. pabbajitvā ca theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantī katādhikāratāya ñāṇassa ca paripākaṃ gatattā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā --
[22] sītuṇhena ca ḍayhantī, satta vassāni cārihaṃ..

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0134^ea^ ^b^duggatā^eb^ti daliddā. ^b^pure^eb^ti pabbajitato pubbe. pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya hi idha puggalo bhogehi aḍḍho vā daliddo vāti na vattabbo. guṇehi pana ayaṃ therī aḍḍhāyeva. tenāha ``duggatāhaṃ pure āsi''nti. ^b^vidhavā^eb^ti dhavo vuccati sāmiko, tadabhāvā vidhavā, matapatikāti attho. ^b^aputtikā^eb^ti puttarahitā. ^b^vinā mittehī^eb^ti mittehi bandhavehi ca parihīnā rahitā. ^b^bhattacoḷassa nādhiga^eb^nti bhattassa coḷassa ca pāripūriṃ nādhigacchiṃ, kevalaṃ pana bhikkhāpiṇḍassa pilotikākhaṇḍassa ca vasena ghāsacchādanamattameva alatthanti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``pattaṃ daṇḍañca gaṇhitvā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0125^ea^ ^b^patta^eb^nti mattikābhājanaṃ. ^b^daṇḍa^eb^nti goṇasunakhādipariharaṇadaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^kulā kula^eb^nti kulato kulaṃ. ^b^sītuṇhena ca ḍayhantī^eb^ti vasanagehābhāvato sītena ca uṇhena ca pīḷiyamānā.
[03] ^b^bhikkhuni^eb^nti ^a^P0.0122^ea^ paṭācārātheriṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^punā^eb^ti pacchā, sattasaṃvaccharato aparabhāge.
[03] ^b^paramatthe^eb^ti parame uttame atthe, nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya nibbāne ca. ^b^niyojayī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhantī niyojesi. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] chakkanipāte ^a^M0.0126^ea^ ^a^V0.0135^ea^ ^b^yassa maggaṃ na jānāsī^eb^tiādikā pañcasatamattānaṃ therīnaṃ gāthā. imāpi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantiyo anukkamena upacitavimokkhasambhārā hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tattha tattha kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappattā mātāpitūhi patikulaṃ ānītā tattha tattha putte labhitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasantiyo samānajātikassa tādisassa kammassa katattā sabbāva mataputtā hutvā, puttasokena abhibhūtā paṭācārāya theriyā santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisinnā attano sokakāraṇaṃ ārocesuṃ. therī tāsaṃ sokaṃ vinodentī --
[21] ``yassa maggaṃ na jānāsi, āgatassa gatassa vā.
[22] taṃ kuto cāgataṃ sattaṃ, mama puttoti rodasi..
[22] na naṃ samanusocesi, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino..
[22] yathāgato tathā gato, kā tattha paridevanā''ti.. --

[03] tā ^a^V0.0136^ea^ tassā dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvegā theriyā santike pabbajiṃsu. pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontiyo vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripākaṃ gatattā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. atha tā adhigatārahattā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena ^b^``yassa maggaṃ na jānāsī''^eb^tiādikāhi ovādagāthāhi saddhiṃ --
[22] buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, upemi saraṇaṃ muni''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^yassa maggaṃ na jānāsi, āgatassa gatassa vā^eb^ti yassa sattassa idha āgatassa āgatamaggaṃ vā ito gatassa gatamaggaṃ vā tvaṃ na jānāsi. anantarā atītānāgatabhavūpapattiyo sandhāya vadati. ^b^taṃ kuto cāgataṃ satta^eb^nti taṃ evaṃ aviññātāgatagatamaggaṃ kutoci gatito āgatamaggaṃ āgacchantena antarāmagge sabbena sabbaṃ akataparicayasamāgatapurisasadisaṃ sattaṃ kevalaṃ mamattaṃ uppādetvā mama puttoti kuto kena kāraṇena rodasi. appaṭikārato mama puttassa ca akātabbato na ettha rodanakāraṇaṃ atthīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^maggañca khossa jānāsī^eb^ti assa tava puttābhimatassa sattassa āgatassa āgatamaggañca gatassa gatamaggañca atha jāneyyāsi. ^b^na naṃ samanusocesī^eb^ti evampi naṃ na samanusoceyyāsi. kasmā? ^b^evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino,^eb^ diṭṭhadhammepi hi sattānaṃ sabbehi piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvā vinābhāvā tattha vasavattitāya abhāvato, pageva abhisamparāyaṃ.

[03] ^b^ayācito tatāgacchī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0124^ea^ tato paralokato kenaci ayācito idha āgacchi. ``āgato''tipi pāḷi, so evattho. ^b^nānuññāto ito gato^eb^ti idhalokato kenaci ananuññāto paralokaṃ gato. ^b^kutocī^eb^ti nirayādito yato kutoci gatito. ^b^nūnā^eb^ti parisaṅkāyaṃ ^a^V0.0137^ea^. ^b^vasitvā katipāhaka^eb^nti katipayadivasamattaṃ idha vasitvā. ^b^itopi aññena gato^eb^ti itopi bhavato aññena gato, ito aññampi bhavaṃ paṭisandhivasena upagato. ^b^tatopaññena gacchatī^eb^ti tatopi bhavato aññena gamissati, aññameva bhavaṃ upagamissati.

[03] ^b^peto^eb^ti ^a^M0.0128^ea^ apeto taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ upapajjitvā tato apagato. ^b^manussarūpenā^eb^ti nidassanamattametaṃ, manussabhāvena tiracchānādibhāvena cāti attho. ^b^saṃsaranto^eb^ti aparāparaṃ upapattivasena saṃsaranto. ^b^yathāgato tathā gato^eb^ti yathā aviññātagatito ca anāmantetvā āgato tathā aviññātagatiko ananuññātova gato. ^b^kā tattha paridevanā^eb^ti tattha tādise avasavattini yathākāmāvacare kā nāma paridevanā, kiṃ paridevitena payojananti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ettha ca ādito catasso gāthā paṭācārāya theriyā tesaṃ pañcamattānaṃ itthisatānaṃ sokavinodanavasena visuṃ visuṃ bhāsitā. tassā ovāde ṭhatvā pabbajitvā adhigatavisesāhi tāhi pañcasatamattāhi bhikkhunīhi chapi gāthā paccekaṃ bhāsitāti daṭṭhabbā.
[03] ^b^pañcasatā paṭācārā^eb^ti paṭācārāya theriyā santike laddhaovādatāya paṭācārāya vuttaṃ avedisunti katvā ``paṭācārā''ti laddhanāmā pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo.

[03] ^b^puttasokenahaṃ aṭṭā^eb^tiādikā vāseṭṭhiyā theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī anukkamena ^a^P0.0125^ea^ sambhatavimokkhasambhārā devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappattā mātāpitūhi samānajātikassa kulaputtassa dinnā patikulaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ sukhasaṃvāsaṃ vasantī ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā tasmiṃ ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle kālaṃ kate puttasokena aṭṭitā ummattikā ahosi. sā ñātakesu sāmike ca tikicchaṃ karontesu tesaṃ ajānantānaṃyeva palāyitvā yato tato paribbhamantī mithilānagaraṃ sampattā tatthaddasa bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ saṃyatindriyaṃ ^a^M0.0129^ea^ nāgaṃ. disvāna saha dassanena buddhānubhāvato ^a^V0.0138^ea^ apagatummādā pakaticittaṃ paṭilabhi. athassā satthā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desesi. sā taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvegā satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇāya bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā katapubbakiccā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭentī vāyamantī paripakkañāṇatāya na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] naggā pakiṇṇakesī ca, tena tena vicārihaṃ..
[22] pariññātā hi me vatthū, yato sokāna sambhavo''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^aṭṭā^eb^ti aṭṭitā. ayameva vā pāṭho, aṭṭitā pīḷitāti attho. ^b^khittacittā^eb^ti sokummādena khittahadayā. tato eva pakatisaññāya vigamena ^b^visaññinī^eb^. hirottappābhāvato apagatavatthatāya ^b^naggā^eb^. vidhutakesatāya ^b^pakiṇṇakesī. tena tenā^eb^ti gāmena gāmaṃ nagarena nagaraṃ vīthiyā vīthiṃ vicariṃ ahaṃ.

[03] ^b^athā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0139^ea^ pacchā ummādasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa parikkhaye. ^b^sugata^eb^nti sobhanagamanattā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sammā gadattā sammā ca gatattā sugataṃ ^a^M0.0130^ea^ bhagavantaṃ. ^b^mithilaṃ patī^eb^ti mithilābhimukhaṃ, mithilānagarābhimukhaṃ gacchantanti attho.
[03] ^b^sacittaṃ paṭiladdhānā^eb^ti buddhānubhāvena ummādaṃ pahāya attano pakaticittaṃ paṭilabhitvā.

[03] ^b^yuñjantī satthuvacane^eb^ti satthu sammāsambuddhassa sāsane yogaṃ karontī bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantī. ^b^sacchākāsiṃ padaṃ siva^eb^nti sivaṃ khemaṃ catūhi yogehi anupaddutaṃ nibbānaṃ padaṃ sacchiakāsiṃ.

[03] ^b^etadantikā^eb^ti etaṃ idāni mayā adhigataṃ arahattaṃ anto pariyosānaṃ etesanti etadantikā, sokā. na dāni tesaṃ sambhavo atthīti attho. ^b^yato sokāna sambhavo^eb^ti yato antonijjhānalakkhaṇānaṃ sokānaṃ sambhavo, tesaṃ sokānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātā vatthū adhiṭṭhānāni ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi pariññātā. tasmā sokā etadantikāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^daharā tvaṃ rūpavatī^eb^tiādikā khemāya theriyā gāthā. ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle ^a^P0.0127^ea^ haṃsavatīnagare parādhīnavuttikā paresaṃ dāsī ahosi. sā paresaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇena jīvikaṃ kappentī ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṃ sujātattheraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā tayo modake datvā taṃdivasameva attano kese vissajjetvā therassa dānaṃ datvā ``anāgate mahāpaññā buddhassa sāvikā bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakamme appamattā hutvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī anukkamena chakāmasagge, tesaṃ tesaṃ devarājūnaṃ mahesibhāvena upapannā, manussalokepi anekavāraṃ cakkavattīnaṃ maṇḍalarājūnañca mahesibhāvaṃ upagatā mahāsampattiyo anubhavitvā vipassissa bhagavato kāle manussaloke uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patvā, satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvegā pabbajitvā dasavassasahassāni ^a^M0.0131^ea^ brahmacariyaṃ carantī bahussutā dhammakathikā hutvā bahujanassa dhammakathanādinā paññāsaṃvattaniyakammaṃ katvā tato cavitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantī imasmiṃ kappe bhagavato ca kakusandhassa ^a^V0.0140^ea^ bhagavato ca koṇāgamanassa kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā mahantaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādesi.

[03] bhagavato pana kassapadasabalassa kāle kikissa kāsirañño sabbajeṭṭhikā samaṇī nāma dhītā hutvā, satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvegā agāreyeva ṭhitā, vīsati vassasahassāni komāribrahmacariyaṃ carantī samaṇaguttādīhi attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ ramaṇīyaṃ pariveṇaṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādesi. evameva tattha tattha bhave āyatanagataṃ uḷāraṃ puññakammaṃ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde maddaraṭṭhe sākalanagare rājakule nibbatti. ^b^khemā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi, suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā. sā vayappattā bimbisārarañño gehaṃ gatā. satthari veḷuvane viharante rūpamattā hutvā ``rūpe dosaṃ dassetī''ti satthu dassanāya na gacchati.

[03] rājā manussehi veḷuvanassa vaṇṇe pakāsāpetvā deviyā vihāradassanāya cittaṃ ^a^P0.0128^ea^ uppādesi. atha devī ``vihāraṃ passissāmī''ti rājānaṃ paṭipucchi. rājā ``vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ adisvā āgantuṃ na labhissasī''ti vatvā purisānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi -- ``balakkārenapi deviṃ dasabalaṃ dassethā''ti. devī vihāraṃ gantvā divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā nivattentī satthāraṃ adisvāva gantuṃ āraddhā. atha naṃ rājapurisā anicchantimpi satthu santikaṃ nayiṃsu. satthā taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā iddhiyā devaccharāsadisaṃ itthiṃ nimminitvā tālapaṇṇaṃ gahetvā bījayamānaṃ akāsi. khemā devī taṃ disvā cintesi -- ``evarūpā nāma devaccharapaṭibhāgā itthiyo bhagavato avidūre tiṭṭhanti, ahaṃ etāsaṃ paricārikatāyapi nappahomi, manampi nikkāraṇā pāpacittassa vasena naṭṭhā''ti nimittaṃ gahetvā tameva itthiṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi. athassā passantiyāva satthu adhiṭṭhānabalena sā itthī paṭhamavayaṃ atikkamma majjhimavayampi atikkamma pacchimavayaṃ patvā khaṇḍadantā palitakesā valittacā hutvā saddhiṃ tālapaṇṇena parivattitvā pati ^a^M0.0132^ea^. tato khemā katādhikārattā evaṃ cintesi -- ``evaṃvidhampi sarīraṃ īdisaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇi, mayhampi sarīraṃ evaṃgatikameva bhavissatī''ti. athassā cittācāraṃ ñatvā satthā --
[21] ``ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃ kataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ.
[22] etampi chetvāna paribbajanti, anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāyā''ti.. --

[25] gāthamāha ^a^V0.0141^ea^. sā gāthāpariyosāne saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ. apadāne pana ``imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī''ti āgataṃ. tatthāyaṃ ^b^apadānapāḷi^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.2.289-383) --
[21] ``taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, puno tassa mahesino.
[22] kāraṃ katvāna taṃ ṭhānaṃ, paṇipacca paṇīdahiṃ..
[21] ``tato mama jino āha, sijjhataṃ paṇidhī tava.
[22] sasaṅghe me kataṃ kāraṃ, appameyyaphalaṃ tayā..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] sabbā sampattiyo mayhaṃ, sulabhā manaso piyā..
[21] ``yopi ^a^M0.0134^ea^ me bhavate bhattā, yattha yattha gatāyapi.
[22] vimāneti na maṃ koci, paṭipattibalena me..
[22] dhanañjānī sumedhā ca, ahampi ca tayo janā..
[22] saṅghassa ca vihārampi, uddissa kārikā mayaṃ..
[22] yasasā aggataṃ pattā, manussesu tatheva ca..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[21] ``anujāni na no tāto, agāreva tadā mayaṃ.
[22] dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, sattamī saṅghadāyikā..
[22] rañño maddassa dhītāmhi, manāpā dayitā piyā..
[21] ``saha me jātamattamhi, khemaṃ tamhi pure ahu.
[22] tato khemāti nāmaṃ me, guṇato upapajjatha..
[22] tadā adāsi maṃ tāto, bimbisārassa rājino..
[22] na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññāmase mayaṃ..
[22] rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ disvā, na tappanti suvimhitā..
[22] ko vattā tassa nissesaṃ, vanassa guṇasañcayaṃ..
[22] tatthāpi taruṇaṃ bhikkhuṃ, yuttaṃ disvā vicintayiṃ..
[22] jhāyate vatayaṃ bhikkhu, hitvā visayajaṃ ratiṃ..
[22] dhiratthu rūpaṃ asuciṃ, ramante yattha bālisā..
[22] sati kāyagatā tyatthu, nibbidā bahulā bhava..
[21] ``yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ.
[22] ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaya..
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0148^ea^ rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃ kataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ.
[22] etampi ^a^P0.0134^ea^ chetvāna paribbajanti, anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāya..
[22] namo te tiṇṇasaṃsāra, namo te amataṃ dada..
[22] tayā sammā upāyena, vinītā vinaye ratā..
[22] avoca tiṭṭha khemeti, siñcanto amatena maṃ..
[21] ``tadā ^a^V0.0149^ea^ pakamya sirasā, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ.
[21] ``yadi te ruccate rāja, sāsane tassa tādino.
[22] anujānāmi te bhadde, pabbajjā tava sijjhatu..
[22] tatheva buddho byākāsi, yathā te byākatā mayā..
[21] ``jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
[21] ``kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. (apa0 therī 2.2.289-383).

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca viharantiyā imissā theriyā satipi aññāsaṃ khīṇāsavattherīnaṃ paññāvepullappattiyaṃ tattha pana katādhikāratāya mahāpaññābhāvo pākaṭo ahosi. tathā hi naṃ bhagavā jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā''ti (a0 ni0 1.235-236) mahāpaññatāya aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. taṃ ekadivasaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisinnaṃ māro pāpimā taruṇarūpena upasaṅkamitvā kāmehi palobhento --
[22] pañcaṅgikena turiyena, ehi kheme ramāmase''ti.. -- gāthamāha ^a^P0.0136^ea^.
[03] tassattho -- kheme, tvaṃ taruṇappattā, yobbane ṭhitā rūpasampannā, ahampi taruṇo yuvā, tasmā mayaṃ yobbaññaṃ akhepetvā pañcaṅgikena turiyena vajjamānena ehi kāmakhiḍḍāratiyā ramāma kīḷāmāti.
[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ sutvā sā kāmesu sabbadhammesu ca attano virattabhāvaṃ tassa ca mārabhāvaṃ attābhinivesesu sattesu attano thāmagataṃ appasādaṃ katakiccatañca pakāsentī --
[22] yaṃ tvaṃ kāmaratiṃ brūsi, aratī dāni sā mama..
[22] evaṃ jānāhi pāpima, nihato tvamasi antaka..
[22] pamuttā sabbadukkhehi, satthusāsanakārikā''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.
[03] tattha ^b^aggiṃ paricaraṃ vane^eb^ti tapovane aggihuttaṃ paricaranto. ^b^yathābhuccamajānantā^eb^ti pavattiyo yathābhūtaṃ aparijānantā. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānameva.

[03] ^b^alaṅkatā suvasanā^eb^tiādikā sujātāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha ^a^P0.0137^ea^ bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī anukkamena sambhatavimokkhasambhārā hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāketanagare seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappattā mātāpitūhi samānajātikassa seṭṭhiputtassa dinnā hutvā patikulaṃ gatā. tattha tena saddhiṃ sukhasaṃvāsaṃ vasantī ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā nakkhattakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā parijanena ^a^M0.0141^ea^ saddhiṃ nagaraṃ āgacchantī añjanavane satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānasā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. satthā tassā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā kallacittataṃ ñatvā upari sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pakāsesi. sā desanāvasāne attano katādhikāratāya ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā ca ^a^V0.0152^ea^, satthu ca desanāvilāsena yathānisinnāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gantvā sāmikañca mātāpitaro ca anujānāpetvā satthuāṇāya bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbaji. pabbajitvā ca attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] vihāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ pāvisiṃ, sākete añjanaṃ vanaṃ..
[22] tattheva virajaṃ dhammaṃ, phusayiṃ amataṃ padaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^alaṅkatā^eb^ti vibhūsitā. taṃ pana alaṅkatākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``suvasanā mālinī candanokkhitā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mālinī^eb^ti mālādhārinī. ^b^candanokkhitā^eb^ti candanānulittā. ^b^sabbābharaṇasañchannā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0138^ea^ hatthūpagādīhi sabbehi ābharaṇehi alaṅkāravasena sañchāditasarīrā.

[03] ^b^annaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^a^V0.0153^ea^ ^b^pānañca ādāya, khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ anappaka^eb^nti sāliodanādiannaṃ, ambapānādipānaṃ, piṭṭhakhādanīyādikhajjaṃ, avasiṭṭhaṃ āhārasaṅkhātaṃ bhojjañca pahūtaṃ gahetvā. ^b^uyyānamabhihārayi^eb^nti nakkhattakīḷāvasena uyyānaṃ upanesiṃ. annapānādiṃ tattha ānetvā saha parijanena kīḷantī ramantī paricāresinti adhippāyo.
[03] ^b^sākete añjanaṃ vana^eb^nti sāketasamīpe añjanavane vihāraṃ pāvisiṃ.

[03] ^b^ucce kule^eb^tiādikā anopamāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī anukkamena vimuttiparipācanīye dhamme paribrūhitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāketanagare majjhassa nāma seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti. tassā rūpasampattiyā ^b^anopamā^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. tassā vayappattakāle bahū seṭṭhiputtā rājamahāmattā rājāno ca pitu dūtaṃ pāhesuṃ -- ``attano dhītaraṃ anopamaṃ dehi, idañcidañca te dassāmā''ti. sā taṃ sutvā upanissayasampannatāya ``gharāvāsena mayhaṃ attho natthī''ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā desanānusārena vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā taṃ ussukkāpentī maggapaṭipāṭiyā tatiyaphale patiṭṭhāsi. sā satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthuāṇāya bhikkhunupassayaṃ upagantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā sattame divase arahattaṃ sacchikatvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] pitu me pesayī dūtaṃ, detha mayhaṃ anopamaṃ..
[22] tato aṭṭhaguṇaṃ dassaṃ, hiraññaṃ ratanāni ca..
[22] nisinnā āsane tasmiṃ, phusayiṃ tatiyaṃ phalaṃ..
[22] ajja me sattamī ratti, yato taṇhā visesitā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ucce kule^eb^ti uḷāratame vessakule. ^b^bahuvitte^eb^ti alaṅkārādipahūtavittūpakaraṇe. ^b^mahaddhane^eb^ti nidhānagatasseva cattārīsakoṭiparimāṇassa mahato dhanassa atthibhāvena mahaddhane ahaṃ jātāti yojanā. ^b^vaṇṇarūpena sampannā^eb^ti vaṇṇasampannā ceva rūpasampannā ca, siniddhabhāsurāya chavisampattiyā vatthābharaṇādisarīrāvayavasampattiyā ca samannāgatāti attho. ^b^dhītā majjhassa atrajā^eb^ti majjhanāmassa seṭṭhino orasā dhītā.

[03] ^b^patthitā rājaputtehī^eb^ti ``kathaṃ nu kho taṃ labheyyāmā''ti rājakumārehi abhipatthitā. ^b^seṭṭhiputtehi gijjhitā^eb^ti tathā seṭṭhikumārehipi abhigijjhitā paccāsīsitā. ^b^detha mayhaṃ anopama^eb^nti rājaputtādayo ``detha mayhaṃ anopamaṃ detha mayha''nti pitu santike dūtaṃ pesayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^yattakaṃ tulitā esā^eb^ti ``tuyhaṃ dhītā anopamā yattakaṃ dhanaṃ agghatī''ti tulitā lakkhaṇaññūhi paricchinnā, ``tato aṭṭhaguṇaṃ dassāmī''ti pitu me pesayi dūtanti yojanā. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^buddha^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^ ^a^V0.0155^ea^ ^a^P0.0140^ea^ ^b^vīra namo tyatthū^eb^tiādikā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā gāthā. ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā, kassapassa ca bhagavato antare amhākañca bhagavato buddhasuññe loke bārāṇasiyaṃ pañcannaṃ dāsisatānaṃ jeṭṭhikā hutvā nibbatti. atha sā vassūpanāyikasamaye pañca paccekabuddhe nandamūlakapabbhārato isipatane otaritvā, nagare piṇḍāya caritvā isipatanameva gantvā, vassūpanāyikasamaye kuṭiyā atthāya hatthakammaṃ pariyesante disvā, tā dāsiyo tāsaṃ attano ca sāmike samādapetvā caṅkamādiparivārasampannā pañca kuṭiyo kāretvā, mañcapīṭhapānīyaparibhojanīyabhājanādīni upaṭṭhapetvā paccekabuddhe temāsaṃ tattheva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vārabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. yā attano vāradivase bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, tassā sayaṃ sakagehato nīharitvā deti. evaṃ temāsaṃ paṭijaggitvā pavāraṇāya sampattāya ekekaṃ dāsiṃ ekekaṃ sāṭakaṃ vissajjāpesi. pañcathūlasāṭakasatāni ahesuṃ. tāni parivattāpetvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ticīvarāni katvā adāsi. paccekabuddhā tāsaṃ passantīnaṃyeva ākāsena gandhamādanapabbataṃ agamaṃsu.

[03] tāpi sabbā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. tāsaṃ jeṭṭhikā tato cavitvā bārāṇasiyā avidūre pesakāragāme pesakārajeṭṭhakassa gehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā, padumavatiyā putte pañcasate paccekabuddhe disvā sampiyāyamānā sabbe vanditvā bhikkhaṃ adāsi. te bhattakiccaṃ katvā gandhamādanameva agamaṃsu. sāpi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva devadahanagare mahāsuppabuddhassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, ^a^P0.0141^ea^ ^b^gotamī^eb^tissā gottāgatameva nāmaṃ ahosi; mahāmāyāya kaniṭṭhabhaginī. lakkhaṇapāṭhakāpi ``imāsaṃ dvinnampi kucchiyaṃ vasitā dārakā cakkavattino ^a^M0.0145^ea^ bhavissantī''ti byākariṃsu. suddhodanamahārājā vayappattakāle dvepi maṅgalaṃ katvā attano gharaṃ abhinesi.

[03] aparabhāge amhākaṃ satthari uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena tattha tattha veneyyānaṃ anuggahaṃ karonte vesāliṃ upanissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharante suddhodanamahārājā setacchattassa ^a^V0.0156^ea^ heṭṭhā arahattaṃ sacchikatvā parinibbāyi. atha mahāpajāpatigotamī pabbajitukāmā hutvā satthāraṃ ekavāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācamānā alabhitvā dutiyavāraṃ kese chindāpetvā kāsāyāni acchādetvā ^b^kalahavivādasuttanta^eb^desanāpariyosāne (su0 ni0 868 ādayo) nikkhamitvā pabbajitānaṃ pañcannaṃ sakyakumārasatānaṃ pādaparicārikāhi saddhiṃ vesāliṃ gantvā ānandattheraṃ satthāraṃ yācāpetvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi (a0 ni0 8.51; cūḷava0 403) pabbajjañca upasampadañca paṭilabhi. itarā pana sabbāpi ekatoupasampannā ahesuṃ. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṃ vatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.

[03] evaṃ upasampannā pana mahāpajāpatigotamī satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. athassā satthā dhammaṃ desesi. sā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjantī na cirasseva abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. sesā pana pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo ^b^nandakovāda^eb^pariyosāne (ma0 ni0 3.398 ādayo) chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ. athekadivasaṃ satthā jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento mahāpajāpatigotamiṃ rattaññūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmentī kataññutāya ṭhatvā ekadivasaṃ satthu guṇābhitthavanapubbakaupakārakavibhāvanāmukhena aññaṃ byākarontī --
[22] yo maṃ dukkhā pamocesi, aññañca bahukaṃ janaṃ..
[22] bhāvito aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, nirodho phusito mayā..
[21] ``mātā ^a^M0.0146^ea^ putto pitā bhātā, ayyakā ca pure ahuṃ.
[21] ``diṭṭho hi me so bhagavā, antimoyaṃ samussayo.
[22] samagge sāvake passe, esā buddhāna vandanā..
[22] byādhimaraṇatunnānaṃ, dukkhakkhandhaṃ byapānudī''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^buddhavīrā^eb^ti catusaccabuddhesu vīra, sabbabuddhā hi uttamavīriyehi catusaccabuddhehi vā catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyanipphattiyā vijitavijayattā vīrā nāma. bhagavā pana vīriyapāramipāripūriyā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena sātisayacatubbidhasammappadhānakiccanipphattiyā tassā ca veneyyasantāne sammadeva patiṭṭhāpitattā visesato vīriyayuttatāya vīroti vattabbataṃ arahati. ^b^namo tyatthū^eb^ti namo namakkāro te hotu. ^b^sabbasattānamuttamā^eb^ti apadādibhedesu sattesu sīlādiguṇehi uttamo bhagavā. tadekadesaṃ satthupakāraguṇaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^``yo maṃ dukkhā pamocesi, aññañca bahukaṃ jana''^eb^nti vatvā attano dukkhā pamuttabhāvaṃ vibhāventī ^b^``sabbadukkha''^eb^nti gāthamāha.

[03] puna yato pamocesi, taṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ ekadesena dassentī ^b^``mātā putto''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yathābhuccamajānantī^eb^ti pavattihetuādiṃ yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhantī. ^b^saṃsariṃhaṃ anibbisa^eb^nti saṃsārasamudde patiṭṭhaṃ avindantī alabhantī bhavādīsu aparāparuppattivasena saṃsariṃ ahanti kathentī āha ^b^``mātā putto''^eb^tiādi. yasmiṃ ^a^P0.0143^ea^ bhave etassa mātā ahosi, tato aññasmiṃ bhave tasseva putto, tato aññasmiṃ bhave pitā bhātā ahūti attho.

[03] ^b^``diṭṭho^eb^ ^a^M0.0147^ea^ ^b^hi me''^eb^ti gāthāyapi attano dukkhato pamuttabhāvameva vibhāveti. tattha ^b^diṭṭho hi me so bhagavā^eb^ti so bhagavā sammāsambuddho attanā diṭṭhalokuttaradhammadassanena ñāṇacakkhunā mayā paccakkhato diṭṭho. yo hi dhammaṃ passati, so bhagavantaṃ passati nāma. yathāha -- ``yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 3.87).

[03] ^b^āraddhavīriye^eb^ti paggahitavīriye. ^b^pahitatte^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pesitacitte. ^b^niccaṃ daḷhaparakkame^eb^ti apattassa pattiyā pattassa vepullatthāya sabbakālaṃ thiraparakkame. ^b^samagge^eb^ti sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena saṃhatabhāvena samagge. satthudesanāya savanante jātattā ^b^sāvake,^eb^ ``ime maggaṭṭhā ^a^V0.0158^ea^ ime phalaṭṭhā''ti yāthāvato passati. ^b^esā buddhāna vandanā^eb^ti yā satthu dhammasarīrabhūtassa ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyabhāvabhūtassa ca lokuttaradhammassa attapaccakkhakiriyā, esā sammāsambuddhānaṃ sāvakabuddhānañca vandanā yāthāvato guṇaninnatā.
[03] ^b^``bahūnaṃ vata atthāyā''^eb^ti osānagāthāyapi satthu lokassa bahūpakārataṃyeva vibhāveti. yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] athekadā mahāpajāpatigotamī satthari vesāliyaṃ viharante mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ sayaṃ vesāliyaṃ bhikkhunupassaye viharantī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā attano divāṭṭhāne yathāparicchinnakālaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajātā attano āyusaṅkhāre āvajjentī tesaṃ khīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā evaṃ cintesi -- ``yaṃnūnāhaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā manobhāvanīye ca there sabbeva sabrahmacariye āpucchitvā idheva āgantvā parinibbāyeyya''nti. yathā ca theriyā, evaṃ tassā parivārabhūtānaṃ ^a^P0.0144^ea^ pañcannaṃ bhikkhunisatānaṃ parivitakko ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.2.97-288) --
[22] tahiṃ kate pure ramme, vasī bhikkhunupassaye..
[22] paridevā ca suyyante, kimatthaṃ nūna gotamī..
[21] ``yadi te rucitaṃ ayye, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sivaṃ.
[21] ``mayaṃ ^a^P0.0145^ea^ sahāva nikkhantā, gharāpi ca bhavāpi ca.
[21] ``na jarā maccu vā yattha, appiyehi samāgamo.
[22] piyehi na viyogotthi, taṃ vajissaṃ asaṅkhataṃ..
[22] pabhāte viya tārāyo, na dissanti jinorasā..
[22] tayā na yuttā nibbātuṃ, icchaṭṭā vilapiṃsu tā..
[22] nirodho me sacchikato, maggo cāpi subhāvito..
[21] ``buddho tassa ca saddhammo, anūno yāva tiṭṭhati.
[22] nibbātuṃ tāva kālo me, mā maṃ socatha puttikā..
[22] sukhito sahito saṅgho, hatadabbā ca titthiyā..
[22] nanu sampati kālo me, nibbānatthāya puttikā..
[21] ``sace mayi dayā atthi, yadi catthi kataññutā.
[21] ``ahaṃ sugata te mātā, tvañca vīra pitā mama.
[22] puttakāmā thiyo yācaṃ, labhanti tādisaṃ sutaṃ..
[22] aṇukaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ pūritaṃ mayā..
[22] katvā dehaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ te, santiṃ gacchāmi nāyaka..
[22] cakkaṅkite pādatale, tato sā sirasā pati..
[22] pacchime maraṇe mayhaṃ, na taṃ ikkhāmahaṃ puno..
[22] yadi ko catthi doso me, khamassu karuṇākara..
[22] tattha ce atthi doso me, taṃ khamassu narāsabha..
[22] tatra ce atthi dunnītaṃ, taṃ khamassu khamādhipa..
[21] ``suddhe anūne mama bhikkhusaṅghe, lokā ito nissarituṃ khamante.
[22] padakkhiṇaṃ kacca nipacca pāde, ṭhitā mukhantaṃ samudikkhamānā..
[21] ``na tittipubbaṃ tava dassanena, cakkhuṃ na sotaṃ tava bhāsitena.
[22] cittaṃ mamaṃ kevalamekameva, pappuyya taṃ dhammarasena titti..
[22] ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava..
