[03] ^b^kittayissāmī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0243^ea^ kathayissāmi. paṭijānetvā te kittentī ``akammakāmā alasā''ti tena vuttaṃ dosaṃ tāva nibbeṭhetvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ guṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kammakāmā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kammakāmā^eb^ti vattapaṭivattādibhedaṃ kammaṃ samaṇakiccaṃ paripūraṇavasena kāmenti icchantīti kammakāmā. tattha yuttappayuttā hutvā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya vāyamanato na alasāti ^b^analasā^eb^. taṃ pana kammaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānāvahameva karontīti ^b^kammaseṭṭhassa kārakā^eb^. karontā pana taṃ paṭipattiyā anavajjabhāvato ^b^rāgaṃ dosaṃ pajahanti,^eb^ yathā rāgadosā pahīyanti, evaṃ samaṇā kammaṃ karonti. ^b^tena me samaṇā piyā^eb^ti tena yathāvuttena sammāpaṭipajjanena mayhaṃ samaṇā piyāyitabbāti attho.

[03] ^b^tīṇi pāpassa mūlānī^eb^ti lobhadosamohasaṅkhātāni akusalassa tīṇi mūlāni. ^b^dhunantī^eb^ti nigghātenti, pajahantīti attho. ^b^sucikārino^eb^ti anavajjakammakārino. ^b^sabbaṃ pāpaṃ pahīnesa^eb^nti aggamaggādhigamena esaṃ sabbampi pāpaṃ pahīnaṃ.
[03] evaṃ ``samaṇā sucikārino''ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``kāyakamma''^eb^nti gāthamāha. taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] ^b^vimalā saṅkhamuttāvā^eb^ti sudhotasaṅkhā viya muttā viya ca vigatamalā rāgādimalarahitā. ^b^suddhā santarabāhirā^eb^ti santarañca bāhirañca santarabāhiraṃ. tato santarabāhirato suddhā, suddhāsayapayogāti attho. ^b^puṇṇā sukkāna dhammāna^eb^nti ekantasukkehi anavajjadhammehi paripuṇṇā, asekhehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatāti attho.

[03] suttageyyādibahuṃ ^a^M0.0227^ea^ sutaṃ etesaṃ, sutena vā uppannāti ^b^bahussutā,^eb^ pariyattibāhusaccena paṭivedhabāhusaccena ca samannāgatāti attho. tameva duvidhampi dhammaṃ dhārentīti ^b^dhammadharā^eb^. sattānaṃ ācārasamācārasikkhāpadena arīyantīti ^b^ariyā^eb^. dhammena ñāyena jīvantīti ^b^dhammajīvino. atthaṃ dhammañca desentī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0219^ea^ bhāsitatthañca desanādhammañca kathenti pakāsenti. atha vā atthato anapetaṃ dhammato anapetañca desenti ācikkhanti.

[03] ^b^dūraṅgamā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0244^ea^ araññagatā, manussūpacāraṃ muñcitvā dūraṃ gacchantā, iddhānubhāvena vā yathārucitaṃ dūraṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchantīti dūraṅgamā. mantā vuccati paññā, tāya bhaṇanasīlatāya ^b^mantabhāṇī^eb^. na uddhatāti ^b^anuddhatā,^eb^ uddhaccarahitā vūpasantacittā. ^b^dukkhassantaṃ pajānantī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭivijjhanti.
[03] ^b^na vilokenti kiñcana^eb^nti yato gāmato pakkamanti, tasmiṃ gāme kañci sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā apekkhāvasena na olokenti, atha kho pana anapekkhāva gacchanti pakkamanti.

[03] ^b^na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentī^eb^ti te samaṇā saṃ attano santakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ koṭṭhe na openti na paṭisāmetvā ṭhapenti tādisassa pariggahassa abhāvato. ^b^kumbhi^eb^nti kumbhiyaṃ. ^b^khaḷopiya^eb^nti pacchiyaṃ. ^b^pariniṭṭhitamesānā^eb^ti parakulesu paresaṃ atthāya siddhameva ghāsaṃ pariyesantā.
[03] ^b^hirañña^eb^nti kahāpaṇaṃ. ^b^rūpiya^eb^nti rajataṃ. ^b^paccuppannena yāpentī^eb^ti atītaṃ ananusocantā anāgatañca apaccāsīsantā paccuppannena yāpenti attabhāvaṃ pavattenti.
[03] ^b^aññamaññaṃ pihayantī^eb^ti aññamaññasmiṃ mettiṃ karonti. ``pihāyanti''pi pāṭho, so eva attho.
[03] evaṃ so brāhmaṇo dhītuyā santike bhikkhūnaṃ guṇe sutvā pasannamānaso dhītaraṃ pasaṃsanto ^b^``atthāya vatā''^eb^tiādimāha.
[03] ^b^etthā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0228^ea^ etesu samaṇesu. ^b^yañño^eb^ti dānadhammo. ^b^vipulo^eb^ti vipulaphalo. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] evaṃ brāhmaṇo saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito aparabhāge sañjātasaṃvego pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ^a^V0.0245^ea^ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte ^a^P0.0220^ea^ patiṭṭhāya attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānento ^b^``brahmabandhū''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^laṭṭhihattho pure āsī^eb^tiādikā cāpāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī, anukkamena upacitakusalamūlā sambhatavimokkhasambhārā hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vaṅgahārajanapade aññatarasmiṃ migaluddakagāme jeṭṭhakamigaluddakassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti, ^b^cāpā^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi. tena ca samayena upako ājīvako bodhimaṇḍato dhammacakkaṃ pavattetuṃ bārāṇasiṃ uddissa gacchantena satthārā samāgato ``vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto, kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī''ti (mahāva0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285) pucchitvā --
[22] sabbañjaho taṇhākkhaye vimutto, sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyaṃ.. (dha0 pa0 353; mahāva0 11; kathā0 405; ma0 ni0 1.285).
[21] ``na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] andhībhūtasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, āhañchaṃ amatadundubhi''nti.. (mahāva0 11; kathā0 405; ma0 ni0 1.285) --

[25] satthārā ^a^V0.0246^ea^ attano sabbaññubuddhabhāve dhammacakkapavattane ca pavedite pasannacitto so ``hupeyyapāvuso, arahasi anantajino''ti (mahāva0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285) vatvā ummaggaṃ gahetvā pakkanto vaṅgahārajanapadaṃ ^a^P0.0221^ea^ agamāsi. so tattha ekaṃ migaluddakagāmakaṃ upanissāya vāsaṃ kappesi. taṃ tattha jeṭṭhakamigaluddako upaṭṭhāsi. so ekadivasaṃ dūraṃ migavaṃ gacchanto ``mayhaṃ arahante mā pamajjī''ti attano dhītaraṃ cāpaṃ āṇāpetvā agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi. sā cassa dhītā abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā.

[03] atha kho upako ājīvako bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ migaluddakassa gharaṃ gato parivisituṃ upagataṃ cāpaṃ disvā rāgena abhibhūto bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā ``sace cāpaṃ labhissāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, marissāmī''ti nirāhāro nipajji. sattame divase migaluddako āgantvā dhītaraṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ mayhaṃ arahante na pamajjī''ti? sā ``ekadivasameva āgantvā puna nāgatapubbo''ti āha. migaluddako ca tāvadevassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ``kiṃ, bhante, aphāsuka''nti pāde parimajjanto pucchi. upako nitthunanto parivattatiyeva. so ``vadatha, bhante, yaṃ mayā sakkā kātuṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ karissāmī''ti āha. upako ekena pariyāyena attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocesi. ``itaro jānāsi pana, bhante, kiñci sippa''nti. ``na jānāmī''ti. ``na, bhante, kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharaṃ āvasitu''nti. so āha -- ``nāhaṃ kiñci sippaṃ jānāmi, apica tumhākaṃ maṃsahārako bhavissāmi, maṃsañca vikkiṇissāmī''ti. māgaviko ``amhākampi etadeva ruccatī''ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā attano sahāyakassa gehe katipāhaṃ vasāpetvā tādise divase gharaṃ ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0230^ea^ kāle gacchante tesaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya putto nibbatti, ^b^subhaddo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. cāpā tassa rodanakāle ``upakassa putta, ājīvakassa putta, maṃsahārakassa putta, mā rodi mā rodī''tiādinā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi. so ``mā tvaṃ cāpe maṃ `anātho'ti maññi, atthi me sahāyo anantajino nāma, tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti āha. cāpā ``evamayaṃ aṭṭīyatī''ti ñatvā punappunaṃ tathā kathesiyeva. so ekadivasaṃ tāya tathā vutto kujjhitvā gantumāraddho. tāya taṃ taṃ vatvā anunīyamānopi saññattiṃ anāgacchanto pacchimadisābhimukho pakkāmi.

[03] bhagavā ^a^V0.0247^ea^ ^a^P0.0222^ea^ ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto bhikkhūnaṃ ācikkhi -- ``yo, bhikkhave, ajja `kuhiṃ anantajino'ti idhāgantvā pucchati, taṃ mama santikaṃ pesethā''ti. upakopi ``kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī''ti tattha tattha pucchanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā ``kuhiṃ anantajino''ti pucchi. taṃ bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ nayiṃsu. so bhagavantaṃ disvā ``jānātha maṃ bhagavā''ti āha. ``āma, jānāmi, kuhiṃ pana tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasī''ti? ``vaṅgahārajanapade, bhante''ti. ``upaka, idāni mahallako jāto pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī''ti? ``pabbajissāmi, bhante''ti. satthā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi -- ``ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, imaṃ pabbājehī''ti. so taṃ pabbājesi. so pabbajito satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto na cirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu nibbatto, nibbattakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. avihesu nibbattamattā satta janā arahattaṃ pattā, tesaṃ ayaṃ aññataro. vuttañhetaṃ --
[27] bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bāhuraggi ca siṅgiyo.
[22] te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.105).

[03] upake ^a^M0.0231^ea^ pana pakkante nibbindahadayā cāpā dārakaṃ ayyakassa niyyādetvā pubbe upakena gatamaggaṃ gacchantī sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahatte patiṭṭhitā, attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pubbe upakena attanā ca kathitagāthāyo udānavasena ekajjhaṃ katvā --
[21] ``mā me kujjhi mahāvīra, mā me kujjhi mahāmuni.
[22] na hi kodhaparetassa, suddhi atthi kuto tapo..
[21] ``ehi kāḷa nivattassu, bhuñja kāme yathā pure.
[22] ahañca te vasīkatā, ye ca me santi ñātakā..
[21] ``etto cāpe catubbhāgaṃ, yathā bhāsasi tvañca me.
[22] tayi rattassa posassa, uḷāraṃ vata taṃ siyā..
[22] taṃ maṃ rūpavatiṃ santiṃ, kassa ohāyaṃ gacchasi..
[22] āharimena rūpena, na maṃ tvaṃ bādhayissasi..
[22] taṃ maṃ puttavatiṃ santiṃ, kassa ohāya gacchasi..
[21] ``jahanti ^a^M0.0232^ea^ putte sappaññā, tato ñātī tato dhanaṃ.
[21] ``idāni te imaṃ puttaṃ, daṇḍena churikāya vā.
[22] bhūmiyaṃ vā nisumbhissaṃ, puttasokā na gacchasi..
[21] ``handa kho ^a^P0.0224^ea^ dāni bhaddante, kuhiṃ kāḷa gamissasi.
[21] ``eso hi bhagavā buddho, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati.
[22] tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gacchaṃ, so me satthā bhavissati..
[21] ``etaṃ kho labbhamamhehi, yathā bhāsasi tvañca me.
[27] vandanaṃ dāni te vajjaṃ, lokanāthaṃ anuttaraṃ.
[21] ``tato ca kāḷo pakkāmi, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati.
[22] so addasāsi sambuddhaṃ, desentaṃ amataṃ padaṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0233^ea^ ^b^laṭṭhihattho^eb^ti daṇḍahattho. ^b^pure^eb^ti pubbe paribbājakakāle caṇḍagoṇakukkurādīnaṃ pariharaṇatthaṃ daṇḍaṃ hatthena gahetvā vicaraṇako ahosi. ^b^so dāni migaluddako^eb^ti so idāni migaluddehi saddhiṃ sambhogasaṃvāsehi migaluddo māgaviko jāto. ^b^āsāyā^eb^ti taṇhāya. ``āsayā''tipi pāṭho, ajjhāsayahetūti attho. ^b^palipā^eb^ti kāmapaṅkato diṭṭhipaṅkato ca. ^b^ghorā^eb^ti aviditavipulānatthāvahattā dāruṇato ghorā. ^b^nāsakkhi pārametave^eb^ti tasseva palipassa pārabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ etuṃ gantuṃ na asakkhi, na ^a^P0.0225^ea^ abhisambhunīti attānameva sandhāya upako vadati.

[03] ^b^sumattaṃ maṃ maññamānā^eb^ti attani suṭṭhu mattaṃ madappattaṃ kāmagedhavasena laggaṃ pamattaṃ vā katvā maṃ sallakkhantī. ^b^cāpā puttamatosayī^eb^ti migaluddassa dhītā cāpā ``ājīvakassa puttā''tiādinā maṃ ghaṭṭentī puttaṃ tosesi keḷāyasi. ``supati maṃ maññamānā''ti ca paṭhanti, supatīti maṃ maññamānāti attho. ^b^cāpāya bandhanaṃ chetvā^eb^ti cāpāya tayi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinditvā. ^b^pabbajissaṃ punopaha^eb^nti puna dutiyavārampi ahaṃ pabbajissāmi.

[03] idāni tassā ``mayhaṃ attho natthī''ti vadati, taṃ sutvā cāpā khamāpentī ^b^``mā me kujjhī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^mā me kujjhī^eb^ti keḷikaraṇamattena mā mayhaṃ kujjhi. ^b^mahāvīra, mahāmunī^eb^ti upakaṃ ālapati. tañhi sā pubbepi pabbajito, idānipi pabbajitukāmoti katvā khantiñca paccāsīsantī ``mahāmunī''ti āha. tenevāha -- ^b^``na hi kodhaparetassa, suddhi atthi kuto tapo''^eb^ti, tvaṃ ettakampi asahanto kathaṃ cittaṃ damessasi, kathaṃ vā tapaṃ carissasīti adhippāyo.

[03] atha nāḷaṃ gantvā jīvitukāmosīti cāpāya vutto āha -- ^b^``pakkamissañca nāḷāto, kodha nāḷāya vacchatī''^eb^ti ko idha nāḷāya vasissati, nāḷātova ahaṃ pakkamissāmeva. so hi tassa jātagāmo, tato nikkhamitvā pabbaji. so ca magadharaṭṭhe bodhimaṇḍassa āsannapadese, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^bandhantī itthirūpena, samaṇe dhammajīvino^eb^ti cāpe tvaṃ dhammena jīvante dhammike pabbajite attano itthirūpena itthikuttākappehi bandhantī tiṭṭhasi. yenāhaṃ idāni ediso jāto, tasmā taṃ pariccajāmīti adhippāyo.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0234^ea^ ^a^V0.0251^ea^ ^a^P0.0226^ea^ vutte cāpā taṃ nivattetukāmā ^b^``ehi, kāḷā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- kāḷavaṇṇatāya, ^b^kāḷa,^eb^ upaka, ehi ^b^nivattassu^eb^ mā pakkami, pubbe viya kāme paribhuñja, ahañca ye ca me santi ñātakā, te sabbeva tuyhaṃ mā pakkamitukāmatāya ^b^vasīkatā^eb^ vasavattino katāti.

[03] taṃ sutvā upako ^b^``etto cāpe''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^cāpe^eb^ti cāpe. cāpasadisāṅgalaṭṭhitāya hi sā, cāpāti nāmaṃ labhi, tasmā, cāpāti vuccati. tvaṃ cāpe, yathā bhāsasi, idāni yādisaṃ kathesi, ito ^b^catubbhāga^eb^meva piyasamudācāraṃ kareyyāsi. tayi ^b^rattassa^eb^ rāgābhibhūtassa purisassa uḷāraṃ vata taṃ siyā, ahaṃ panetarahi tayi kāmesu ca viratto, tasmā cāpāya vacane na tiṭṭhāmīti adhippāyo.

[03] puna, cāpā, attani tassa āsattiṃ uppādetukāmā ^b^``kāḷaṅgini''^eb^nti āha. tattha, ^b^kāḷā^eb^ti tassālapanaṃ. ^b^aṅgini^eb^nti aṅgalaṭṭhisampannaṃ. ^b^ivā^eb^ti upamāya nipāto. ^b^takkāriṃ pupphitaṃ girimuddhanī^eb^ti pabbatamuddhani ṭhitaṃ supupphitadālimalaṭṭhiṃ viya. ``ukkāgāri''nti ca keci paṭhanti, aṅgatthilaṭṭhiṃ viyāti attho. girimuddhanīti ca idaṃ kenaci anupahatasobhatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. keci ``kāliṅgini''nti pāṭhaṃ vatvā tassa kumbhaṇḍalatāsadisanti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^phullaṃ dālimalaṭṭhiṃvā^eb^ti pupphitaṃ bījapūralataṃ viya. ^b^antodīpeva pāṭali^eb^nti dīpakabbhantare pupphitapāṭalirukkhaṃ viya, dīpaggahaṇañcettha sobhāpāṭihāriyadassanatthameva.

[03] ^b^haricandanalittaṅgi^eb^nti lohitacandanena anulittasabbaṅgiṃ. ^b^kāsikuttamadhārini^eb^nti uttamakāsikavatthadharaṃ. ^b^taṃ ma^eb^nti tādisaṃ maṃ. ^b^rūpavatiṃ santi^eb^nti rūpasampannaṃ samānaṃ. ^b^kassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0227^ea^ ^b^ohāya gacchasī^eb^ti kassa nāma sattassa, kassa vā hetuno, kena kāraṇena, ohāya pahāya pariccajitvā gacchasi.

[03] ito parampi tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanagāthāva ṭhapetvā pariyosāne tisso gāthā. tattha ^b^sākuntikovā^eb^ti sakuṇaluddo viya. ^b^āharimena rūpenā^eb^ti kesamaṇḍanādinā sarīrajagganena ceva vatthābharaṇādinā ^a^M0.0235^ea^ ca abhisaṅkhārikena rūpena vaṇṇena kittimena cāturiyenāti attho. ^b^na maṃ tvaṃ bādhayissasī^eb^ti pubbe viya idāni maṃ tvaṃ na bādhituṃ sakkhissasi.

[03] ^b^sappaññā^eb^ti paññavanto, saṃsāre ādīnavavibhāviniyā paññāya samannāgatāti adhippāyo. te hi appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ vā pahāya pabbajanti. tenāha -- ^b^``pabbajanti mahāvīrā, nāgo chetvāva bandhana''^eb^nti, ayabandhanaṃ viya hatthināgo gihibandhanaṃ chinditvā mahāvīriyāva pabbajanti, na nihīnavīriyāti attho.

[03] ^b^daṇḍenā^eb^ti yena kenaci daṇḍena. ^b^churikāyā^eb^ti khurena. ^b^bhūmiyaṃ vā nisumbhissa^eb^nti pathaviyaṃ pātetvā pothanavijjhanādinā vibādhissāmi. ^b^puttasokā na gacchasī^eb^ti puttasokanimittaṃ na gacchissasi.
[03] ^b^padāhisī^eb^ti dassasi. ^b^puttakatte^eb^ti puttakāraṇā. ^b^jammī^eb^ti tassā ālapanaṃ, lāmaketi attho.
[03] idāni tassa gamanaṃ anujānitvā gamanaṭṭhānaṃ jānituṃ ^b^``handa kho''^eb^ti gāthamāha.

[03] itaro pubbe ahaṃ aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsiṃ, idāni pana niyyānike anantajinassa sāsane ṭhātukāmo, tasmā tassa santikaṃ gamissāmīti dassento ^b^``ahumhā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gaṇino^eb^ti gaṇadharā. ^b^assamaṇā^eb^ti na samitapāpā. ^b^samaṇamānino^eb^ti samitapāpāti evaṃ saññino. ^b^vicarimhā^eb^ti pūraṇādīsu attānaṃ pakkhipitvā vadati.

[03] ^b^nerañjaraṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0228^ea^ ^b^patī^eb^ti nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpe tassā tīre. ^b^buddho^eb^ti abhisambodhiṃ patto, abhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammaṃ desento sabbakālaṃ bhagavā tattheva vasīti adhippāyena vadati.

[03] ^b^vandanaṃ dāni me vajjāsī^eb^ti mama vandanaṃ vadeyyāsi, mama vacanena lokanāthaṃ anuttaraṃ vadeyyāsīti attho. ^b^padakkhiṇañca katvāna, ādiseyyāsi dakkhiṇa^eb^nti buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvāpi catūsu ṭhānesu ^a^M0.0236^ea^ vanditvā, tato puññato mayhaṃ pattidānaṃ dento padakkhiṇaṃ ādiseyyāsi buddhaguṇānaṃ sutapubbattā hetusampannatāya ca evaṃ vadati.

[03] ^b^etaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ^b^kho labbhamamhehī^eb^ti etaṃ padakkhiṇakaraṇaṃ puññaṃ amhehi tava dātuṃ sakkā, na nivattanaṃ, pubbe viya kāmūpabhogo ca na sakkāti adhippāyo. ^b^te vajja^eb^nti tava vandanaṃ vajjaṃ vakkhāmi.
[03] satthudesanāyaṃ saccakathāya padhānattā tabbinimuttāya abhāvato ^b^``dukkha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^petāni bhoti puttānī^eb^tiādikā sundariyā theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī ito ekatiṃsakappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānasā bhikkhaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. satthā tassā cittappasādaṃ ñatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. sā tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā tattha ^a^P0.0229^ea^ yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cutā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantī paripakkañāṇā hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ sujātassa nāma brāhmaṇassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti. tassā rūpasampattiyā ^b^sundarī^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. vayappattakāle cassā kaniṭṭhabhātā kālamakāsi. athassā pitā puttasokena abhibhūto tattha tattha vicaranto vāsiṭṭhittheriyā samāgantvā taṃ sokavinodanakāraṇaṃ pucchanto ``petāni bhoti puttānī''tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi. therī taṃ sokābhibhūtaṃ ñatvā sokaṃ vinodetukāmā ``bahūni puttasatānī''tiādikā dve gāthā vatvā attano asokabhāvaṃ kathesi. taṃ ^a^M0.0237^ea^ sutvā brāhmaṇo ``kathaṃ tvaṃ, ayye, evaṃ asokā jātā''ti āha. tassa therī ratanattayaguṇaṃ kathesi.

[03] atha brāhmaṇo ``kuhiṃ satthā''ti pucchitvā ``idāni mithilāyaṃ viharatī''ti taṃ sutvā tāvadeva rathaṃ yojetvā rathena mithilaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ^a^V0.0254^ea^ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto tatiye divase arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. atha sārathi rathaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiyā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. sundarī attano pitu pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā, ``amma, ahampi pabbajissāmī''ti mātaraṃ āpucchi. mātā ``yaṃ imasmiṃ gehe bhogajātaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ tuyhaṃ santakaṃ, tvaṃ imassa kulassa dāyādikā paṭipajja, imaṃ sabbabhogaṃ paribhuñja, mā pabbajī''ti āha. sā ``na mayhaṃ bhogehi attho, pabbajissāmevāhaṃ, ammā''ti mātaraṃ anujānāpetvā mahatiṃ sampattiṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍetvā pabbaji. pabbajitvā ca sikkhamānāyeva hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ghaṭentī vāyamantī hetusampannatāya ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ --
[22] vīthiyā saṇṭhito satthā, akā me anumodanaṃ..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca viharantī aparabhāge ``satthu purato sīhanādaṃ nadissāmī''ti upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā sambahulāhi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ anukkamena sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā satthārā katapaṭisanthārā satthu orasadhītubhāvādivibhāvanena aññaṃ byākāsi. athassā mātaraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbo ñātigaṇo parijano ca pabbaji. sā aparabhāge attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pitarā vuttagāthaṃ ādiṃ katvā udānavasena --
[22] tuvaṃ divā ca ratto ca, atīva paritappasi..
[22] vāseṭṭhi ^a^P0.0231^ea^ kena vaṇṇena, na bāḷhaṃ paritappasi..
[22] na socāmi na rodāmi, na cāpi paritappayiṃ..
[22] kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya, giraṃ bhāsasi edisiṃ..
[22] appeva maṃ so bhagavā, sabbadukkhā pamocaye..
[22] sujāto tīhi rattīhi, tisso vijjā aphassayi..
[27] ārogyaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ vajja, pabbaji dāni brāhmaṇo.
[22] sujāto tīhi rattīhi, tisso vijjā aphassayi..
[22] sujāto tīhi rattīhi, tisso vijjā aphassayi..
[22] tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sutvā, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāmi te..
[27] pitā pabbajito tuyhaṃ, bhuñja bhogāni sundarī.
[21] ``hatthī ^a^M0.0240^ea^ gavassaṃ maṇikuṇḍalañca, rammaṃ cimaṃ gahavibhavaṃ pahāya.
[21] ``so te ijjhatu saṅkappo, yaṃ tvaṃ patthesi sundarī.
[22] pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmi, yattha me vusitaṃ pure..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] sāvikā te mahāvīra, pāde vandati sundarī..
[21] ``tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuyhaṃ dhītāmhi brāhmaṇa.
[21] ``tassā te svāgataṃ bhadde, tato te adurāgataṃ.
[27] evañhi dantā āyanti, satthu pādāni vandikā.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0241^ea^ ^b^petānī^eb^ti matāni. ^b^bhotī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0233^ea^ taṃ ālapati. ^b^puttānī^eb^ti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, pete putteti attho. eko eva ca tassā putto mato, brāhmaṇo pana ``cirakālaṃ ayaṃ sokena aṭṭā hutvā vicari, bahū maññe imissā puttā matā''ti evaṃsaññī hutvā bahuvacanenāha. tathā ca ``sājja sabbāni khāditvā sataputtānī''ti. ^b^khādamānā^eb^ti lokavohāravasena khuṃsanavacanametaṃ. loke hi yassā itthiyā jātajātā puttā maranti, taṃ garahantā ``puttakhādinī''tiādiṃ vadanti. ^b^atīvā^eb^ti ativiya bhusaṃ. ^b^paritappasī^eb^ti santappasi, pureti yojanā. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- bhoti vāseṭṭhi, pubbe tvaṃ mataputtā hutvā socantī paridevantī ativiya sokāya samappitā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo āhiṇḍasi.
[03] ^b^sājjā^eb^ti sā ajja, sā tvaṃ etarahīti attho. ``sajjā''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^kena vaṇṇenā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena.

[03] ^b^khāditānī^eb^ti therīpi brāhmaṇena vuttapariyāyeneva vadati. khāditāni vā byagghadīpibiḷārādijātiyo sandhāyevamāha. ^b^atītaṃse^eb^ti atītakoṭṭhāse, atikkantabhavesūti attho. ^b^mama tuyhañcā^eb^ti mayā ca tayā ca.

[03] ^b^nissaraṇaṃ ñatvā jātiyā maraṇassa cā^eb^ti jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ nissaraṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ maggañāṇena ^a^V0.0259^ea^ paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^na cāpi paritappayi^eb^nti na cāpi upāyāsāsiṃ, ahaṃ upāyāsaṃ na āpajjinti attho.

[03] ^b^abbhutaṃ vatā^eb^ti acchariyaṃ vata. tañhi abbhutaṃ pubbe abhūtaṃ abbhutanti vuccati. ^b^edisi^eb^nti evarūpiṃ, ``na socāmi na rodāmi, na cāpi paritappayi''nti evaṃ socanādīnaṃ abhāvadīpaniṃ vācaṃ. ^b^kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti kevalaṃ yathā ediso dhammo laddhuṃ na sakkā, tasmā kassa nāma satthuno dhammamaññāya giraṃ bhāsasi edisanti satthāraṃ sāsanañca pucchati.
[03] ^b^vippamutta^eb^nti ^a^M0.0242^ea^ sabbaso vimuttaṃ, sabbakilesehi sabbabhavehi ca visaṃyuttaṃ. ^b^svassā^eb^ti so sammāsambuddho assa brāhmaṇassa.
[03] ^b^sahassañcāpī^eb^ti maggaparibbayatthaṃ nītaṃ kahāpaṇasahassañcāpi ādāya niyyādehīti yojanā.

[03] evaṃ brāhmaṇiyā tuṭṭhidāne diyyamāne taṃ asampaṭicchanto sārathi ``tuyheva hotū''ti gāthaṃ vatvā satthu santikameva gantvā pabbaji. pabbajite pana sārathimhi brāhmaṇī attano dhītaraṃ sundariṃ āmantetvā gharāvāse niyojentī ^b^``hatthī gavassa''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^hatthī^eb^ti hatthino. ^b^gavassa^eb^nti gāvo ca assā ca. ^b^maṇikuṇḍalañcā^eb^ti maṇi ca kuṇḍalāni ca. ^b^phītañcimaṃ gahavibhavaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti imaṃ hatthiādippabhedaṃ yathāvuttaṃ avuttañca khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇādibhedaṃ phītaṃ pahūtañca gahavibhavaṃ gehūpakaraṇaṃ aññañca dāsidāsādikaṃ sabbaṃ ^a^V0.0260^ea^ pahāya tava pitā pabbajito. ^b^bhuñja bhogāni sundarī^eb^ti sundari, tvaṃ ime bhoge bhuñjassu. ^b^tuvaṃ dāyādikā kule^eb^ti tuvañhi imasmiṃ kule dāyajjārahāti.
[03] taṃ sutvā sundarī attano nekkhammajjhāsayaṃ pakāsentī ^b^``hatthīgavassa''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] atha naṃ mātā nekkhammeyeva niyojentī ^b^``so te ijjhatū''^eb^tiādinā diyaḍḍhagāthamāha. tattha ^b^yaṃ tvaṃ patthesi sundarī^eb^ti sundari tvaṃ idāni yaṃ patthesi ākaṅkhasi. so tava pabbajjāya ^b^saṅkappo^eb^ pabbajjāya chando ^b^ijjhatu^eb^ anantarāyena sijjhatu. ^b^uttiṭṭhapiṇḍo^eb^ti ^a^P0.0235^ea^ ghare ghare patiṭṭhitvā laddhabbabhikkhāpiṇḍo. ^b^uñcho^eb^ti tadatthaṃ gharapaṭipāṭiyā āhiṇḍanaṃ uddissa ṭhānañca. ^b^etānī^eb^ti uttiṭṭhapiṇḍādīni. ^b^abhisambhontī^eb^ti anibbinnarūpā jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya abhisambhavantī, sādhentīti attho.

[03] atha sundarī ``sādhu, ammā''ti mātuyā paṭissuṇitvā nikkhamitvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā sikkhamānāyeva samānā tisso vijjā sacchikatvā ``satthu ^a^M0.0243^ea^ santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti upajjhāyaṃ ārocetvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``sikkhamānāya me, ayye''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^sikkhamānāya me^eb^ti sikkhamānāya samānāya mayā. ^b^ayye^eb^ti attano upajjhāyaṃ ālapati.

[03] ^b^tuvaṃ nissāya kalyāṇi, theri saṅghassa sobhane^eb^ti bhikkhunisaṅghe vuddhatarabhāvena thiraguṇayogena ca saṅghattheri sobhanehi sīlādīhi samannāgatattā sobhane kalyāṇi kalyāṇamitte, ayye, taṃ nissāya mayā tisso vijjā anuppattā kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti yojanā.
[03] ^b^icche^eb^ti icchāmi. ^b^sāvatthi gantave^eb^ti sāvatthiṃ gantuṃ. ^b^sīhanādaṃ nadissāmī^eb^ti aññābyākaraṇameva sandhāyāha.

[03] atha sundarī anukkamena sāvatthiṃ gantvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammāsane nisinnaṃ disvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayamānā attānameva ālapantī āha ^b^``passa sundarī''^eb^ti. ^b^hemavaṇṇa^eb^nti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^harittaca^eb^nti kañcanasannibhattacaṃ. ettha ca bhagavā pītavaṇṇena ``suvaṇṇavaṇṇo''ti vuccati. atha kho sammadeva ghaṃsitvā jātihiṅgulakena anulimpitvā ^a^V0.0261^ea^ suparimajjitakañcanādāsasannibhoti dassetuṃ ``hemavaṇṇa''nti vatvā ``harittaca''nti vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^passa sundarimāyanti^eb^nti taṃ sundarināmikaṃ maṃ bhagavā āgacchanti passa. ^b^``vippamutta''^eb^ntiādinā aññaṃ byākarontī pītivipphāravasena vadati.

[03] kuto pana āgatā, kattha ca āgatā, kīdisā cāyaṃ sundarīti āsaṅkantānaṃ ^a^P0.0236^ea^ āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ ``bārāṇasito''ti gāthaṃ vatvā tattha ``sāvikā cā''ti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``tuvaṃ buddho''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- imasmiṃ sadevake loke tuvameveko sabbaññubuddho, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsanato tuvaṃ me ^b^satthā,^eb^ ahañca khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇī bhagavā tuyhaṃ ure vāyāma janitābhijātitāya ^b^orasā,^eb^ mukhato pavattadhammaghosena sāsanassa ca mukhabhūtena ariyamaggena jātattā ^b^mukhato jātā,^eb^ niṭṭhitapariññātādikaraṇīyatāya ^b^katakiccā,^eb^ sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepitattā ^b^anāsavā^eb^ti.

[03] athassā ^a^M0.0244^ea^ satthā āgamanaṃ abhinandanto ^b^``tassā te svāgata''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- yā tvaṃ mayā adhigataṃ dhammaṃ yāthāvato adhigacchi. tassā te, ^b^bhadde^eb^ sundari, idha mama santike āgataṃ āgamanaṃ suāgataṃ. tato eva taṃ ^b^adurāgataṃ^eb^ na durāgataṃ hoti. kasmā? yasmā ^b^evañhi dantā āyantī^eb^ti, yathā tvaṃ sundari, evañhi uttamena ariyamaggadamathena dantā tato eva sabbadhi ^b^vītarāgā,^eb^ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā ^b^visaṃyuttā^eb^ katakiccā anāsavā satthu pādānaṃ vandikā āgacchanti, tasmā tassā te svāgataṃ adurāgatanti yojanā.

[03] ^b^daharāha^eb^ntiādikā subhāya kammāradhītāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī anukkamena sambhāvitakusalamūlā upacitavimokkhasambhārā sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantī paripakkañāṇā hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa suvaṇṇakārassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti, rūpasampattisobhāya ^a^V0.0262^ea^ ^b^subhā^eb^ti tassā nāmaṃ ahosi. sā anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā, satthu rājagahappavesane ^a^P0.0237^ea^ satthari sañjātappasādā ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. satthā tassā indriyaparipākaṃ disvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ catusaccagabbhadhammaṃ desesi. sā tāvadeva sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. sā aparabhāge gharāvāse dosaṃ disvā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā santike pabbajitvā bhikkhunisīle patiṭṭhitā uparimaggatthāya bhāvanamanuyuñji. taṃ ñātakā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kāmehi nimantentā pahūtadhanaṃ vibhavajātañca dassetvā palobhenti. sā ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gharāvāsesu kāmesu ca ādīnavaṃ pakāsentī ``daharāha''ntiādīhi catuvīsatiyā gāthāhi dhammaṃ kathetvā te nirāse katvā vissajjetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī indriyāni pariyodapentī ^a^M0.0245^ea^ bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. arahattaṃ pana patvā --
[21] ``rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, na bodhāya na santiyā.
[22] sāsaṅkaṃ bahuāyāsaṃ, natthi cettha dhuvaṃ ṭhiti..
[21] ``taṃ maṃ ñātī amittāva, kiṃ vo kāmesu yuñjatha.
[21] ``taṃ maṃ ñātī amittāva, kiṃ vo kāmesu yuñjatha.
[21] ``vantā mahesīhi kāmā, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
[22] khemaṭṭhāne vimuttā te, pattā te acalaṃ sukhaṃ..
[21] ``māhaṃ kāmehi saṃgacchiṃ, yesu tāṇaṃ na vijjati.
[22] pariyantaṃ na jānanti, jātiyā maraṇassa ca..
[22] taṃ maggaṃ anugacchāmi, yena tiṇṇā mahesino..
[22] namassati bhūtapati, subhaṃ kammāradhītara''nti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^daharāhaṃ suddhavasanā, yaṃ pure dhammamassuṇi^eb^nti yasmā ahaṃ pubbe daharā taruṇī eva suddhavasanā suddhavatthanivatthā alaṅkatappaṭiyattā satthu santike dhammaṃ assosiṃ. ^b^tassā me appamattāya, saccābhisamayo ahū^eb^ti yasmā ca tassā me mayhaṃ yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā appamattāya upaṭṭhitassatiyā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantiyāva catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo ``idaṃ dukkha''ntiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.32) paṭivedho ahosi.

[03] ^b^tatohaṃ sabbakāmesu, bhusaṃ aratimajjhaga^eb^nti tato tena kāraṇena satthu santike dhammassa sutattā saccānañca abhisamitattā manussesu dibbesu cāti sabbesupi kāmesu bhusaṃ ativiya aratiṃ ukkaṇṭhiṃ adhigacchiṃ. ^b^sakkāyasmiṃ^eb^ upādānakkhandhapañcake, ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ sappaṭibhayabhāvaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā disvā, ^b^nekkhammameva^eb^ pabbajjaṃ nibbānameva, ^b^pīhaye^eb^ pihayāmi patthayāmi.

[03] ^b^dāsakammakarāni cā^eb^ti dāse ca kammakāre ca, liṅgavipallāsena ^a^P0.0240^ea^ hetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^gāmakhettānī^eb^ti gāme ca pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaviruhanakkhettāni ca, gāmapariyāpannāni vā khettāni. ^b^phītānī^eb^ti samiddhāni. ^b^ramaṇīye^eb^ti manuññe. ^b^pamodite^eb^ti pamudite, bhogakkhandhe hitvāti sambandho. ^b^sāpateyya^eb^nti santakaṃ dhanaṃ, maṇikanakarajatādipariggahavatthuṃ. ^b^anappaka^eb^nti mahantaṃ, pahāyāti yojanā. ^b^evaṃ saddhāya nikkhammā^eb^ti ``hitvānahaṃ ñātigaṇa''ntiādinā vuttappakārena ^a^M0.0248^ea^ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya kammakammaphalāni ratanattayañcāti saddheyyavatthuṃ ^a^V0.0266^ea^ saddhāya saddahitvā gharato nikkhamma, ^b^saddhamme suppavedite^eb^ sammāsambuddhena suṭṭhu pavedite ariyavinaye ahaṃ pabbajitā.

[03] evaṃ pabbajitāya pana ^b^netaṃ assa patirūpaṃ,^eb^ yadidaṃ chaḍḍitānaṃ kāmānaṃ paccāgamanaṃ. ^b^ākiñcaññañhi patthaye^eb^ti ahaṃ akiñcanabhāvaṃ apariggahabhāvameva patthayāmi. ^b^yo jātarūparajataṃ, chaḍḍetvā punarāgame^eb^ti yo puggalo suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ aññampi vā kiñci dhanajātaṃ chaḍḍetvā puna taṃ gaṇheyya, so paṇḍitānaṃ antare kathaṃ sīsaṃ ukkhipeyya?

[03] yasmā ^b^rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, na bodhāya na santiyā^eb^ na maggañāṇāya na nibbānāya hotīti attho. ^b^netaṃ samaṇasāruppa^eb^nti etaṃ jātarūparajatādipariggahavatthu, tassa vā pariggaṇhanaṃ samaṇānaṃ sāruppaṃ na hoti. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``na kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajata''ntiādi (cūḷava0 446). ^b^na etaṃ ariyaddhana^eb^nti etaṃ yathāvuttapariggahavatthu saddhādidhanaṃ viya ariyadhammamayampi dhanaṃ na hoti, na ariyabhāvāvahato. tenāha ``lobhana''ntiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^lobhana^eb^nti lobhuppādanaṃ. ^b^madana^eb^nti madāvahaṃ. ^b^mohana^eb^nti sammohajananaṃ. ^b^rajavaḍḍhana^eb^nti rāgarajādisaṃvaḍḍhanaṃ. yena pariggahitaṃ, tassa āsaṅkāvahattā saha ^a^P0.0241^ea^ āsaṅkāya vattatīti ^b^sāsaṅkaṃ,^eb^ yena pariggahitaṃ, tassa yato kuto āsaṅkāvahanti attho. ^b^bahuāyāsa^eb^nti sajjanarakkhaṇādivasena bahuparissamaṃ. ^b^natthi cettha dhuvaṃ ṭhitī^eb^ti etasmiṃ dhane dhuvabhāvo ca ṭhitibhāvo ca natthi, cañcalamanavaṭṭhitamevāti attho.

[03] ^b^ettha rattā pamattā cā^eb^ti etasmiṃ dhane rattā sañjātarāgā dasakusaladhammesu satiyā vippavāsena pamattā. ^b^saṃkiliṭṭhamanā^eb^ lobhādisaṃkilesena saṃkiliṭṭhacittāva nāma honti. tato ca ^b^aññamaññamhi byāruddhā, puthū kubbanti medhagaṃ^eb^ antamaso mātāpi puttena, puttopi mātarāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭiruddhā hutvā puthū sattā medhagaṃ kalahaṃ ^a^M0.0249^ea^ karonti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ...pe0... mātāpi puttena vivadati puttopi mātarā vivadatī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.168, 178).

[03] ^b^vadho^eb^ti maraṇaṃ. ^b^bandho^eb^ti addubandhanādibandhanaṃ. ^b^parikleso^eb^ti hatthacchedādiparikilesāpatti. ^b^jānī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0267^ea^ dhanajāni ceva parivārajāni ca. ^b^sokapariddavo^eb^ti soko ca paridevo ca. ^b^adhipannāna^eb^nti ajjhositānaṃ. ^b^dissate byasanaṃ bahu^eb^nti yathāvuttavadhabandhanādibhedaṃ avuttañca domanassupāyāsādiṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca bahuṃ bahuvidhaṃ byasanaṃ anattho kāmesu dissateva.

[03] ^b^taṃ maṃ ñātī amittāva, kiṃ vo kāmesu yuñjathā^eb^ti tādisaṃ maṃ yathā kāmesu virattaṃ tumhe ñātī ñātakā samānā anatthakāmā amittā viya kiṃ kena kāraṇena kāmesu yuñjatha niyojetha. ^b^jānātha maṃ pabbajitaṃ, kāmesu bhayadassini^eb^nti kāme bhayato passantiṃ pabbajitaṃ maṃ ājānātha, kiṃ ettakaṃ tumhehi anaññātanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^na hiraññasuvaṇṇena, parikkhīyanti āsavā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0242^ea^ kāmāsavādayo hiraññasuvaṇṇena na kadāci parikkhayaṃ gacchanti, atha kho tehi eva parivaḍḍhanteva. tenāha -- ^b^``amittā vadhakā kāmā, sapattā sallabandhanā''^eb^ti. kāmā hi ahitāvahattā mettiyā abhāvena ^b^amittā,^eb^ maraṇahetutāya ukkhittāsikavadhakasadisattā ^b^vadhakā,^eb^ anubandhitvāpi anatthāvahanatāya verānubandhasapattasadisattā ^b^sapattā,^eb^ rāgādīnaṃ sallānaṃ bandhanato ^b^sallabandhanā^eb^.
[03] ^b^muṇḍa^eb^nti muṇḍitakesaṃ. tattha tattha nantakāni gahetvā saṅghāṭicīvarapārupanena ^b^saṅghāṭipārutaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^uttiṭṭhapiṇḍo^eb^ti vivaṭadvāre ghare ghare patiṭṭhitvā labhanakapiṇḍo. ^b^uñcho^eb^ti tadatthaṃ uñchācariyā. ^b^anagārūpanissayo^eb^ti anagārānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ upagantvā nissitabbato upanissayabhūto jīvitaparikkhāro. tañhi nissāya pabbajitā jīvanti.

[03] ^b^vantā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0250^ea^ chaḍḍitā. ^b^mahesīhī^eb^ti buddhādīhi mahesīhi. ^b^khemaṭṭhāne^eb^ti kāmayogādīhi anupaddavaṭṭhānabhūte nibbāne. ^b^te^eb^ti mahesayo. ^b^acalaṃ sukha^eb^nti nibbānasukhaṃ pattā. tasmā taṃ patthentena kāmā pariccajitabbāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^māhaṃ kāmehi saṃgacchi^eb^nti ahaṃ kadācipi kāmehi na samāgaccheyyaṃ. kasmāti ce āha ^a^V0.0268^ea^ -- ^b^``yesu tāṇaṃ na vijjatī''^eb^tiādi, yesu kāmesu upaparikkhiyamānesu ekasmimpi anatthaparittāṇaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^aggikkhandhūpamā^eb^ mahābhitāpaṭṭhena. ^b^dukhā^eb^ dukkhamaṭṭhena.

[03] ^b^paripantho esa bhayo^eb^ yadidaṃ kāmā nāma aviditavipulānatthāvahattā. ^b^savighāto^eb^ cittavighātakarattā. ^b^sakaṇṭako^eb^ vinivijjhanattā. ^b^gedho suvisamo ceso^eb^ti giddhihetutāya gedho. suṭṭhu visamo mahāpalibodho so. duratikkamanaṭṭhena ^b^mahanto. mohanāmukho^eb^ mucchāpattihetuto.
[03] ^b^upasaggo bhīmarūpo^eb^ti atibhiṃsanakasabhāvo, mahanto ^a^P0.0243^ea^ devatūpasaggo viya anatthakādidukkhāvahanato. ^b^sappasirūpamā kāmā^eb^ sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena.

[03] ^b^duggatigamanaṃ magga^eb^nti nirayādiapāyagāminaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^kāmahetuka^eb^nti kāmopabhogahetukaṃ. ^b^bahu^eb^nti pāṇātipātādibhedena bahuvidhaṃ. ^b^rogamāvaha^eb^nti rujjanaṭṭhena rogasaṅkhātassa diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa dukkhassa āvahanakaṃ.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti ``amittā vadhakā''tiādinā vuttappakārena. ^b^amittajananā^eb^ti amittabhāvassa nibbattanakā. ^b^tāpanā^eb^ti santāpanakā, tapanīyāti attho. ^b^saṃkilesikā^eb^ti saṃkilesāvahā. ^b^lokāmisā^eb^ti loke āmisabhūtā. ^b^bandhaniyā^eb^ti bandhabhūtehi saṃyojanehi vaḍḍhitabbā, saṃyojaniyāti attho. ^b^maraṇabandhanā^eb^ti bhavādīsu nibbattinimittatāya pavattakāraṇato ca maraṇavibandhanā.

[03] ^b^ummādanā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0251^ea^ vipariṇāmadhammānaṃ viyogavasena sokummādakarā, vaḍḍhiyā vā uparūparimadāvahā. ^b^ullapanā^eb^ti ``aho sukhaṃ aho sukha''nti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ lapāpanakā. ``ullolanā''tipi pāṭho, bhattapiṇḍanimittaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ ullolento sunakho viya āmisahetu satte uparūparilālanā, parābhavāvaññātapāpanakāti attho. ^b^cittappamāthino^eb^ti pariḷāhuppādanādinā sampati āyatiñca cittassa pamathanasīlā. ``cittappamaddino''ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. ye pana ``cittappamādino''ti vadanti, tesaṃ cittassa pamādāvahāti attho. ^b^saṃkilesāyā^eb^ti vibādhanāya ^a^V0.0269^ea^ upatāpanāya vā. ^b^khippaṃ mārena oḍḍita^eb^nti kāmā nāmete mārena oḍḍitaṃ kuminanti daṭṭhabbā sattānaṃ anatthāvahanato.

[03] ^b^anantādīnavā^eb^ti ``lobhanaṃ madanañceta''ntiādinā, ``idha sītassa purakkhato uṇhassa purakkhato''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.167) ca dukkhakkhandhasuttādīsu vuttanayena apariyantādīnavā bahudosā. ^b^bahudukkhā^eb^ti āpāyikādibahuvidhadukkhānubandhā. ^b^mahāvisā^eb^ti kaṭukāsayhaphalatāya halāhalādimahāvisasadisā ^a^P0.0244^ea^. ^b^appassādā^eb^ti satthadhārāgatamadhubindu viya parittassādā. ^b^raṇakarā^eb^ti sārāgādisaṃvaḍḍhakā. ^b^sukkapakkhavisosanā^eb^ti sattānaṃ anavajjakoṭṭhāsassa vināsakā.

[03] ^b^sāha^eb^nti sā ahaṃ, heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ṭhitāti attho. ^b^etādisa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ vuttappakāraṃ. ^b^katvā^eb^ti iti katvā, yathāvuttakāraṇenāti attho. ^b^na taṃ paccāgamissāmī^eb^ti taṃ mayā pubbe vantakāme puna na paribhuñjissāmi. ^b^nibbānābhiratā sadā^eb^ti yasmā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakālaṃ nibbānābhiratā, tasmā na taṃ paccāgamissāmīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^raṇaṃ taritvā kāmāna^eb^nti kāmānaṃ raṇaṃ taritvā, tañca mayā kātabbaṃ ariyamaggasaṃpahāraṃ katvā. ^b^sītibhāvābhikaṅkhinī^eb^ti sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena sītibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ abhikaṅkhantī. ^b^sabbasaṃyojanakkhaye^eb^ti sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūte nibbāne abhiratā.
[03] ^b^yena^eb^ ^a^M0.0252^ea^ ^b^tiṇṇā mahesino^eb^ti yena ariyamaggena buddhādayo mahesino saṃsāramahoghaṃ tiṇṇā, ahampi tehi gatamaggaṃ anugacchāmi, sīlādipaṭipattiyā anupāpuṇāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^dhammaṭṭha^eb^nti ariyaphaladhamme ṭhitaṃ. ^b^aneja^eb^nti paṭippassaddha ejatāya anejanti laddhanāmaṃ aggaphalaṃ. ^b^upasampajjā^eb^ti sampādetvā aggamaggādhigamena adhigantvā. ^b^jhāyatī^eb^ti tameva phalajjhānaṃ upanijjhāyati.

[03] ^b^ajjaṭṭhamī pabbajitā^eb^ti pabbajitā hutvā pabbajitato paṭṭhāya ajja aṭṭhamadivaso, ito atīte ^a^V0.0270^ea^ aṭṭhamiyaṃ pabbajitāti attho. ^b^saddhā^eb^ti saddhāsampannā. ^b^saddhammasobhanā^eb^ti saddhammādhigamena sobhanā.
[03] imā kira tisso gāthā pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase arahattaṃ patvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnaṃ theriṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassetvā pasaṃsantena bhagavatā vuttā.

[03] atha sakko devānamindo taṃ pavattiṃ dibbena cakkhunā disvā ``evaṃ satthārā pasaṃsīyamānā ayaṃ therī yasmā devehi ca payirupāsitabbā''ti tāvadeva tāvatiṃsehi devehi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. taṃ sandhāya saṅgītikārehi vuttaṃ --

[03] tattha tīsu kāmabhavesu bhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ pati issaroti katvā ^b^bhūtapatī^eb^ti laddhanāmo sakko devarājā devasaṅghena saddhiṃ taṃ subhaṃ kammāradhītaraṃ attano deviddhiyā upasaṅkamma namassati, pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandatīti attho.

[03] tiṃsanipāte ^a^V0.0271^ea^ ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ^b^jīvakambavanaṃ ramma^eb^ntiādikā subhāya jīvakambavanikāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī, sambhāvitakusalamūlā anukkamena paribrūhitavimokkhasambhārā paripakkañāṇā hutvā, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, ^b^subhā^eb^tissā nāmamahosi. tassā kira sarīrāvayavā sobhanavaṇṇayuttā ahesuṃ, tasmā subhāti anvatthameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. sā satthu rājagahappavesane paṭiladdhasaddhā upāsikā hutvā aparabhāge saṃsāre jātasaṃvegā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā nekkhammañca khemato ^a^P0.0246^ea^ sallakkhantī mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī katipāheneva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ aññataro rājagahavāsī dhuttapuriso taruṇo paṭhamayobbane ṭhito jīvakambavane divāvihārāya gacchantiṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā maggaṃ ovaranto kāmehi nimantesi. sā tassa nānappakārehi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ attano ca nekkhammajjhāsayaṃ pavedentī dhammaṃ kathesi. so dhammakathaṃ sutvāpi na paṭikkamati, nibandhatiyeva. therī naṃ attano vacane atiṭṭhantaṃ akkhimhi ca abhirattaṃ disvā, ``handa, tayā sambhāvitaṃ akkhi''nti attano ekaṃ akkhiṃ uppāṭetvā tassa upanesi. tato so puriso santāso saṃvegajāto tattha vigatarāgova hutvā theriṃ khamāpetvā gato. therī satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. satthuno saha dassanenevassā akkhi paṭipākatikaṃ ahosi. tato sā buddhagatāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭā hutvā aṭṭhāsi. satthā tassā cittācāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desetvā aggamaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. sā pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharantī attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā attanā tena ca dhuttapurisena vuttagāthā udānavasena --
[21] ``kiṃ te aparādhitaṃ mayā, yaṃ maṃ ovariyāna tiṭṭhasi.
[22] na hi pabbajitāya āvuso, puriso samphusanāya kappati..
[21] ``garuke mama satthusāsane, yā sikkhā sugatena desitā.
[22] parisuddhapadaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ, kiṃ maṃ ovariyāna tiṭṭhasi..
[22] sabbattha vimuttamānasaṃ, kiṃ maṃ ovariyāna tiṭṭhasi..
[21] ``daharā ^a^P0.0247^ea^ ca apāpikā casi, kiṃ te pabbajjā karissati.
[22] nikkhipa kāsāyacīvaraṃ, ehi ramāma supupphite vane..
[22] paṭhamavasanto sukho utu, ehi ramāma supupphite vane..
[22] kā tuyhaṃ rati bhavissati, yadi ekā vanamogahissasi..
[21] ``ahaṃ tava vasānugo siyaṃ, yadi viharemase kānanantare.
[22] na hi matthi tayā piyattaro, pāṇo kinnarimandalocane..
[21] ``yadi ^a^V0.0273^ea^ me vacanaṃ karissasi, sukhitā ehi agāramāvasa.
[22] kañcanamaṇimuttakaṃ bahuṃ, vividhaṃ ābharaṇaṃ karomi te..
[22] evaṃ ^a^P0.0248^ea^ tvaṃ brahmacārinī, sakesaṅgesu jaraṃ gamissasi..
[22] bhedanadhamme kaḷevare, yaṃ disvā vimano udikkhasi..
[22] tava me nayanāni dakkhiya, bhiyyo kāmaratī pavaḍḍhati..
[22] tava me nayanāni dakkhiya, bhiyyo kāmaguṇo pavaḍḍhati..
[22] na hi matthi tayā piyattaro, nayanā kinnarimandalocane..
[22] meruṃ laṅghetumicchasi, yo tvaṃ buddhasutaṃ maggayasi..
[21] ``natthi hi loke sadevake, rāgo yatthapi dāni me siyā.
[22] napi naṃ jānāmi kīriso, atha maggena hato samūlako..
[22] napi naṃ passāmi kīriso, atha maggena hato samūlako..
[21] ``yassā siyā apaccavekkhitaṃ, satthā vā anupāsito siyā.
[22] tvaṃ tādisikaṃ palobhaya, jānantiṃ so imaṃ vihaññasi..
[22] saṅkhatamasubhanti ^a^P0.0249^ea^ jāniya, sabbattheva mano na limpati..
[21] ``diṭṭhā hi mayā sucittitā, sombhā dārukapillakāni vā.
[22] tantīhi ca khīlakehi ca, vinibaddhā vividhaṃ panaccakā..
[22] na vindeyya khaṇḍaso kate, kimhi tattha manaṃ nivesaye..
[21] ``tathūpamā dehakāni maṃ, tehi dhammehi vinā na vattanti.
[22] dhammehi vinā na vattati, kimhi tattha manaṃ nivesaye..
[21] ``yathā haritālena makkhitaṃ, addasa cittikaṃ bhittiyā kataṃ.
[22] tamhi te viparītadassanaṃ, saññā mānusikā niratthikā..
[22] pīḷakoḷikā cettha jāyati, vividhā cakkhuvidhā ca piṇḍitā..
[22] handa te cakkhuṃ harassu taṃ, tassa narassa adāsi tāvade..
[21] ``tassa ca viramāsi tāvade, rāgo tattha khamāpayī ca naṃ.
[22] sotthi siyā brahmacārinī, na puno edisakaṃ bhavissati..
[22] gaṇhiya ^a^P0.0250^ea^ āsīvisaṃ viya, api nu sotthi siyā khamehi no..
[21] ``muttā ca tato sā bhikkhunī, agamī buddhavarassa santikaṃ.
[22] passiya varapuññalakkhaṇaṃ, cakkhu āsi yathā purāṇaka''nti.. --

[01] tattha ^b^jīvakambavana^eb^nti jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavanaṃ. ^b^ramma^eb^nti ramaṇīyaṃ. taṃ kira bhūmibhāgasampattiyā chāyūdakasampattiyā ca rukkhānaṃ ropitākārena ativiya manuññaṃ manoramaṃ. ^b^gacchanti^eb^nti ambavanaṃ uddissa gataṃ, divāvihārāya upagacchantiṃ. ^b^subha^eb^nti evaṃnāmikaṃ. ^b^dhuttako^eb^ti itthidhutto. rājagahavāsī kireko mahāvibhavassa suvaṇṇakārassa putto yuvā abhirūpo itthidhutto puriso matto vicarati. so taṃ paṭipathe ^a^M0.0259^ea^ disvā paṭibaddhacitto maggaṃ uparundhitvā aṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``dhuttako sannivāresī''ti, mama gamanaṃ nisedhesīti attho. ^b^tamenaṃ abravī subhā^eb^ti tamenaṃ nivāretvā ṭhitaṃ dhuttaṃ subhā bhikkhunī kathesi. ettha ca ``gacchantiṃ bhikkhuniṃ subhaṃ, abravi subhā''ti ca attānameva therī aññaṃ viya katvā vadati. theriyā vuttagāthānaṃ sambandhadassanavasena saṅgītikārehi ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.

[01] ``abravī subhā''ti vatvā tassā vuttākāradassanatthaṃ āha ^b^``kiṃ te aparādhita''^eb^ntiādi. tattha ^b^kiṃ te aparādhitaṃ mayā^eb^ti kiṃ tuyhaṃ, āvuso, mayā aparaddhaṃ. ^b^yaṃ maṃ ovariyāna tiṭṭhasī^eb^ti yena aparādhena maṃ gacchantiṃ ovaritvā gamanaṃ nisedhetvā tiṭṭhasi, so natthevāti adhippāyo. atha itthītisaññāya evaṃ paṭipajjasi, evampi na yuttanti dassentī āha -- ^b^``na hi pabbajitāya, āvuso, puriso samphusanāya kappatī''^eb^ti, āvuso suvaṇṇakāraputta ^a^P0.0251^ea^, lokiyacārittenapi purisassa pabbajitānaṃ ^a^V0.0276^ea^ samphusanāya na kappati, pabbajitāya pana puriso tiracchānagatopi samphusanāya na kappati, tiṭṭhatu tāva purisaphusanā, rāgavasenassā nissaggiyena purisassa nissaggiyassāpi phusanā na kappateva.

[03] tenāha ^b^``garuke mama satthusāsane''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- ^b^garuke^eb^ pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukātabbe mayhaṃ satthu sāsane yā sikkhā bhikkhuniyo uddissa ^b^sugatena^eb^ sammāsambuddhena ^b^desitā^eb^ paññattā. tāhi ^b^parisuddhapadaṃ^eb^ parisuddhakusalakoṭṭhāsaṃ, rāgādiaṅgaṇānaṃ sabbaso abhāvena ^b^anaṅgaṇaṃ,^eb^ evaṃbhūtaṃ maṃ gacchantiṃ kena kāraṇena āvaritvā tiṭṭhasīti.

[03] ^b^āvilacitto^eb^ti cittassa āvilabhāvakarānaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vasena āvilacitto, tvaṃ tadabhāvato ^b^anāvilaṃ,^eb^ rāgarajādīnaṃ vasena ^b^sarajo,^eb^ sāṅgaṇo tadabhāvato ^b^vītarajaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ sabbattha^eb^ khandhapañcake samucchedavimuttiyā ^b^vimuttamānasaṃ,^eb^ maṃ kasmā ovaritvā tiṭṭhasīti?

[01] evaṃ theriyā vutte dhuttako attano adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^``daharā cā''^eb^tiādinā dasa gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^daharā^eb^ti taruṇī paṭhame yobbane ṭhitā. ^b^apāpikā casī^eb^ti rūpena alāmikā ca asi ^a^M0.0260^ea^, uttamarūpadharā cāhosīti adhippāyo. ^b^kiṃ te pabbajjā karissatī^eb^ti tuyhaṃ evaṃ paṭhamavaye ṭhitāya rūpasampannāya pabbajjā kiṃ karissati, vuḍḍhāya bībhaccharūpāya vā pabbajitabbanti adhippāyena vadati. ^b^nikkhipā^eb^ti chaḍḍehi. ``ukkhipā''ti vā pāṭho, apanehīti attho.

[03] ^b^madhura^eb^nti subhaṃ, sugandhanti attho. ^b^pavantī^eb^ti vāyanti. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti samantato. ^b^kusumarajena samuṭṭhitā dumā^eb^ti ime rukkhā mandavātena samuṭṭhahamānakusumareṇujātena attano kusumarajena sayaṃ samuṭṭhitā viya hutvā samantato surabhī vāyanti. ^b^paṭhamavasanto sukho^eb^ ^a^P0.0252^ea^ ^b^utū^eb^ti ayaṃ paṭhamo vasantamāso sukhasamphasso ca utu vattatīti attho.

[03] ^b^kusumitasikharā^eb^ti supupphitaggā. ^b^abhigajjantiva māluteritā^eb^ti vātena sañcalitā abhigajjantiva abhitthanitā viya tiṭṭhanti. ^b^yadi ekā vanamogahissasī^eb^ti sace tvaṃ ekikā vanamogāhissasi, kā nāma te tattha rati bhavissatīti attanā baddhasukhābhirattattā evamāha.

[01] ^b^vāḷamigasaṅghasevita^eb^nti sīhabyagghādivāḷamigasamūhehi tattha tattha upasevitaṃ. ^b^kuñjaramattakareṇuloḷita^eb^nti ^a^V0.0277^ea^ mattakuñjarehi hatthinīhi ca migānaṃ cittatāpanena rukkhagacchādīnaṃ sākhābhañjanena ca āloḷitapadesaṃ. kiñcāpi tasmiṃ vane īdisaṃ tadā natthi, vanaṃ nāma evarūpanti taṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo evamāha. ^b^rahita^eb^nti janarahitaṃ vijanaṃ. ^b^bhiṃsanaka^eb^nti bhayajanakaṃ.

[03] ^b^tapanīyakatāva dhītikā^eb^ti rattasuvaṇṇena vicaritā dhītalikā viya sukusalena yantācariyena yantayogavasena sajjitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya vicarasi, idāneva ito cito ca sañcarasi. ^b^cittalateva accharā^eb^ti cittalatānāmake uyyāne devaccharā viya. ^b^kāsikasukhumehī^eb^ti kāsiraṭṭhe uppannehi ativiya sukhumehi. ^b^vaggubhī^eb^ti siniddhamaṭṭhehi. ^b^sobhasī suvasanehi nūpame^eb^ti nivāsanapārupanavatthehi anupame upamārahite tvaṃ idāni me vasānugo sobhasīti bhāvinaṃ attano adhippāyavasena ekantikaṃ vattamānaṃ viya katvā vadati.

[01] ^b^ahaṃ tava vasānugo siya^eb^nti ahampi tuyhaṃ vasānugo kiṃkārapaṭissāvī bhaveyyaṃ. ^b^yadi viharemase kānanantare^eb^ti yadi mayaṃ ubhopi vanantare ^a^M0.0261^ea^ ^a^P0.0253^ea^ saha vasāma ramāma. ^b^na hi matthi tayā piyattaro^eb^ti vasānugabhāvassa kāraṇamāha. ^b^pāṇo^eb^ti satto, añño kocipi satto tayā piyataro mayhaṃ na hi atthīti attho. atha vā ^b^pāṇo^eb^ti attano jīvitaṃ sandhāya vadati, mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ tayā piyataraṃ na hi atthīti attho. ^b^kinnarimandalocane^eb^ti kinnariyā viya mandaputhuvilocane.

[03] ^b^yadi me vacanaṃ karissasi, sukhitā ehi agāramāvasā^eb^ti sace tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ karissasi, ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ brahmacariyadukkhaṃ pahāya ehi kāmabhogehi sukhitā hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasa. ``sukhitā heti agāramāvasantī''ti keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ sukhitā bhavissati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasantīti attho. ^b^pāsādanivātavāsinī^eb^ti nivātesu pāsādesu vāsinī. ``pāsādavimānavāsinī''ti ca pāṭho, vimānasadisesu pāsādesu vāsinīti attho. ^b^parikamma^eb^nti veyyāvaccaṃ.

[01] ^b^dhārayā^eb^ti paridaha, nivāsehi ceva uttariyañca karohi. ^b^abhiropehī^eb^ti maṇḍanavibhūsanavasena vā sarīraṃ āropaya, alaṅkarohīti attho. ^b^mālavaṇṇaka^eb^nti mālañceva gandhavilepanañca. ^b^kañcanamaṇimuttaka^eb^nti kañcanena maṇimuttāhi ca yuttaṃ, suvaṇṇamayamaṇimuttāhi khacitanti attho. ^b^bahu^eb^nti hatthūpagādibhedato bahuppakāraṃ. ^b^vividha^eb^nti karaṇavikatiyā nānāvidhaṃ.

[03] ^b^sudhotarajapacchada^eb^nti ^a^V0.0278^ea^ sudhotatāya pavāhitarajaṃ uttaracchadaṃ. ^b^subha^eb^nti sobhanaṃ. ^b^gonakatūlikasanthata^eb^nti dīghalomakāḷakojavena ceva haṃsalomādipuṇṇāya tūlikāya ca santhataṃ. ^b^nava^eb^nti abhinavaṃ. ^b^mahāraha^eb^nti mahagghaṃ. ^b^candanamaṇḍitasāragandhika^eb^nti gosīsakādisāracandanena maṇḍitatāya ^a^P0.0254^ea^ surabhigandhikaṃ, evarūpaṃ sayanamāruha, taṃ āruhitvā yathāsukhaṃ sayāhi ceva nisīda cāti attho.

[03] ^b^uppalaṃ cudakā samuggata^eb^nti ^b^ca^eb^-kāro nipātamattaṃ, udakato uggataṃ uṭṭhitaṃ accuggamma ṭhitaṃ suphullamuppalaṃ. ^b^yathā taṃ amanussasevita^eb^nti tañca rakkhasapariggahitāya pokkharaṇiyā jātattā nimmanussehi sevitaṃ kenaci aparibhuttameva bhaveyya. ^b^evaṃ tvaṃ brahmacārinī^eb^ti evameva taṃ suṭṭhu phullamuppalaṃ viya tuvaṃ brahmacārinī. ^b^sakesaṅgesu^eb^ attano sarīrāvayavesu kenaci aparibhuttesuyeva jaraṃ gamissasi, mudhāyeva jarājiṇṇā bhavissasi.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0262^ea^ dhuttakena attano adhippāye pakāsite therī sarīrasabhāvavibhāvanena taṃ tattha vicchindentī ^b^``kiṃ te idhā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- āvuso suvaṇṇakāraputta, kesādikuṇapapūre ekantena bhedanadhamme susānavaḍḍhane, ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ kāyasaññite asucikaḷevare kiṃ nāma tava sāranti sammataṃ sambhāvitaṃ, yaṃ disvā vimano aññatarasmiṃ ārammaṇe vigatamanasaṅkappo, ettheva vā avimano somanassiko hutvā udikkhasi, taṃ mayhaṃ kathehīti.

[03] taṃ sutvā dhuttako kiñcāpi tassā rūpaṃ cāturiyasobhitaṃ, paṭhamadassanato pana paṭṭhāya yasmiṃ diṭṭhipāte paṭibaddhacitto, tameva apadisanto ^b^``akkhīni ca tūriyārivā''^eb^tiādimāha. kāmañcāyaṃ therī suṭṭhu saṃyatatāya santindriyā, tāya thiravippasannasommasantanayananipātesu kammānubhāvanipphannesu pasannapañcappasādapaṭimaṇḍitesu nayanesu labbhamāne pabhāvisiṭṭhacāturiye diṭṭhipāte, yasmā sayaṃ caritahāvabhāvavilāsādiparikappavañcito so dhutto jāto, tasmāssa diṭṭhirāgo savisesaṃ vepullaṃ agamāsi. tattha ^b^akkhīni ca tūriyārivā^eb^ti tūri vuccati migī, ca-saddo nipātamattaṃ, migacchāpāya viya ^a^P0.0255^ea^ te akkhīnīti attho. ``koriyārivā''ti vā pāḷi, kuñcakārakukkuṭiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kinnariyāriva pabbatantare^eb^ti pabbatakucchiyaṃ vicaramānāya kinnarivanitāya viya ca te akkhīnīti attho. ^b^tava me nayanāni dakkhiyā^eb^ti tava vuttaguṇavisesāni nayanāni disvā, ^b^bhiyyo^eb^ uparūpari me kāmābhirati pavaḍḍhati.

[03] ^b^uppalasikharopamāni^eb^ ^a^V0.0279^ea^ ^b^te^eb^ti rattuppalāggasadisāni pamhāni tava. ^b^vimale^eb^ti nimmale. ^b^hāṭakasannibhe^eb^ti kañcanarūpakassa mukhasadise te mukhe, nayanāni dakkhiyāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^api dūragatā^eb^ti dūraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatāpi. ^b^saramhase^eb^ti aññaṃ kiñci acintetvā tava nayanāni eva anussarāmi. ^b^āyatapamhe^eb^ti dīghapakhume. ^b^visuddhadassane^eb^ti nimmalalocane. ^b^na hi matthi tayā piyattaro nayanā^eb^ti tava nayanato añño koci mayhaṃ piyataro natthi. tayāti hi sāmiatthe eva karaṇavacanaṃ.

[01] evaṃ ^a^M0.0263^ea^ cakkhusampattiyā ummāditassa viya taṃ taṃ vippalapato tassa purisassa manorathaṃ viparivattentī therī ^b^``apathenā''^eb^tiādinā dvādasa gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^apathena payātumicchasī^eb^ti, āvuso suvaṇṇakāraputta, sante aññasmiṃ itthijane yo tvaṃ ^b^buddhasutaṃ^eb^ buddhassa bhagavato orasadhītaraṃ maṃ ^b^maggayasi^eb^ patthesi, so tvaṃ sante kheme ujumagge apathena kaṇṭakanivutena sabhayena kummaggena payātumicchasi paṭipajjitukāmosi, ^b^candaṃ kīḷanakaṃ gavesasi^eb^ candamaṇḍalaṃ kīḷāgoḷakaṃ kātukāmosi, ^b^meruṃ laṅghetumicchasi^eb^ caturāsītiyojanasahassubbedhaṃ sinerupabbatarājaṃ laṅghayitvā aparabhāge ṭhātukāmosi, so tvaṃ maṃ buddhasutaṃ maggayasīti yojanā.

[03] idāni ^a^P0.0256^ea^ tassa attano avisayabhāvaṃ patthanāya ca vighātāvahataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``natthī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^rāgo yatthapi dāni me siyā^eb^ti yattha idāni me rāgo siyā bhaveyya, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ sadevake loke natthi eva. ^b^napi naṃ jānāmi kīriso^eb^ti naṃ rāgaṃ kīrisotipi na jānāmi. ^b^atha maggena hato samūlako^eb^ti ^b^athā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena mūlena samūlako rāgo ariyamaggena hato samugghātito.

[03] ^b^iṅgālakuyā^eb^ti aṅgārakāsuyā. ^b^ujjhito^eb^ti vātukkhitto viya yo koci, dahaniyā indhanaṃ viyāti attho. ^b^visapattorivā^eb^ti visagatabhājanaṃ viya. ^b^aggito kato^eb^ti aggito aṅgārato apagato kato, visassa lesampi asesetvā apanīto vināsitoti attho.

[03] ^b^yassā siyā apaccavekkhita^eb^nti yassā itthiyā idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ñāṇena appaṭivekkhitaṃ apariññātaṃ siyā. ^b^sattā vā anusāsito siyā^eb^ti sattā vā dhammasarīrassa adassanena yassā itthiyā ananusāsito siyā. ^b^tvaṃ tādisikaṃ palobhayā^eb^ti, āvuso, tvaṃ tathārūpaṃ aparimadditasaṅkhāraṃ ^a^V0.0280^ea^ apaccavekkhitalokuttaradhammaṃ kāmehi palobhaya upagaccha. ^b^jānantiṃ so imaṃ vihaññasī^eb^ti so tvaṃ pavattiṃ nivattiñca ^a^M0.0264^ea^ yāthāvato jānantiṃ paṭividdhasaccaṃ imaṃ subhaṃ bhikkhuniṃ āgamma vihaññasi, sampati āyatiñca vighātaṃ dukkhaṃ āpajjasi.

[03] idānissa vighātāpattitaṃ kāraṇavibhāvanena dassentī ^b^``mayhaṃ hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^hī^eb^ti hetuatthe nipāto. ^b^akkuṭṭhavandite^eb^ti akkose vandanāya ca. ^b^sukhadukkhe^eb^ti sukhe ca dukkhe ca, iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayasamāyoge vā. ^b^satī upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇayuttā sati ^a^P0.0257^ea^ sabbakālaṃ upaṭṭhitā. ^b^saṅkhatamasubhanti jāniyā^eb^ti tebhūmakaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ kilesāsucipaggharaṇena asubhanti ñatvā. ^b^sabbatthevā^eb^ti sabbasmiṃyeva bhavattaye mayhaṃ mano taṇhālepādinā na upalimpati.
[03] ^b^maggaṭṭhaṅgikayānayāyinī^eb^ti aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasaṅkhātena ariyayānena nibbānapuraṃ yāyinī upagatā. ^b^uddhaṭasallā^eb^ti attano santānato samuddhaṭarāgādisallā.

[03] ^b^sucittitā^eb^ti hatthapādamukhādiākārena suṭṭhu cittitā viracitā. ^b^sombhā^eb^ti sumbhakā. ^b^dārukapillakāni vā^eb^ti dārudaṇḍādīhi uparacitarūpakāni. ^b^tantīhī^eb^ti nhārusuttakehi. ^b^khīlakehī^eb^ti hatthapādapiṭṭhikaṇṇādiatthāya ṭhapitadaṇḍehi. ^b^vinibaddhā^eb^ti vividhenākārena baddhā. ^b^vividhaṃ panaccakā^eb^ti yantasuttādīnaṃ añchanavissajjanādinā paṭṭhapitanaccakā, panaccantā viya diṭṭhāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^tamhuddhaṭe tantikhīlake^eb^ti sannivesavisiṭṭharacanāvisesayuttaṃ upādāya rūpakasamaññā tamhi tantimhi khīlake ca ṭhānato uddhaṭe bandhanto ^b^vissaṭṭhe,^eb^ visuṃ karaṇena aññamaññaṃ ^b^vikale,^eb^ tahiṃ tahiṃ khipanena ^b^parikrite^eb^ vikirite. ^b^na vindeyya khaṇḍaso kate^eb^ti potthakarūpassa avayave khaṇḍākhaṇḍite kate potthakarūpaṃ na vindeyya, na upalabheyya. evaṃ sante ^b^kimhi tattha manaṃ nivesaye^eb^ tasmiṃ potthakarūpāvayave kimhi kiṃ khāṇuke, udāhu rajjuke, mattikāpiṇḍādike vā manaṃ manasaññaṃ niveseyya, visaṅkhāre avayave sā saññā kadācipi napateyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^tathūpamā^eb^ti taṃsadisā tena potthakarūpena sadisā. kinti ce āha ^b^``dehakānī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^dehakānī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0258^ea^ hatthapādamukhādidehāvayavā. ^b^ma^eb^nti me paṭibaddhā upaṭṭhahanti. ^b^tehi dhammehī^eb^ti tehi pathaviādīhi ^a^M0.0265^ea^ ca cakkhādīhi ca dhammehi. ^b^vinā na vattantī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0281^ea^ na hi tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhe pathaviādidhamme muñcitvā dehā nāma santi. ^b^dhammehi vinā na vattatī^eb^ti deho avayavehi avayavadhammehi vinā na vattati na upalabbhati. evaṃ sante ^b^kimhi tattha manaṃ nivesaye^eb^ti kimhi kiṃ pathaviyaṃ, udāhu āpādike dehoti vā hatthapādādīnīti vā manaṃ manasaññaṃ niveseyya. yasmā pathaviādipasādadhammamatte esā samaññā, yadidaṃ dehoti vā hatthapādādīnīti vā sattoti vā itthīti vā purisoti vā, tasmā na ettha jānato koci abhiniveso hotīti.

[03] ^b^yathā haritālena makkhitaṃ, addasa cittikaṃ bhittiyā kata^eb^nti yathā kusalena cittakārena bhittiyaṃ haritālena makkhitaṃ littaṃ tena lepaṃ datvā kataṃ ālikhitaṃ cittikaṃ itthirūpaṃ addasa passeyya. tattha yā upathambhanakhepanādikiriyāsampattiyā mānusikā nu kho ayaṃ bhitti apassāya ṭhitāti saññā, sā niratthakā manussabhāvasaṅkhātassa atthassa tattha abhāvato, mānusīti pana kevalaṃ tahiṃ tassa ca viparītadassanaṃ, yāthāvato gahaṇaṃ na hoti, dhammapuñjamatte itthipurisādigahaṇampi evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^māyaṃ viya aggato kata^eb^nti māyākārena purato upaṭṭhāpitaṃ māyāsadisaṃ. ^b^supinanteva suvaṇṇapādapa^eb^nti supinameva supinantaṃ, tattha upaṭṭhitasuvaṇṇamayarukkhaṃ viya. ^b^upagacchasi andha rittaka^eb^nti andhabāla rittakaṃ tucchakaṃ antosārarahitaṃ imaṃ attabhāvaṃ ``etaṃ mamā''ti sāravantaṃ viya upagacchasi abhinivisasi. ^b^janamajjheriva rupparūpaka^eb^nti māyākārena mahājanamajjhe ^a^P0.0259^ea^ dassitaṃ rūpiyarūpasadisaṃ sāraṃ viya upaṭṭhahantaṃ, asāranti attho.

[03] ^b^vaṭṭanirivā^eb^ti lākhāya guḷikā viya. ^b^koṭarohitā^eb^ti koṭare rukkhasusire ṭhapitā. ^b^majjhe pubbuḷakā^eb^ti akkhidalamajjhe ṭhitajalapubbuḷasadisā. ^b^sāssukā^eb^ti assujalasahitā. ^b^pīḷakoḷikā^eb^ti akkhigūthako. ^b^ettha jāyatī^eb^ti etasmiṃ akkhimaṇḍale ubhosu koṭīsu visagandhaṃ vāyanto nibbattati. ^b^pīḷakoḷikā^eb^ti vā akkhidalesu nibbattanakā pīḷakā vuccati. ^b^vividhā^eb^ti setanīlamaṇḍalānañceva rattapītādīnaṃ sattannaṃ paṭalānañca vasena anekavidhā. ^b^cakkhuvidhā^eb^ti cakkhubhāgā cakkhuppakārā vā tassa anekakalāpagatabhāvato. ^b^piṇḍitā^eb^ti samuditā.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0266^ea^ cakkhusmiṃ sārajjantassa cakkhuno asubhataṃ anavaṭṭhitatāya aniccatañca vibhāvesi ^a^V0.0282^ea^. vibhāvetvā ca yathā nāma koci lobhanīyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā corakantāraṃ paṭipajjanto corehi palibuddho taṃ lobhanīyabhaṇḍaṃ datvā gacchati, evameva cakkhumhi sārattena tena purisena palibuddhā therī attano cakkhuṃ uppāṭetvā tassa adāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``uppāṭiya cārudassanā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^uppāṭiyā^eb^ti uppāṭetvā cakkhukūpato nīharitvā. ^b^cārudassanā^eb^ti piyadassanā manoharadassanā. ^b^na ca pajjitthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ cakkhusmiṃ saṅgaṃ nāpajji. ^b^asaṅgamānasā^eb^ti katthacipi ārammaṇe anāsattacittā. ^b^handa te cakkhu^eb^nti tayā kāmitaṃ tato eva mayā dinnattā te cakkhusaññitaṃ asucipiṇḍaṃ gaṇha, gahetvā harassu pasādayuttaṃ icchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ nehi.

[03] ^b^tassa ca viramāsi tāvade^eb^ti tassa dhuttapurisassa tāvadeva akkhimhi uppāṭitakkhaṇe eva rāgo vigacchi. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti akkhimhi, tassaṃ vā theriyaṃ. atha vā ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne. ^b^khamāpayī^eb^ti khamāpesi. ^b^sotthi siyā brahmacārinī^eb^ti seṭṭhacārini mahesike tuyhaṃ ārogyameva bhaveyya. ^b^na puno edisakaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0260^ea^ ^b^bhavissatī^eb^ti ito paraṃ evarūpaṃ anācāracaraṇaṃ na bhavissati, na karissāmīti attho.
[03] ^b^āsādiyā^eb^ti ghaṭṭetvā. ^b^edisa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ sabbattha vītarāgaṃ. ^b^aggiṃ pajjalitaṃva liṅgiyā^eb^ti pajjalitaṃ aggiṃ āliṅgetvā viya.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā dhuttapurisā. ^b^sā bhikkhunī^eb^ti sā subhā bhikkhunī. ^b^agamī buddhavarassa santika^eb^nti sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ upagacchi upasaṅkami. ^b^passiya varapuññalakkhaṇa^eb^nti uttamehi puññasambhārehi nibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ disvā. ^b^yathā purāṇaka^eb^nti porāṇaṃ viya uppāṭanato pubbe viya cakkhu paṭipākatikaṃ ahosi. yamettha antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.

[01] cattālīsanipāte ^a^M0.0267^ea^ ^a^V0.0283^ea^ ^b^nagaramhi kusumanāme^eb^tiādikā isidāsiyā theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave purisattabhāve ṭhatvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī carimabhavato sattame bhave akalyāṇasannissayena paradārikakammaṃ katvā, kāyassa bhedā niraye nibbattitvā tattha bahūni vassasatāni niraye paccitvā, tato cutā tīsu jātīsu tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā dāsiyā kucchismiṃ napuṃsako hutvā nibbatti. tato pana cutā ekassa daliddassa sākaṭikassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti. taṃ vayappattaṃ giridāso nāma aññatarassa satthavāhassa putto attano bhariyaṃ katvā gehaṃ ānesi. tassa ca bhariyā atthi sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā. tassaṃ issāpakatā sāmino tassā viddesanakammaṃ akāsi. sā tattha yāvajīvaṃ ṭhatvā kāyassa bhedā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ kulapadesasīlācārādiguṇehi abhisammatassa vibhavasampannassa ^a^P0.0261^ea^ seṭṭhissa dhītā hutvā nibbatti, ^b^isidāsī^eb^tissā nāmaṃ ahosi.

[03] taṃ vayappattakāle mātāpitaro kularūpavayavibhavādisadisassa aññatarassa seṭṭhiputtassa adaṃsu. sā tassa gehe patidevatā hutvā māsamattaṃ vasi. athassā kammabalena sāmiko virattarūpo hutvā taṃ gharato nīhari. taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyati. tesaṃ tesaṃ pana sāmikānaṃ aruccaneyyatāya saṃvegajātā pitaraṃ anujānāpetvā, jinadattāya theriyā santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā, phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmentī ekadivasaṃ pāṭaliputtanagare piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā mahāgaṅgāyaṃ vālukapuline nisīditvā bodhittheriyā nāma attano sahāyattheriyā pubbapaṭipattiṃ pucchitā tamatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena vissajjesi ``ujjeniyā puravare''tiādinā. tesaṃ pana pucchāvissajjanānaṃ sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ --
[21] ``isidāsī ^a^M0.0268^ea^ ^a^V0.0284^ea^ tattha ekā, dutiyā bodhīti sīlasampannā ca.
[22] isidāsī vacanamabravi, suṇa bodhi yathāmhi pabbajitā..
[22] tassamhi ekadhītā, piyā manāpā ca dayitā ca..
[22] seṭṭhī pahūtaratano, tassa mamaṃ suṇumadāsi tāto..
[22] sirasā karomi pāde, vandāmi yathāmhi anusiṭṭhā..
[21] ``yā mayhaṃ sāmikassa, bhaginiyo bhātuno parijano vā.
[21] ``annena ^a^V0.0285^ea^ ca pānena ca, khajjena ca yañca tattha sannihitaṃ.
[22] chādemi upanayāmi ca, demi ca yaṃ yassa patirūpaṃ..
[22] isidāsiyā na saha vacchaṃ, ekāgārehaṃ saha vatthuṃ..
[21] ``mā evaṃ putta avaca, isidāsī paṇḍitā paribyattā.
[22] uṭṭhāyikā analasā, kiṃ tuyhaṃ na rocate putta..
[21] ``na ca me hiṃsati kiñci, na cahaṃ isidāsiyā saha vacchaṃ.
[22] dessāva me alaṃ me, apucchāhaṃ gamissāmi..
[21] ``tassa vacanaṃ suṇitvā, sassu sasuro ca maṃ apucchiṃsu.
[22] kissa ^a^P0.0263^ea^ tayā aparaddhaṃ, bhaṇa vissaṭṭhā yathābhūtaṃ..
[21] ``napihaṃ aparajjhaṃ kiñci, napi hiṃsemi na bhaṇāmi dubbacanaṃ.
[22] kiṃ sakkā kātuyye, yaṃ maṃ viddessate bhattā..
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0286^ea^ maṃ pitugharaṃ paṭinayiṃsu, vimanā dukhena adhibhūtā.
[21] ``atha maṃ adāsi tāto, aḍḍhassa gharamhi dutiyakulikassa.
[22] tato upaḍḍhasuṅkena, yena maṃ vindatha seṭṭhi..
[21] ``tassapi gharamhi māsaṃ, avasiṃ atha sopi maṃ paṭiccharayi.
[21] ``bhikkhāya ca vicarantaṃ, damakaṃ dantaṃ me pitā bhaṇati.
[22] hohisi me jāmātā, nikkhipa poṭṭhiñca ghaṭikañca..
[21] ``sopi vasitvā pakkhaṃ, atha tātaṃ bhaṇati `dehi me poṭṭhiṃ.
[21] ``atha naṃ bhaṇatī tāto, ammā sabbo ca me ñātigaṇavaggo.
[22] kiṃ te na kīrati idha, bhaṇa khippaṃ taṃ te karihiti..
[21] ``evaṃ bhaṇito bhaṇati, yadi me attā sakkoti alaṃ mayhaṃ.
[22] isidāsiyā na saha vacchaṃ, ekagharehaṃ saha vatthuṃ..
[22] āpucchitūna gacchaṃ, marituye vā pabbajissaṃ vā..
[21] ``annena ^a^V0.0287^ea^ ca pānena ca, khajjena ca yañca tattha sannihitaṃ.
[21] ``atha maṃ bhaṇatī tāto, idheva puttaka carāhi tvaṃ dhammaṃ.
[22] annena ca pānena ca, tappaya samaṇe dvijātī ca..
[22] pāpañhi mayā pakataṃ, kammaṃ taṃ nijjaressāmi..
[21] ``atha maṃ bhaṇatī tāto, pāpuṇa bodhiñca aggadhammañca.
[22] taṃ tava ācikkhissaṃ, taṃ ekamanā nisāmehi..
[22] pakko tato ca uṭṭhahitvā, makkaṭiyā kucchimokkamiṃ..
[22] kāṇāya ^a^P0.0265^ea^ ca khañjāya ca, eḷakiyā kucchimokkamiṃ..
[21] ``sohaṃ tato cavitvā, vīthiyā dāsiyā ghare jāto.
[22] neva mahilā na puriso, yathāpi gantvāna paradāraṃ..
[21] ``taṃ maṃ tato satthavāho, ussannāya vipulāya vaḍḍhiyā.
[21] ``atha soḷasame vasse, disvā maṃ pattayobbanaṃ kaññaṃ.
[21] ``tassapi aññā bhariyā, sīlavatī guṇavatī yasavatī ca.
[22] dāsīva upaṭṭhahantiṃ, tassapi anto kato mayā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nagaramhi kusumanāme^eb^ti ``kusumapura''nti evaṃ kusumasaddena gahitanāmake nagare, idāni taṃ nagaraṃ ^b^pāṭaliputtamhī^eb^ti sarūpato dasseti. ^b^pathaviyā maṇḍe^eb^ti sakalāya pathaviyā maṇḍabhūte. ^b^sakyakulakulīnāyo^eb^ti sakyakule kuladhītaro, sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0289^ea^ tāsu dvīsu bhikkhunīsu. ^b^bodhī^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā therī. ^b^jhānajjhāyanaratāyo^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarassa jhānassa jhāyane abhiratā. ^b^bahussutāyo^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccena ^a^P0.0266^ea^ bahussutā. ^b^dhutakilesāyo^eb^ti aggamaggena sabbaso samugghātitakilesā. ^b^bhattatthaṃ kariyā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0272^ea^ bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^rahitamhī^eb^ti janarahitamhi vivittaṭṭhāne. ^b^sukhanisinnā^eb^ti pabbajjāsukhena vivekasukhena ca sukhanisinnā. ^b^imā girā^eb^ti idāni vuccamānā sukhā lāpanā. ^b^abbhudīresu^eb^nti pucchāvissajjanavasena kathayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^``pāsādikāsī''^eb^ti gāthā bodhittheriyā pucchāvasena vuttā. ^b^``evamanuyuñjiyamānā''^eb^ti gāthā saṅgītikāreheva vuttā. ^b^``ujjeniyā''^eb^tiādikā hi sabbāpi isidāsiyāva vuttā. tattha ^b^pāsādikāsī^eb^ti rūpasampattiyā passantānaṃ pasādāvahā asi. ^b^vayopi te aparihīno^eb^ti tuyhaṃ vayopi na parihīno, paṭhamavaye ṭhitāsīti attho. ^b^kiṃ disvāna byālika^eb^nti kīdisaṃ byālikaṃ dosaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā. ^b^athāsi nekkhammamanuyuttā^eb^ti ^b^athā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, nekkhammaṃ pabbajjaṃ anuyuttā asi.
[03] ^b^anuyuñjiyamānā^eb^ti pucchiyamānā, sā isidāsīti yojanā. ^b^rahite^eb^ti suññaṭṭhāne. ^b^suṇa bodhi yathāmhi pabbajitā^eb^ti bodhittheri ahaṃ yathā pabbajitā amhi, taṃ taṃ purāṇaṃ suṇa suṇāhi.
[03] ^b^ujjeniyā puravare^eb^ti ujjenīnāmake avantiraṭṭhe uttamanagare. ^b^piyā^eb^ti ekadhītubhāvena piyāyitabbā. ^b^manāpā^eb^ti sīlācāraguṇena manavaḍḍhanakā. ^b^dayitā^eb^ti anukampitabbā.

[03] ^b^athā^eb^ti pacchā mama vayappattakāle. ^b^me sāketato varakā^eb^ti sāketanagarato mama varakā maṃ vārentā āgacchuṃ. ^b^uttamakulīnā^eb^ti tasmiṃ nagare aggakulikā, yena te pesitā, so seṭṭhi pahūtaratano. ^b^tassa mamaṃ suṇhamadāsi tāto^eb^ti tassa sāketaseṭṭhino suṇisaṃ puttassa bhariyaṃ katvā mayhaṃ pitā maṃ adāsi.

[03] ^b^sāyaṃ pāta^eb^nti sāyanhe pubbaṇhe ca. ^b^paṇāmamupagamma sirasā karomī^eb^ti sassuyā sasurassa ca ^a^P0.0267^ea^ santikaṃ upagantvā sirasā paṇāmaṃ karomi, tesaṃ pāde vandāmi. ^b^yathāmhi anusiṭṭhā^eb^ti tehi yathā anusiṭṭhā amhi, tathā karomi, tesaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ na atikkamāmi.
[03] ^b^tamekavarakampī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0290^ea^ ekavallabhampi. ^b^ubbiggā^eb^ti tasantā. ^b^āsanaṃ demī^eb^ti yassa puggalassa yaṃ anucchavikaṃ, taṃ tassa demi.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0273^ea^ parivesanaṭṭhāne. ^b^sannihita^eb^nti sajjitaṃ hutvā vijjamānaṃ. ^b^chādemī^eb^ti upacchādemi, upacchādetvā upanayāmi ca, upanetvā demi, dentīpi yaṃ yassa patirūpaṃ, tadeva demīti attho.
[03] ^b^ummāre^eb^ti dvāre. ^b^dhovantī hatthapāde^eb^ti hatthapāde dhovinī āsiṃ, dhovitvā gharaṃ samupagamāmīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^koccha^eb^nti massūnaṃ kesānañca ullikhanakocchaṃ. ^b^pasāda^eb^nti gandhacuṇṇādimukhavilepanaṃ. ``pasādhana''ntipi pāṭho, pasādhanabhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^añjani^eb^nti añjananāḷiṃ. ^b^parikammakārikā viyā^eb^ti aggakulikā vibhavasampannāpi patiparicārikā ceṭikā viya.

[03] ^b^bhattikata^eb^nti katasāmibhatikaṃ. ^b^anuratta^eb^nti anurattavantiṃ. ^b^kārika^eb^nti tassa tasseva iti kattabbassa kārikaṃ. ^b^nihatamāna^eb^nti apanītamānaṃ. ^b^uṭṭhāyika^eb^nti uṭṭhānavīriyasampannaṃ. ^b^analasa^eb^nti tato eva akusītaṃ. ^b^sīlavati^eb^nti sīlācārasampannaṃ. ^b^dussate^eb^ti dussati, kujjhitvā bhaṇati.

[03] ^b^bhaṇati āpucchahaṃ gamissāmī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ tumhe āpucchitvā yattha katthaci gamissāmī''ti so mama sāmiko attano mātarañca pitarañca bhaṇati. kiṃ bhaṇatīti ce āha -- ^b^``isidāsiyā na saha vacchaṃ, ekāgārehaṃ saha vatthu''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^vaccha^eb^nti vasissaṃ.

[03] ^b^dessā^eb^ti appiyā. ^b^alaṃ me^eb^ti payojanaṃ me tāya itthīti attho ^a^P0.0268^ea^. ^b^apucchāhaṃ gamissāmī^eb^ti yadi me tumhe tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ icchatha, ahaṃ tumhe apucchitvā videsaṃ pakkamissāmi.
[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0291^ea^ mama bhattuno. ^b^kissā^eb^ti kiṃ assa tava sāmikassa. ^b^tayā aparaddhaṃ^eb^ byālikaṃ kataṃ.

[03] ^b^napihaṃ aparajjha^eb^nti napi ahaṃ tassa kiñci aparajjhiṃ. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^napi hiṃsemī^eb^ti napi bādhemi. ^b^dubbacana^eb^nti duruttavacanaṃ. ^b^kiṃ sakkā kātuyye^eb^ti kiṃ mayā kātuṃ ayye sakkā. ^b^yaṃ maṃ viddessate bhattā^eb^ti yasmā akāraṇeneva bhattā mayhaṃ viddessate viddessaṃ cittappakopaṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^vimanā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0274^ea^ domanassikā. ^b^puttamanurakkhamānā^eb^ti attano puttaṃ mayhaṃ sāmikaṃ cittamanurakkhaṇena anurakkhantā. ^b^jitāmhase rūpiniṃ lakkhi^eb^nti jitā amhase jitā vatāmha rūpavatiṃ siriṃ, manussavesena carantiyā siridevatāya parihīnā vatāti attho.

[03] ^b^aḍḍhassa gharamhi dutiyakulikassā^eb^ti paṭhamasāmikaṃ upādāya dutiyassa aḍḍhassa kulaputtassa gharamhi maṃ adāsi, dento ca tato paṭhamasuṅkato upaḍḍhasuṅkena adāsi. ^b^yena maṃ vindatha seṭṭhī^eb^ti yena suṅkena maṃ paṭhamaṃ seṭṭhi vindatha paṭilabhi, tato upaḍḍhasuṅkenāti yojanā.
[03] ^b^sopī^eb^ti dutiyasāmikopi. ^b^maṃ paṭiccharayī^eb^ti maṃ nīhari, so maṃ gehato nikkaḍḍhi. ^b^upaṭṭhahanti^eb^nti dāsī viya upaṭṭhahantiṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karontiṃ. ^b^adūsika^eb^nti adubbhanakaṃ.

[03] ^b^damaka^eb^nti kāruññādhiṭṭhānatāya paresaṃ cittassa damakaṃ. yathā pare kiñci dassanti, evaṃ attano kāyaṃ vācañca ^a^P0.0269^ea^ ^b^dantaṃ^eb^ vūpasantaṃ katvā paradattabhikkhāya vicaraṇakaṃ. ^b^jāmātā^eb^ti duhitupati. ^b^nikkhipa poṭṭhiñca ghaṭikañcā^eb^ti tayā paridahitaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍañca bhikkhākapālañca chaḍḍehi.
[03] ^b^sopi vasitvā pakkha^eb^nti sopi bhikkhako puriso mayā saddhiṃ addhamāsamattaṃ vasitvā pakkāmi.

[03] ^b^atha naṃ bhaṇatī tāto^eb^ti taṃ bhikkhakaṃ mama pitā mātā sabbo ca me ñātigaṇo vaggavaggo ^a^V0.0292^ea^ hutvā bhaṇati. kathaṃ? ^b^kiṃ te na kīrati idha^eb^ tuyhaṃ kiṃ nāma na kirati na sādhiyati, bhaṇa khippaṃ. ^b^taṃ te karihitī^eb^ti taṃ tuyhaṃ karissati.

[03] ^b^yadi me attā sakkotī^eb^ti yadi mayhaṃ attā attādhīno bhujisso ca hoti, ^b^alaṃ mayhaṃ isidāsiyā^eb^ tāya payojanaṃ natthi, tasmā ^b^na saha vacchaṃ^eb^ na saha vasissaṃ, ekaghare ahaṃ tāya saha vatthunti yojanā.

[03] ^b^vissajjito gato so^eb^ti so bhikkhako pitarā vissajjito yathāruci gato. ^b^ekākinī^eb^ti ekikāva. ^b^āpucchitūna gaccha^eb^nti ^a^M0.0275^ea^ mayhaṃ pitaraṃ vissajjetvā gacchāmi. ^b^marituye^eb^ti marituṃ. ^b^vā^eb^ti vikappatthe nipāto.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ jinadattattheriṃ. ^b^uṭṭhāyāsanaṃ tassā paññāpayi^eb^nti uṭṭhahitvā āsanaṃ tassā theriyā paññāpesiṃ.

[03] ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃ eva gehe ṭhitā. ^b^puttakā^eb^ti sāmaññavohārena dhītaraṃ anukampento ālapati. ^b^carāhi tvaṃ dhamma^eb^nti tvaṃ pabbajitvā caritabbaṃ brahmacariyādidhammaṃ cara. ^b^dvijātī^eb^ti brāhmaṇajātī.

[03] ^b^bodhi^eb^nti saccābhisambodhiṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. ^b^aggadhamma^eb^nti phaladhammaṃ, arahattaṃ. ^b^yaṃ sacchikarī^eb^ ^a^P0.0270^ea^ ^b^dvipadaseṭṭho^eb^ti yaṃ maggaphalanibbānasaññitaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho sammāsambuddho sacchi akāsi, taṃ labhassūti yojanā.
[03] ^b^sattāhaṃ pabbajitā^eb^ti pabbajitā hutvā sattāhena. ^b^aphassayi^eb^nti phusiṃ sacchākāsiṃ.

[03] ^b^yassayaṃ phalavipāko^eb^ti yassa pāpakammassa, ayaṃ sāmikassa amanāpabhāvasaṅkhāto nissandaphalabhūto ^a^V0.0293^ea^ vipāko. ^b^taṃ tava ācikkhissa^eb^nti taṃ kammaṃ tava kathessāmi. ^b^ta^eb^nti ācikkhiyamānaṃ tameva kammaṃ, taṃ vā mama vacanaṃ. ^b^ekamanā^eb^ti ekaggamanā. ayameva vā pāṭho.
[03] ^b^nagaramhi erakacche^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare. ^b^so paradāraṃ aseviha^eb^nti so ahaṃ parassa dāraṃ aseviṃ.

[03] ^b^ciraṃ pakko^eb^ti bahūni vassasatasahassāni nirayagginā daḍḍho. ^b^tato ca uṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti tato nirayato vuṭṭhito cuto. ^b^makkaṭiyā kucchimokkami^eb^nti vānariyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃ.

[03] ^b^yūthapo^eb^ti yūthapati. ^b^nillacchesī^eb^ti purisabhāvassa lakkhaṇabhūtāni bījakāni nillacchesi nīhari. ^b^tassetaṃ kammaphala^eb^nti tassa mayhaṃ etaṃ atīte katassa kammassa phalaṃ. ^b^yathāpi gantvāna paradāra^eb^nti yathā taṃ paradāraṃ atikkamitvā.
[03] ^b^dārake parivahitvā^eb^ti piṭṭhiṃ āruyha kumārake vahitvā. ^b^kimināvaṭṭo^eb^ti abhijātaṭṭhāne kimiparigatova hutvā aṭṭo aṭṭito. ^b^akallo^eb^ti gilāno, ahosīti vacanaseso.
[03] ^b^govāṇijakassā^eb^ti gāviyo vikkiṇitvā jīvakassa. ^b^lākhātambo^eb^ti lākhārasarattehi viya tambehi lomehi samannāgato.
[03] ^b^voḍhūnā^eb^ti vahitvā. ^b^naṅgala^eb^nti sīraṃ, sakaṭañca dhārayāmīti attho ^a^P0.0271^ea^. ^b^andhovaṭṭo^eb^ti kāṇova hutvā aṭṭo pīḷito.

[03] ^b^vīthiyā^eb^ti nagaravīthiyaṃ. ^b^dāsiyā ghare jāto^eb^ti gharadāsiyā kucchimhi jāto. ``vaṇṇadāsiyā''tipi vadanti. ^b^neva mahilā na puriso^eb^ti itthīpi purisopi na homi, jātinapuṃsakoti attho.

[03] ^b^tiṃsativassamhi^eb^ ^a^V0.0294^ea^ ^b^mato^eb^ti napuṃsako hutvā tiṃsavassakāle mato. ^b^sākaṭikakulamhī^eb^ti sūtakakule. ^b^dhanikapurisapātabahulamhī^eb^ti iṇāyikānaṃ purisānaṃ adhipatanabahule bahūhi iṇāyikehi abhibhavitabbe.
[03] ^b^ussannāyā^eb^ti upacitāya. ^b^vipulāyā^eb^ti mahatiyā. ^b^vaḍḍhiyā^eb^ti iṇavaḍḍhiyā. ^b^okaḍḍhatī^eb^ti avakaḍḍhati. ^b^kulagharasmā^eb^ti mama jātakulagehato.
[03] ^b^orundhatassa putto^eb^ti assa satthavāhassa putto, mayi paṭibaddhacitto nāmena giridāso nāma avarundhati attano pariggahabhāvena gehe karoti.
[03] ^b^anurattā bhattāra^eb^nti bhattāraṃ anuvattikā. ^b^tassāhaṃ viddesanamakāsi^eb^nti tassa bhattuno taṃ bhariyaṃ sapattiṃ viddesanakammaṃ akāsiṃ. yathā taṃ so kujjhati, evaṃ paṭipajjiṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0277^ea^ ^b^maṃ apakīritūna gacchantī^eb^ti yaṃ dāsī viya sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahantiṃ maṃ tattha tattha patino apakiritvā chaḍḍetvā anapekkhā apagacchanti. etaṃ tassā mayhaṃ tadā katassa paradārikakammassa sapattiṃ viddesanakammassa ca nissandaphalaṃ. ^b^tassapi anto kato mayā^eb^ti tassapi tathā anunayapāpakakammassa dāruṇassa pariyanto idāni mayā aggamaggaṃ adhigacchantiyā kato, ito paraṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ natthīti. yaṃ panettha antarantarā na vibhattaṃ, taṃ vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.

[03] mahānipāte ^a^M0.0278^ea^ ^a^V0.0295^ea^ ^a^P0.0272^ea^ ^b^mantāvatiyā nagare^eb^tiādikā sumedhāya theriyā gāthā. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinantī, sakkaccaṃ vimokkhasambhāre sambhārentī koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā, attano sakhīhi kuladhītāhi saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayā hutvā mahantaṃ ārāmaṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādesi. sā tena puññakammena kāyassa bhedā tāvatiṃsaṃ upagacchi. tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cutā yāmesu upapajji. tato cutā tusitesu, tato cutā nimmānaratīsu, tato cutā paranimmitavasavattīsūti anukkamena pañcasu kāmasaggesu uppajjitvā tattha tattha devarājūnaṃ mahesī hutvā tato cutā kassapassa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā sāsane abhippasannā hutvā ratanattayaṃ uddissa uḷārapuññakammaṃ akāsi.

[03] tattha yāvajīvaṃ dhammūpajīvinī kusaladhammaniratā hutvā tato cutā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsarantī, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mantāvatīnagare koñcassa nāma rañño dhītā hutvā nibbatti. tassā mātāpitaro ^b^sumedhā^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. taṃ anukkamena vuddhippattavayappattakāle mātāpitaro ``vāraṇavatīnagare anikarattassa nāma rañño dassāmā''ti sammantesuṃ. sā pana daharakālato paṭṭhāya attano samānavayāhi rājakaññāhi dāsijanehi ca saddhiṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā cirakālato paṭṭhāya katādhikāratāya saṃsāre jātasaṃvegā sāsane abhippasannā hutvā vayappattakāle kāmehi vinivattitamānasā ahosi. tena sā mātāpitūnaṃ ñātīnaṃ sammantanaṃ sutvā ``na mayhaṃ gharāvāsena kiccaṃ, pabbajissāmaha''nti āha. taṃ mātāpitaro gharāvāse niyojentā nānappakārena yācantāpi saññāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. sā ``evaṃ me ^a^M0.0279^ea^ pabbajituṃ labbhatī''ti khaggaṃ ^a^P0.0273^ea^ gahetvā sayameva attano kese chinditvā te eva kese ārabbha paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ pavattentī tattha katādhikāratāya bhikkhunīnaṃ santike manasikāravidhānassa sutapubbattā ca asubhanimittaṃ ^a^V0.0296^ea^ uppādetvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhigacchi. adhigatapaṭhamajjhānā ca attanā gharāvāse uyyojetuṃ upagate mātāpitaro ādiṃ katvā antojanaparijanaṃ sabbaṃ rājakulaṃ sāsane abhippasannaṃ kāretvā gharato nikkhamitvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji. pabbajitvā ca vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammadeva paripakkañāṇā vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ visesitāya na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 therī 2.1.1-19) --
[22] devesu upapajjimha, ko pana vādo manussesu..
[21] ``devesu mahiddhikā ahumha, mānusakamhi ko pana vādo.
[22] dhanañjānī ca khemā ca, ahampi ca tayo janā..
[22] devesu aggataṃ pattā, manussesu tatheva ca..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[22] datvā dānāni sakkaccaṃ, agāreva vataṃ cariṃ..
[21] ``so hetu so pabhavo, tammūlaṃ sāva sāsane khantī.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena --
[22] kimaṅgaṃ pana tucchā kāmā, appassādā bahuvighātā..
[21] ``kāmā ^a^P0.0275^ea^ kaṭukā āsī, visūpamā yesu mucchitā bālā.
[22] te dīgharattaṃ niraye, samappitā haññante dukkhitā..
[22] kāyena ca vācāya ca, manasā ca asaṃvutā bālā..
[22] na ca santasanti bālā, punappunaṃ jāyitabbassa..
[21] ``cattāro ^a^V0.0299^ea^ vinipātā, duve ca gatiyo kathañci labbhanti.
[22] na ca vinipātagatānaṃ, pabbajjā atthi nirayesu..
[21] ``uṭṭhehi ^a^M0.0282^ea^ puttaka kiṃ soci, tena dinnāsi vāraṇavatimhi.
[22] rājā anīkaratto, abhirūpo tassa tvaṃ dinnā..
[22] bhuñjāhi kāmabhoge, vāreyyaṃ hotu te putta..
[21] ``atha ^a^V0.0300^ea^ ne bhaṇati sumedhā, mā edisikāni bhavagatamasāraṃ.
[22] pabbajjā vā hohiti, maraṇaṃ vā me na ceva vāreyyaṃ..
[22] niyakā mātāpitaro, kiṃ pana sādhāraṇā janatā..
[21] ``divase divase tisatti, satāni navanavā pateyyuṃ kāyamhi.
[22] vassasatampi ca ghāto, seyyo dukkhassa cevaṃ khayo..
[22] petesu ca nirayesu ca, aparimitā dissante ghātā..
[21] ``pattā te nibbānaṃ, ye yuttā dasabalassa pāvacane.
[21] ``sā cevaṃ bhaṇati pitaramanīkaratto, ca yassa sā dinnā.
[21] ``sā ca tahiṃ samāpannā, anīkaratto ca āgato nagaraṃ.
[21] ``sā ca manasi karoti, anīkaratto ca āruhī turitaṃ.
[21] ``nissaṭṭhaṃ te rajjaṃ, bhoge bhuñjassu dehi dānāni.
[22] mā dummanā ahosi, mātāpitaro te dukkhitā..
[21] ``taṃ ^a^V0.0302^ea^ ^a^P0.0278^ea^ taṃ bhaṇati sumedhā, kāmehi anatthikā vigatamohā.
[22] atitto kālaṅkato, na cassa paripūritā icchā..
[22] na catthi titti kāmānaṃ, atittāva maranti narā..
[22] gacchatha na me bhavagate, vissāso atthi attano..
[21] ``kiṃ mama paro karissati, attano sīsamhi ḍayhamānamhi.
[22] anamatagge pitu maraṇe, bhātu vadhe attano ca vadhe..
[22] siraṃ tassa ca paṭimukkaṃ, manussalābhamhi opammaṃ..
[22] khandhe passa anicce, sarāhi niraye bahuvighāte..
[21] ``sara kaṭasiṃ vaḍḍhente, punappunaṃ tāsu tāsu jātīsu.
[22] sara kumbhīlabhayāni ca, sarāhi cattāri saccāni..
[21] ``amatamhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava kāmehi ye pariḷāhā.
[22] sabbā hi kāmaratiyo, jalitā kuthitā kampitā santāpitā..
[21] ``asapattamhi ^a^V0.0304^ea^ samāne, kiṃ tava kāmehi ye bahusapattā.
[21] ``mokkhamhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava kāmehi yesu vadhabandho.
[22] ukkopamā hi kāmā, dahanti ye te na muñcanti..
[21] ``mā ^a^P0.0280^ea^ appakassa hetu, kāmasukhassa vipulaṃ jahī sukhaṃ.
[22] mā puthulomova baḷisaṃ, gilitvā pacchā vihaññasi..
[22] kāhinti khu taṃ kāmā, chātā sunakhaṃva caṇḍālā..
[21] ``ajaramhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava kāmehi yesu jarā.
[22] yo yoniso payuñjati, na ca sakkā aghaṭamānena..
[22] anunentī anikarattaṃ, kese ca chamaṃ khipi sumedhā..
[22] devesu upapajjimha, ko pana vādo manussesu..
[21] ``devesu mahiddhikā ahumha, mānusakamhi ko pana vādo.
[21] ``so hetu so pabhavo, taṃ mūlaṃ sāva sāsane khantī.

[03] tattha ^b^mantavatiyā nagare^eb^ti mantavatīti evaṃnāmake nagare. ^b^rañño koñcassā^eb^ti koñcassa nāma rañño mahesiyā kucchimhi jātā dhītā āsiṃ. ^b^sumedhā^eb^ti nāmena sumedhā. ^b^pasāditā sāsanakarehī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0306^ea^ satthusāsanakarehi ariyehi dhammadesanāya sāsane pasāditā sañjātaratanattayappasādā katā.

[03] ^b^sīlavatī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0287^ea^ ācārasīlasampannā. ^b^cittakathā^eb^ti cittadhammakathā. ^b^bahussutā^eb^ti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pariyattidhammassutiyutā. ^b^buddhasāsane vinītā^eb^ti evaṃ pavatti, evaṃ nivatti, iti sīlaṃ, iti samādhi, iti paññāti suttānugatena (dī0 ni0 2.186) yonisomanasikārena tadaṅgato kilesānaṃ vinivattattā buddhānaṃ sāsane vinītā saṃyatakāyavācācittā. ^b^ubhayo nisāmethā^eb^ti tumhe dvepi mama vacanaṃ nisāmetha, mātāpitaro upagantvā bhaṇatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^yadipi dibba^eb^nti devalokapariyāpannampi bhavagataṃ nāma sabbampi ^b^asassataṃ^eb^ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ. ^b^kimaṅgaṃ pana tucchā kāmā^eb^ti kimaṅgaṃ pana mānusakā kāmā, te sabbepi asārakabhāvato tucchā rittā, satthadhārāyaṃ madhubindu viya ^b^appassādā,^eb^ etarahi āyatiñca vipuladukkhatāya ^b^bahuvighātā^eb^.

[03] ^b^kaṭukā^eb^ti aniṭṭhā. sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ^b^āsīvisūpamā. yesu^eb^ kāmesu. ^b^mucchitā^eb^ti ajjhositā. ^b^samappitā^eb^ti sakammunā sabbaso appitā khittā, upapannāti attho ^a^P0.0282^ea^. ^b^haññante^eb^ti bādhīyanti.

[03] ^b^acetanā^eb^ti attahitacetanāya abhāvena acetanā. ^b^dukkhasamudayoruddhā^eb^ti taṇhānimittasaṃsāre avaruddhā. ^b^desente^eb^ti catusaccadhamme desiyamāne. ^b^ajānantā^eb^ti atthaṃ ajānantā. ^b^na bujjhare ariyasaccānī^eb^ti dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni na paṭibujjhanti.
