[03] ^b^ammā^eb^ti mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā ālapati. ^b^te bahutarā ajānantā^eb^ti ye abhinandanti bhavagataṃ pihenti devesu upapattiṃ buddhavaradesitāni saccāni ajānantā, teyeva ca imasmiṃ loke bahutarāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^bhavagate aniccamhī^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ bhave anicce devesu upapatti na sassatā, evaṃ santepi ^a^V0.0307^ea^ na ca ^b^santasanti^eb^ bālā na uttasanti na saṃvegaṃ āpajjanti. ^b^punappunaṃ jāyitabbassā^eb^ti aparāparaṃ upapajjamānassa.

[03] ^b^cattāro vinipātā^eb^ti nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurayonīti ime cattāro sukhasamussayato vinipātagatiyo. manussadevūpapattisaññitā ^a^M0.0288^ea^ pana dveva ^b^gatiyo kathañci^eb^ kicchena kasirena labbhanti puññakammassa dukkarattā. ^b^nirayesū^eb^ti sukharahitesu apāyesu.
[03] ^b^appossukkā^eb^ti aññakiccesu nirussukkā. ^b^ghaṭissa^eb^nti vāyamissaṃ bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjissāmi, kāyakalinā asārena bhavagate kiṃ abhinanditenāti yojanā.

[03] buddhānaṃ uppādo laddho, vivajjito nirayūpapattiādiko aṭṭhavidho akkhaṇo, ^b^khaṇo^eb^ navamo khaṇo laddhoti yojanā. ^b^sīlānī^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlāni. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^P0.0283^ea^ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^na dūseyya^eb^nti na kopeyyāmi.

[03] ^b^na tāva āhāraṃ āharissaṃ gahaṭṭhā^eb^ti ``neva tāva ahaṃ gahaṭṭhā hutvā āhāraṃ āharissāmi, sace pabbajjaṃ na labhissāmi, maraṇavasameva gatā bhavissāmī''ti evaṃ sumedhā mātāpitaro bhaṇatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti sumedhāya. ^b^sabbaso samabhihato^eb^ti assūhi sabbaso abhihatamukho. ^b^ghaṭenti saññāpetu^eb^nti pāsādatale chamāpatitaṃ sumedhaṃ mātā ca pitā ca gihibhāvāya saññāpetuṃ ghaṭenti vāyamanti. ``ghaṭenti vāyamantī''tipi pāṭho, so evattho.

[03] ^b^kiṃ socitenā^eb^ti ``pabbajjaṃ na labhissāmī''ti kiṃ socanena. ^b^dinnāsi vāraṇavatimhī^eb^ti vāraṇavatīnagare dinnā asi. ``dinnāsī''ti vatvā punapi ``tvaṃ dinnā''ti vacanaṃ daḷhaṃ dinnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^rajje āṇā^eb^ti anikarattassa rajje tava āṇā pavattati. ^b^dhanamissariya^eb^nti imasmiṃ kule ^a^V0.0308^ea^ patikule ca dhanaṃ issariyañca, ^b^bhogā sukhā^eb^ ativiya iṭṭhā bhogāti sabbamidaṃ tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ hatthagataṃ. ^b^daharikāsī^eb^ti taruṇī cāsi, tasmā bhuñjāhi kāmabhoge. tena kāraṇena vāreyyaṃ hotu te puttāti yojanā.
[03] ^b^ne^eb^ti mātāpitaro. ^b^mā edisikānī^eb^ti evarūpāni rajje āṇādīni mā bhavantu. kasmāti ce āha ^b^``bhagavatamasāra''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] ^b^kimivā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0289^ea^ kimi viya. ^b^pūtikāya^eb^nti imaṃ pūtikaḷevaraṃ. ^b^savanagandha^eb^nti vissaṭṭhavissagandhaṃ. ^b^bhayānaka^eb^nti avītarāgānaṃ bhayāvahaṃ. ^b^kuṇapaṃ abhisaṃviseyyaṃ bhasta^eb^nti kuṇapabharitaṃ cammapasibbakaṃ, ^b^asakiṃ paggharitaṃ asucipuṇṇaṃ^eb^ nānappakārassa asucino puṇṇaṃ hutvā ^a^P0.0284^ea^ asakiṃ sabbakālaṃ adhipaggharantaṃ ``mama ida''nti abhiniveseyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^kimiva tahaṃ jānantī, vikūlaka^eb^nti ativiya paṭikkūlaṃ asucīhi maṃsapesīhi soṇitehi ca upalittaṃ anekesaṃ kimikulānaṃ ālayaṃ sakuṇānaṃ bhattabhūtaṃ. ``kimikulālasakuṇabhatta''ntipi pāṭho, kimīnaṃ avasiṭṭhasakuṇānañca bhattabhūtanti attho. taṃ ahaṃ kaḷevaraṃ jānantī ṭhitā. taṃ maṃ idāni vāreyyavasena ^b^kissa^eb^ kena nāma kāraṇena diyyatīti dasseti. tassa tañca dānaṃ kimiva kiṃ viya hotīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^nibbuyhati susānaṃ, aciraṃ kāyo apetaviññāṇo^eb^ti ayaṃ kāyo acireneva apagataviññāṇo susānaṃ nibbuyhati upanīyati. ^b^chuddho^eb^ti chaḍḍito. ^b^kaḷiṅgaraṃ viyā^eb^ti niratthakakaṭṭhakhaṇḍasadiso. ^b^jigucchamānehi ñātīhī^eb^ti ñātijanehipi jigucchamānehi.

[03] ^b^chuddhūna naṃ susāne^eb^ti naṃ kaḷevaraṃ susāne chaḍḍetvā. ^b^parabhatta^eb^nti paresaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnaṃ bhattabhūtaṃ. ^b^nhāyanti jigucchantā^eb^ti ``imassa pacchato āgatā''ti ettakenāpi jigucchamānā sasīsaṃ nimujjantā nhāyanti, pageva phuṭṭhavanto. ^b^niyakā mātāpitaro^eb^ti attano mātāpitaropi. ^b^kiṃ pana sādhāraṇā janatā^eb^ti itaro pana samūho jigucchatīti kimeva vattabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vinibbhujitvā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0309^ea^ viññāṇavinibbhogaṃ katvā. ^b^gandhassa asahamānā^eb^ti gandhaṃ assa kāyassa asahantī. ^b^sakāpi mātā^eb^ti attano mātāpi jiguccheyya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vinibbhujjanena paṭikkūlabhāvāya suṭṭhutaraṃ ^a^P0.0285^ea^ upaṭṭhahanato.

[03] ^b^khandhadhātuāyatana^eb^nti ^a^M0.0290^ea^ rūpakkhandhādayo ime pañcakkhandhā, cakkhudhātuādayo imā aṭṭhārasadhātuyo, cakkhāyatanādīni imāni dvādasāyatanānīti evaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni cāti sabbaṃ idaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katattā ^b^saṅkhataṃ,^eb^ tayidaṃ tasmiṃ bhave pavattamānaṃ ^b^dukkhaṃ,^eb^ jātipaccayattā ^b^jātimūlaka^eb^nti. evaṃ ^b^yoniso^eb^ upāyena ^b^anuvicinantī^eb^ cintayantī, ^b^vāreyyaṃ^eb^ vivāhaṃ, ^b^kissa^eb^ kena kāraṇena icchissāmi.

[03] ``sīlāni brahmacariyaṃ, pabbajjā dukkarā''ti yadetaṃ mātāpitūhi vuttaṃ tassa paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ ^b^``divase divase''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^divase divase tisattisatāni navanavā pateyyuṃ kāyamhī^eb^ti dine dine tīṇi sattisatāni tāvadeva pītanisitabhāvena abhinavāni kāyasmiṃ sampateyyuṃ. ^b^vassasatampi ca ghāto seyyo^eb^ti nirantaraṃ vassasatampi patamāno yathāvutto sattighāto seyyo. ^b^dukkhassa cevaṃ khayo^eb^ti evaṃ ce vaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhayo bhaveyya, evaṃ mahantampi pavattidukkhaṃ adhivāsetvā nibbānādhigamāya ussāho karaṇīyoti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^ajjhupagacche^eb^ti sampaṭiccheyya. ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttanayena. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo puggalo anamataggaṃ saṃsāraṃ aparimāṇañca vaṭṭadukkhaṃ dīpentaṃ satthuno vacanaṃ viññāya ṭhito yathāvuttaṃ sattighātadukkhaṃ sampaṭiccheyya, tena ceva vaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhayo siyāti. tenāha -- ^b^``dīgho tesaṃ saṃsāro, punappunañca haññamānāna''^eb^nti, aparāparaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇādīhi bādhiyamānānanti attho.

[03] ^b^bahū^eb^ti pañcavidhabandhanādikammakāraṇavasena pavattiyamānā bahū anekaghātā. ^b^vinipātagatassā^eb^ti sesāpāyasaṅkhātaṃ vinipātaṃ upagatassāpi. ^b^pīḷiyamānassā^eb^ti tiracchānādiattabhāve abhighātādīhi ābādhiyamānassa. ^b^devesupi attāṇa^eb^nti devattabhāvesupi tāṇaṃ natthi rāgapariḷāhādinā sadukkhasavighātabhāvato. ^b^nibbānasukhā paraṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0286^ea^ ^b^natthī^eb^ti nibbānasukhato ^a^V0.0310^ea^ paraṃ aññaṃ uttamaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi lokiyasukhassa vipariṇāmasaṅkhāradukkhasabhāvattā ^a^M0.0291^ea^. tenāha bhagavā -- ``nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha''nti (dha0 pa0 203-204).
[03] ^b^pattā te nibbāna^eb^nti te nibbānaṃ pattāyeva nāma. atha vā teyeva nibbānaṃ pattā. ^b^ye yuttā dasabalassa pāvacane^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa sāsane ye yuttā payuttā.
[03] ^b^nibbinnā^eb^ti virattā. ^b^me^eb^ti mayā. ^b^vantasamā^eb^ti suvānavamathusadisā. ^b^tālavatthukatā^eb^ti tālassa patiṭṭhānasadisā katā.

[03] ^b^athā^eb^ti pacchā, mātāpitūnaṃ attano ajjhāsayaṃ pavedetvā anikarattassa ca āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā. ^b^asitanicitamuduke^eb^ti indanīlabhamarasamānavaṇṇatāya asite, ghanabhāvena nicite, simbalitūlasamasamphassatāya muduke. ^b^kese khaggena chindiyā^eb^ti attano kese sunisitena asinā chinditvā. ^b^pāsādaṃ pidahitvā^eb^ti attano vasanapāsāde sirigabbhaṃ pidhāya, tassa dvāraṃ thaketvāti attho. ^b^paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjī^eb^ti khaggena chinne attano kese purato ṭhapetvā tattha paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ pavattentī yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ vasībhāvaṃ āpādetvā samāpajji.

[03] sā ca sumedhā tahiṃ pāsāde samāpannā jhānanti adhippāyo. ^b^aniccasaññaṃ subhāvetī^eb^ti jhānato vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ``yaṃkiñci rūpa''ntiādinā (a0 ni0 4.181; ma0 ni0 1.244; paṭi0 ma0 1.48) aniccānupassanaṃ suṭṭhu bhāveti, aniccasaññāgahaṇeneva cettha dukkhasaññādīnampi gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^rajje āṇā^eb^tiādi yācitākāranidassanaṃ. tattha ^b^āṇā^eb^ti ādhipaccaṃ. ^b^issariya^eb^nti yaso vibhavasampatti. ^b^bhogā sukhā^eb^ti iṭṭhā manāpiyā kāmūpabhogā. ^b^daharikāsī^eb^ti tvaṃ idāni daharā taruṇī asi.

[03] ^b^nissaṭṭhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0311^ea^ ^b^te rajja^eb^nti mayhaṃ sabbampi tiyojanikaṃ rajjaṃ tuyhaṃ pariccattaṃ, taṃ paṭipajjitvā bhoge ^a^P0.0287^ea^ ca bhuñjassu, ayaṃ maṃ kāmehiyeva nimantetīti mā ^a^M0.0292^ea^ dummanā ahosi. ^b^dehi dānānī^eb^ti yathāruciyā mahantāni dānāni samaṇabrāhmaṇesu pavattehi, mātāpitaro te dukkhitā domanassappattā tava pabbajjādhippāyaṃ sutvā tasmā kāme paribhuñjantī. tepi upaṭṭhahantī tesaṃ cittaṃ dukkhā mocehīti evamettha padatthayojanā veditabbā.
[03] ^b^mā kāme abhinandī^eb^ti vatthukāme kilesakāme mā abhinandi. atha kho tesu kāmesu ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ mayhaṃ vacanānusārena ^b^passa^eb^ ñāṇacakkhunā olokehi.

[03] ^b^cātuddīpo^eb^ti jambudīpādīnaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ issaro. ^b^mandhātā^eb^ti evaṃnāmo rājā, kāmabhogīnaṃ ^b^aggo^eb^ aggabhūto āsi. tenāha bhagavā -- ``rāhuggaṃ attabhāvīnaṃ, mandhātā kāmabhogina''nti (a0 ni0 4.15). ^b^atitto kālaṅkato^eb^ti caturāsītivassasahassāni kumārakīḷāvasena caturāsītivassasahassāni oparajjavasena caturāsītivassasahassāni cakkavattī rājā hutvā devabhogasadise bhoge bhuñjitvā chattiṃsāya sakkānaṃ āyuppamāṇakālaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane saggasampattiṃ anubhavitvāpi kāmehi atittova kālaṅkato. ^b^na cassa paripūritā icchā^eb^ assa mandhāturañño kāmesu āsā na ca paripuṇṇā āsi.

[03] ^b^satta ratanāni vasseyyā^eb^ti sattapi ratanāni, ^b^vuṭṭhimā^eb^ devo dasadisā byāpetvā, ^b^samantena^eb^ samantato purisassa rucivasena yadipi vasseyya, yathā taṃ mandhātumahārājassa evaṃ santepi na catthi titti kāmānaṃ, atittāva maranti narā. tenāha bhagavā -- ``na kahāpaṇavassena, titti kāmesu vijjatī''ti (dha0 pa0 186; jā0 1.3.23).

[03] ^b^asisūnūpamā kāmā^eb^ adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena, ^b^sappasiropamā^eb^ sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena, ^b^ukkopamā^eb^ tiṇukkūpamā anudahanaṭṭhena. tenāha ^b^``anudahantī''^eb^ti. ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalasannibhā^eb^ appassādaṭṭhena.
[03] ^b^mahāvisā^eb^ti halāhalādimahāvisasadisā. ^b^aghamūlā^eb^ti aghassa dukkhassa mūlā kāraṇabhūtā. tenāha ^b^``dukhapphalā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^rukkhapphalūpamā^eb^ ^a^P0.0288^ea^ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ phalibhañjanaṭṭhena. ^b^maṃsapesūpamā^eb^ bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^supinopamā^eb^ ^a^V0.0312^ea^ ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena māyā viya palobhanato. tenāha ^a^M0.0293^ea^ ^b^``vañcaniyā''^eb^ti, vañcakāti attho. ^b^yācitakūpamā^eb^ti yācitakabhaṇḍasadisā tāvakālikaṭṭhena.

[03] ^b^sattisūlūpamā^eb^ vinivijjhanaṭṭhena. rujjanaṭṭhena ^b^rogo^eb^ dukkhatāsulabhattā. ^b^gaṇḍo^eb^ kilesāsucipaggharaṇato. dukkhuppādanaṭṭhena ^b^aghaṃ^eb^. maraṇasampāpanena ^b^nighaṃ. aṅgārakāsusadisā^eb^ mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena. bhayahetutāya ceva vadhakapahūtatāya ca ^b^bhayaṃ vadho^eb^ nāma, kāmāti yojanā.
[03] ^b^akkhātā antarāyikā^eb^ti ``saggamaggādhigamassa nibbānagāmimaggassa ca antarāyakarā''ti cakkhubhūtehi buddhādīhi vuttā. ^b^gacchathā^eb^ti anikarattaṃ saparisaṃ vissajjeti.

[03] ^b^kiṃ mama paro karissatī^eb^ti paro añño mama kiṃ nāma hitaṃ karissati attano ^b^sīsamhi^eb^ uttamaṅge ekādasahi aggīhi ḍayhamāne. tenāha ^b^``anubandhe jarāmaraṇe''^eb^ti. ^b^tassa^eb^ jarāmaraṇassa sīsaḍāhassa, ^b^ghātāya^eb^ samugghātāya, ^b^ghaṭitabbaṃ^eb^ vāyamitabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^chama^eb^nti chamāyaṃ. ^b^idamavoca^eb^nti idaṃ ``dīgho bālānaṃ saṃsāro''tiādikaṃ saṃvegasaṃvattanakaṃ vacanaṃ avocaṃ.

[03] ^b^dīgho bālānaṃ saṃsāro^eb^ti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭabhūtānaṃ khandhāyatanādīnaṃ paṭipāṭipavattisaṅkhāto saṃsāro apariññātavatthukānaṃ andhabālānaṃ dīgho buddhañāṇenapi aparicchindaniyo. yathā hi anupacchinnattā avijjātaṇhānaṃ aparicchinnatāyeva bhavapabandhassa pubbā koṭi na paññāyati, evaṃ parāpi koṭīti. ^b^punappunañca rodata^eb^nti aparāparaṃ sokavasena rudantānaṃ. imināpi avijjātaṇhānaṃ anupacchinnataṃyeva tesaṃ vibhāveti.

[03] ^b^assu thaññaṃ rudhira^eb^nti yaṃ ñātibyasanādinā phuṭṭhānaṃ rodantānaṃ ^a^P0.0289^ea^ assu ca dārakakāle mātuthanato pītaṃ thaññañca yañca paccatthikehi ghātitānaṃ rudhiraṃ. ^b^saṃsāraṃ anamataggato^eb^ saṃsārassa anu amataggattā ñāṇena anugantvāpi amatāggattā aviditaggattā iminā dīghena addhunā sattānaṃ ^b^saṃsarataṃ,^eb^ aparāparaṃ saṃsarantānaṃ saṃsaritaṃ ^b^sarāhi,^eb^ taṃ ``kīva bahuka''nti anussarāhi, aṭṭhīnaṃ sannicayaṃ sarāhi anussara, upadhārehīti attho.

[03] idāni ^a^M0.0294^ea^ ^a^V0.0313^ea^ ādīnavassa bahubhāvañca upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^``sara caturodadhī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^sara caturodadhī upanīte assuthaññarudhiramhī^eb^ti imesaṃ sattānaṃ anamataggasaṃsāre saṃsarantānaṃ ekekassapi assumhi thaññe rudhiramhi ca pamāṇato upametabbe caturodadhī cattāro mahāsamudde upamāvasena buddhehi upanīte sara sarāhi. ^b^ekakappamaṭṭhīnaṃ, sañcayaṃ vipulena sama^eb^nti ekassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ kappe aṭṭhīnaṃ sañcayaṃ vepullapabbatena samaṃ upanītaṃ sara. vuttampi cesaṃ --
[22] siyā pabbatasamo rāsi, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``so kho panāyaṃ akkhāto, vepullo pabbato mahā.

[03] ^b^mahiṃ jambudīpamupanītaṃ. kolaṭṭhimattaguḷikā, mātā mātusveva nappahontī^eb^ti jambudīpotisaṅkhātaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kolaṭṭhimattā badaraṭṭhimattā guḷikā katvā tatthekekā ``ayaṃ me mātu, ayaṃ me mātumātū''ti evaṃ vibhājiyamāne tā guḷikā mātā mātūsveva nappahonti, mātā mātūsu akhīṇāsveva pariyantikā tā guḷikā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva anamatagge saṃsāre saṃsarato sattassa mātumātaroti ^a^P0.0290^ea^. evaṃ jambudīpamahiṃ saṃsārassa dīghabhāvena upamābhāvena upanītaṃ manasi karohīti.

[03] ^b^tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsa^eb^nti tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca sākhāpalāsañca. ^b^upanīta^eb^nti upamābhāvena upanītaṃ. ^b^anamataggato^eb^ti saṃsārassa anamataggabhāvato. ^b^caturaṅgulikā ghaṭikā^eb^ti caturaṅgulappamāṇāni khaṇḍāni. ^b^pitupitusveva nappahontī^eb^ti pitupitāmahesu eva tā ghaṭikā nappahonti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- imasmiṃ loke sabbaṃ tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca sākhāpalāsañca caturaṅgulikā katvā tatthekekā ``ayaṃ me pitu, ayaṃ me pitāmahassā''ti vibhājiyamāne tā ghaṭikāva parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva anamatagge saṃsāre saṃsarato sattassa pitupitāmahāti. evaṃ tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca sākhāpalāsañca saṃsārassa dīghabhāvena upanītaṃ sarāhīti. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne --

[03] ``anamataggoyaṃ ^a^M0.0295^ea^, bhikkhave, saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ^a^V0.0314^ea^ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ. taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yaṃ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṃ rodantānaṃ assupassannaṃ paggharitaṃ, yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka''ntiādikā (saṃ0 ni0 2.126) -- `anamataggapāḷi' āharitabbā.

[03] ^b^sara kāṇakacchapa^eb^nti ubhayakkhikāṇaṃ kacchapaṃ anussara. ^b^pubbasamudde aparato ca yugachidda^eb^nti puratthimasamudde aparato ca pacchimuttaradakkhiṇasamudde vātavegena paribbhamantassa yugassa ekacchiddaṃ. ^b^siraṃ tassa ca paṭimukka^eb^nti kāṇakacchapassa sīsaṃ tassa ca vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena gīvaṃ ukkhipantassa sīsassa yugacchidde pavesanañca sara. ^b^manussalābhamhi opamma^eb^nti tayidaṃ sabbampi buddhuppādadhammadesanāsu viya manussattalābhe opammaṃ ^a^P0.0291^ea^ katvā paññāya sara, tassa atīva dullabhasabhāvattaṃ sārajjabhayassāpi aticcasabhāvattā. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāsamudde ekacchiggaḷhaṃ yugaṃ pakkhipeyyā''tiādi (ma0 ni0 3.252; saṃ0 ni0 5.1117).

[03] ^b^sara rūpaṃ pheṇapiṇḍopamassā^eb^ti vimaddāsahanato pheṇapiṇḍasadisassa anekānatthasannipātato kāyasaṅkhātassa ^b^kalino,^eb^ niccasārādivirahena ^b^asārassa^eb^ rūpaṃ asuciduggandhaṃ jegucchapaṭikkūlabhāvaṃ sara. ^b^khandhe passa anicce^eb^ti pañcapi upādānakkhandhe hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicce passa ñāṇacakkhunā olokehi. ^b^sarāhi niraye bahuvighāte^eb^ti aṭṭha mahāniraye soḷasaussadaniraye ca bahuvighāte bahudukkhe mahādukkhe ca anussara.

[03] ^b^sara kaṭasiṃ vaḍḍhente^eb^ti punappunaṃ tāsu tāsu jātīsu aparāparaṃ uppattiyā punappunaṃ kaṭasiṃ susānaṃ āḷahanameva vaḍḍhente satte anussara. ``vaḍḍhanto''ti vā pāḷi, tvaṃ vaḍḍhantoti yojanā. ^b^kumbhīlabhayānī^eb^ti udaraposanatthaṃ akiccakāritāvasena odarikattabhayāni. vuttañhi ``kumbhīlabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, odarikattassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (a0 ni0 4.122). ^b^sarāhi cattāri^eb^ ^a^M0.0296^ea^ ^b^saccānī^eb^ti ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ...pe0... ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā ariyasacca''nti cattāri ariyasaccāni yāthāvato anussara upadhārehi.

[03] evaṃ rājaputtī anekākāravokāraṃ anussaraṇavasena kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā idāni byatirekenapi taṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^``amatamhi vijjamāne''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^amatamhi^eb^ ^a^V0.0315^ea^ ^b^vijjamāne^eb^ti sammāsambuddhena mahākaruṇāya upanīte saddhammāmate upalabbhamāne. ^b^kiṃ tava pañcakaṭukena pītenā^eb^ti pariyesanā pariggaho ārakkhā paribhogo vipāko cāti pañcasupi ṭhānesu tikhiṇataradukkhānubandhatāya savighātattā saupāyāsattā kiṃ tuyhaṃ pañcakaṭukena pañcakāmaguṇarasena pītena? idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karontī āha -- ^b^``sabbā hi kāmaratiyo, kaṭukatarā pañcakaṭukenā''^eb^ti ^a^P0.0292^ea^, ativiya kaṭukatarāti attho.

[03] ^b^ye pariḷāhā^eb^ti ye kāmā sampati kilesapariḷāhena āyatiṃ vipākapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāhā mahāvighātā. ^b^jalitā kuthitā kampitā santāpitā^eb^ti ekādasahi aggīhi pajjalitā pakkuthitā ca hutvā taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ kampanakā santāpanakā ca.

[03] ^b^asapattamhī^eb^ti sapattarahite nekkhamme. ^b^samāne^eb^ti sante vijjamāne. ``bahusapattā''ti vatvā yehi bahū sapattā, te dassetuṃ ^b^``rājaggī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. rājūhi ca agginā ca corehi ca udakena ca dāyādādiappiyehi ca rājaggicoraudakappiyehi sādhāraṇato tesvevopamā vuttā.

[03] ^b^yesu vadhabandho^eb^ti yesu kāmesu kāmanimittaṃ maraṇapothanādiparikkileso andubandhanādibandho ca hotīti attho. ^b^kāmesū^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. tattha ^b^hī^eb^ti hetuatthe nipāto. yasmā kāmesu kāmahetu ime sattā vadhabandhanadukkhāni anubhavanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā āha -- ^b^``asakāmā''^eb^ti, kāmā nāmete asanto hīnā lāmakāti attho. ``ahakāmā''ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. ahāti hi lāmakapariyāyo ``ahalokitthiyo nāmā''tiādīsu viya.

[03] ^b^ādīpitā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0297^ea^ pajjalitā. ^b^tiṇukkā^eb^ti tiṇehi katā ukkā. ^b^dahanti ye te muñcantī^eb^ti ye sattā te kāme na muñcanti, aññadatthu gaṇhanti, te dahantiyeva, sampati āyatiñca jhāpenti.

[03] ^b^mā appakassa hetū^eb^ti pupphassādasadisassa parittakassa kāmasukhassa hetu vipulaṃ uḷāraṃ paṇītañca lokuttaraṃ sukhaṃ ^b^mā jahi^eb^ mā chaḍḍehi. ^b^mā puthulomova baḷisaṃ gilitvā^eb^ti āmisalobhena ^a^V0.0316^ea^ baḷisaṃ gilitvā byasanaṃ pāpuṇanto ``puthulomo''ti laddhanāmo maccho viya kāme apariccajitvā ^b^mā pacchā vihaññasi^eb^ pacchā vighāṭaṃ āpajjasi.

[03] ^b^sunakhova saṅkhalābaddho^eb^ti yathā gaddulena baddho ^a^P0.0293^ea^ sunakho gaddulabandhena thambhe upanibaddho aññato gantuṃ asakkonto tattheva paribbhamati, evaṃ tvaṃ kāmataṇhāya baddho, idāni ^b^kāmaṃ^eb^ yadipi kāmesu tāva ^b^damassu^eb^ indriyāni damehi. ^b^kāhinti khu taṃ kāmā, chātā sunakhaṃva caṇḍālā^eb^ti ^b^khū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. te pana kāmā taṃ tathā karissanti, yathā chātajjhattā sapākā sunakhaṃ labhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpentīti attho.

[03] ^b^aparimitañca dukkha^eb^nti aparimāṇaṃ ``ettaka''nti paricchindituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nirayādīsu kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ. ^b^bahūni ca cittadomanassānī^eb^ti citte labbhamānāni bahūni anekāni domanassāni cetodukkhāni. ^b^anubhohisī^eb^ti anubhavissasi. ^b^kāmayutto^eb^ti kāmehi yutto, te appaṭinissajjanto. ^b^paṭinissaja addhuve kāme^eb^ti addhuvehi aniccehi kāmehi vinissaja apehīti attho.

[03] ^b^jarāmaraṇabyādhigahitā, sabbā sabbattha jātiyo^eb^ti yasmā hīnādibhedabhinnā sabbattha bhavādīsu jātiyo jarāmaraṇabyādhinā ca gahitā, tehi aparimuttā, tasmā ^b^ajaramhi^eb^ nibbāne vijjamāne jarādīhi aparimuttehi kāmehi kiṃ tava payojananti yojanā.

[03] evaṃ nibbānaguṇadassanamukhena kāmesu bhavesu ca ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā idāni nibbattitaṃ nibbānaguṇameva pakāsentī ^b^``idamajara''^eb^ntiādinā dve gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^idamajara^eb^nti idamevekaṃ attani jarābhāvato adhigatassa ca jarābhāvahetuto ajaraṃ. ^b^idamamara^eb^nti etthāpi eseva ^a^M0.0298^ea^ nayo. ^b^idamajarāmara^eb^nti tadubhayamekajjhaṃ katvā thomanāvasena vadati. ^b^pada^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmehi pabbajitabbato paṭipajjitabbato padaṃ. sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato sokābhāvato ca ^b^asokaṃ^eb^. sapattakaradhammābhāvato ^b^asapattaṃ^eb^. kilesasambādhābhāvato ^b^asambādhaṃ^eb^. khalitasaṅkhātānaṃ duccaritānaṃ abhāvena ^b^akhalitaṃ^eb^. attānuvādādibhayānaṃ vaṭṭabhayassa ^a^P0.0294^ea^ ca sabbaso abhāvā ^b^abhayaṃ^eb^. dukkhūpatāpassa kilesassāpi abhāvena ^b^nirupatāpaṃ^eb^. sabbametaṃ amatamahānibbānameva sandhāya vadati. tañhi sā anussavādisiddhena ākārena attano upaṭṭhahantī tesaṃ paccakkhato dassentī viya ``ida''nti avoca.

[03] ^b^avigatamidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0317^ea^ ^b^bahūhi amata^eb^nti idaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ bahūhi anantāparimāṇehi buddhādīhi ariyehi adhigataṃ ñātaṃ attano paccakkhaṃ kataṃ. na kevalaṃ tehi adhigatameva sandhāya vadati, atha kho ^b^ajjāpi ca labhanīyaṃ^eb^ idānipi adhigamanīyaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkā. kena labhanīyanti āha ^b^``yo yoniso payuñjatī''^eb^ti, yo puggalo yoniso upāyena satthārā dinnaovāde ṭhatvā yuñjati sammāpayogañca karoti, tena labhanīyanti yojanā. ^b^na ca sakkā aghaṭamānenā^eb^ti yo pana yoniso na payuñjati, tena aghaṭamānena na ca sakkā, kadācipi laddhuṃ na sakkāyevāti attho.

[03] ^b^evaṃ bhaṇati sumedhā^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārena sumedhā rājakaññā saṃsāre attano saṃvegadīpaniṃ kāmesu nibbedhabhāginiṃ dhammakathaṃ katheti. ^b^saṅkhāragate ratiṃ alabhamānā^eb^ti aṇumattepi saṅkhārapavatte abhiratiṃ avindantī. ^b^anunentī anikaratta^eb^nti anikarattaṃ rājānaṃ saññāpentī. ^b^kese ca chamaṃ khipī^eb^ti attano khaggena chinne kese ca bhūmiyaṃ khipi chaḍḍesi.

[03] ^b^yācatassā pitaraṃ so^eb^ti so anikaratto assā sumedhāya pitaraṃ koñcarājānaṃ yācati. kinti yācatīti āha ^b^``vissajjetha sumedhaṃ, pabbajituṃ vimokkhasaccadassā''^eb^ti, sumedhaṃ rājaputtiṃ pabbajituṃ vissajjetha, sā ca pabbajitvā vimokkhasaccadassā aviparītanibbānadassāvinī hotūti attho.

[03] ^b^sokabhayabhītā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0299^ea^ ñātiviyogādihetuto sabbasmāpi saṃsārabhayato bhītā ñāṇuttaravasena utrāsitā. ^b^sikkhamānāyā^eb^ti sikkhamānāya ^a^P0.0295^ea^ samānāya cha abhiññā sacchikatā, tato eva aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ.

[03] ^b^acchariyamabbhutaṃ taṃ, nibbānaṃ āsi rājakaññāyā^eb^ti rājaputtiyā sumedhāya kilesehi parinibbānaṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutañca āsi. chaḷabhiññāva siddhiyā kathanti ce ^b^pubbenivāsacaritaṃ, yathā byākari pacchime kāle^eb^ti, pacchime khandhaparinibbānakāle attano pubbenivāsapariyāpannacaritaṃ yathā byākāsi, tathā taṃ jānitabbanti.

[03] pubbenivāsaṃ pana tāya yathā byākataṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``bhagavati koṇāgamane''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^bhagavati koṇāgamane^eb^ti koṇāgamane sammāsambuddhe loke uppanne. ^b^saṅghārāmamhi navanivesamhī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0318^ea^ saṅghaṃ uddissa abhinavanivesite ārāme. ^b^sakhiyo tisso janiyo, vihāradānaṃ adāsimhā^eb^ti dhanañjānī khemā ahañcāti mayaṃ tisso sakhiyo ārāmaṃ saṅghassa vihāradānaṃ adamha.

[03] ^b^dasakkhattuṃ satakkhattu^eb^nti tassa vihāradānassa ānubhāvena dasavāre devesu upapajimha, tato manussesu upapajjitvā puna satakkhattuṃ devesu upapajjimha, tatopi manussesu upapajjitvā puna dasasatakkhattuṃ sahassavāraṃ devesu upapajjimha, tatopi manussesu upapajjitvā puna satāni satakkhattuṃ dasasahassavāre devesu upapajjimha, ko pana vādo manussesu. evaṃ manussesu uppannavāresu kathāva natthi, anekasahassavāraṃ upapajjimhāti attho.

[03] ^b^devesu mahiddhikā ahumhā^eb^ti devesu upapannakāle tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devanikāye mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā ahumha. ^b^mānusakamhi ko pana vādo^eb^ti manussattalābhe mahiddhikatāya kathāva natthi. idāni tameva manussattabhāve ukkaṃsataṃ mahiddhikataṃ dassentī ^b^``sattaratanassa mahesī, itthiratanaṃ ahaṃ āsi''^eb^nti āha. tattha cakkaratanādīni satta ratanāni etassa santīti sattaratano, cakkavattī, tassa sattaratanassa. chadosarahitā ^a^M0.0300^ea^ pañcakalyāṇā atikkantamanussavaṇṇā apattadibbavaṇṇāti evamādiguṇasamannāgamena itthīsu ratanabhūtā ^a^P0.0296^ea^ ahaṃ ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^so hetū^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kāle saṅghassa vihāradānaṃ kataṃ, so yathāvuttāya dibbasampattiyā ca hetu. ^b^so pabhavo taṃ mūla^eb^nti tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ. ^b^sāva sāsane khantī^eb^ti sā eva idha satthusāsane dhamme nijjhānakkhantī. ^b^taṃ paṭhamasamodhāna^eb^nti tadeva satthusāsanadhammena paṭhamaṃ samodhānaṃ paṭhamo samāgamo, tadeva satthusāsanadhamme abhiratāya pariyosāne nibbānanti phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vadati. imā pana catasso gāthā theriyā apadānassa vibhāvanavasena pavattattā apadānapāḷiyampi saṅgahaṃ āropitā.

[03] osānagāthāya ^b^evaṃ karontī^eb^ti yathā mayā purimattabhāve etarahi ca kataṃ paṭipannaṃ, evaṃ aññepi karonti paṭipajjanti. ke evaṃ karontīti āha -- ^b^``ye saddahanti vacanaṃ anomapaññassā''^eb^ti, ñeyyapariyantikañāṇatāya paripuṇṇapaññassa sammāsambuddhassa vacanaṃ ye puggalā saddahanti ``evameta''nti okappanti, te evaṃ karonti paṭipajjanti. idāni tāya ukkaṃsagatāya ^a^V0.0319^ea^ paṭipattiyā taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``nibbindanti bhavagate, nibbinditvā virajjantī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tassattho -- ye bhagavato vacanaṃ yāthāvato saddahanti, te visuddhipaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjantā sabbasmiṃ bhavagate tebhūmake saṅkhāre vipassanāpaññāya nibbindanti, nibbinditvā ca pana ariyamaggena sabbaso virajjanti, sabbasmāpi bhavagatā vimuccantīti attho. virāge ariyamagge adhigate vimuttāyeva hontīti.

[03] evametā therikādayo sumedhāpariyosānā gāthāsabhāgena idha ekajjhaṃ saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā ``tisattatiparimāṇā''ti. bhāṇavārato pana dvādhikā chasatamattā theriyo gāthā ca. tā sabbāpi yathā sammāsambuddhassa sāvikābhāvena ekavidhā, tathā asekhabhāvena ukkhittapalighatāya saṃkiṇṇaparikkhatāya abbūḷhesikatāya niraggalatāya pannabhāratāya visaññuttatāya dasasu ariyavāsesu vuṭṭhavāsatāya ca, tathā hi tā pañcaṅgavippahīnā chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā ekārakkhā ^a^P0.0297^ea^ caturāpassenā ^a^M0.0301^ea^ paṇunnapaccekasaccā samavayasaṭṭhesanā anāvilasaṅkappā passaddhakāyasaṅkhārā suvimuttacittā suvimuttapaññā cāti evamādinā (dī0 ni0 3.360) nayena ekavidhā.

[03] sammukhāparammukhābhedato duvidhā. yā hi satthudharamānakāle ariyāya jātiyā jātā mahāpajāpatigotamiādayo, tā sammukhāsāvikā nāma. yā pana bhagavato khandhaparinibbānato pacchā adhigatavisesā, tā satipi satthudhammasarīrassa paccakkhabhāve satthusarīrassa apaccakkhabhāvato parammukhāsāvikā nāma. tathā ubhatobhāgavimuttipaññāvimuttitāvasena. idha pāḷiyāgatā pana ubhatobhāgavimuttāyeva. tathā sāpadānanāpadānabhedato. yāsañhi purimesu sammāsambuddhesu paccekabuddhesu sāvakabuddhesu vā puññakiriyāvasena katādhikāratāsaṅkhātaṃ atthi apadānaṃ, tā sāpadānā. yāsaṃ taṃ natthi, tā nāpadānā. tathā satthuladdhūpasampadā saṅghato laddhūpasampadāti duvidhā. garudhammapaṭiggahaṇamhi laddhūpasampadā mahāpajāpatigotamī satthusantikāva laddhūpasampadattā satthuladdhūpasampadā nāma. sesā sabbāpi saṅghato laddhūpasampadā. tāpi ekatoupasampannā ubhatoupasampannāti duvidhā. tattha yā tā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā saddhiṃ nikkhantā pañcasatā sākiyāniyo, tā ekatoupasampannā bhikkhusaṅghato eva laddhūpasampadattā mahāpajāpatigotamiṃ ṭhapetvā. itarā ubhatoupasampannā ubhatosaṅghe upasampadattā.
[03] ehibhikkhuduko ^a^V0.0320^ea^ viya ehibhikkhuniduko idha na labbhati. kasmā? bhikkhunīnaṃ tathā upasampadāya abhāvato. yadi evaṃ yaṃ taṃ therigāthāya subhaddāya kuṇḍalakesāya vuttaṃ --
[22] ehi bhaddeti maṃ avaca, sā me āsūpasampadā''ti.. (therīgā0 109).
[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0302^ea^ kathanti? nayidaṃ ehibhikkhunibhāvena ^a^P0.0298^ea^ upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. upasampadāya pana hetubhāvato yā satthu āṇatti, sā me āsūpasampadāti vuttaṃ.

[03] tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``ehi, bhadde, bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajja upasampajjassūti maṃ avoca āṇāpesi. sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā ahosī''ti. eteneva apadānagāthāyapi attho saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo.

[03] evampi bhikkhunivibhaṅge ehi bhikkhunīti idaṃ kathanti? ehibhikkhunibhāvena bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampadāya asabhāvajotanavacanaṃ tathā upasampadāya bhikkhunīnaṃ abhāvato. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ ehibhikkhunīti vibhaṅge niddeso katoti? desanānayasotapatitabhāvena. ayañhi sotapatitatā nāma katthaci labbhamānassāpi anāhaṭaṃ hoti.

[03] yathā abhidhamme manodhātuniddese (dha0 sa0 566-567) labbhamānampi jhānaṅgaṃ pañcaviññāṇasotapatitatāya na uddhaṭaṃ katthaci desanāya asambhavato. yathā tattheva vatthuniddese hadayavatthu, katthaci alabbhamānassāpi gahaṇavasena. tathā ṭhitakappiniddese. yathāha --

[02] ``katamo ca puggalo ṭhitakappī? ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ^a^V0.0321^ea^ assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya, yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikarotī''ti (pu0 pa0 17).

[03] evamidhāpi alabbhamānagahaṇavasena veditabbaṃ, parikappavacanañhetaṃ sace bhagavā bhikkhunibhāvayogyaṃ kañci mātugāmaṃ ehi bhikkhunīti vadeyya, evampi bhikkhunibhāvo siyāti. kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ na kathesīti? tathā katādhikārānaṃ abhāvato. ye pana ``anāsannasannihitabhāvato''ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā ``bhikkhū eva hi satthu āsannacārī sadā sannihitāva, tasmā te `ehibhikkhū'ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, na bhikkhuniyo''ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. satthu āsannadūrabhāvassa bhabbābhabbabhāvāsiddhattā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``saṅghāṭikaṇṇe ^a^M0.0303^ea^ cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pade padaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo ^a^P0.0299^ea^, atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati, dhammaṃ apassanto na maṃ passati.

[02] ``yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya. so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo, atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati, dhammaṃ passanto maṃ passatī''ti (itivu0 92).
[03] tasmā akāraṇaṃ desato satthu āsannānāsannatā. akatādhikāratāya pana bhikkhunīnaṃ tattha ayogyatā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``ehibhikkhuniduko idha na labbhatī''ti. evaṃ duvidhā.

[03] aggasāvikā, mahāsāvikā, pakatisāvikāti tividhā. tattha khemā, uppalavaṇṇāti imā dve theriyo aggasāvikā nāma. kāmaṃ sabbāpi khīṇāsavattheriyo sīlasuddhiādike sampādentiyo catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu supaṭṭhitacittā sattabojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā anavasesato kilese khepetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhahanti. tathāpi yathā saddhāvimuttato ^a^V0.0322^ea^ diṭṭhippattassa paññāvimuttato ca ubhatobhāgavimuttassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāvisesasiddho icchito viseso, evaṃ abhinīhāramahantatāpubbayogamahantatāhisasantāne sātisayaguṇavisesassa nipphāditattā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahantā sāvikāti mahāsāvikā. tesuyeva pana bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pāmokkhabhāvena dhurabhūtānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisammāsamādhīnaṃ sātisayakiccānubhāvanibbattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya tajjābhinīhāratāya sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ cirakālasambhūtāya sammāpaṭipattiyā yathākkamaṃ paññāya samādhimhi ca ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā savisesaṃ ^a^M0.0304^ea^ sabbaguṇehi aggabhāve ṭhitattā tā dvepi aggasāvikā nāma. mahāpajāpatigotamiādayo pana abhinīhāramahantatāya pubbayogamahantatāya ca paṭiladdhaguṇavisesavasena mahatiyo sāvikāti mahāsāvikā nāma. itarā therikā tissā vīrā dhīrāti evamādikā abhinīhāramahantatādīnaṃ abhāvena pakatisāvikā nāma. tā pana aggasāvikā viya mahāsāvikā viya ca na parimitā, atha kho anekasatāni anekasahassāni veditabbāni. evaṃ ^a^P0.0300^ea^ aggasāvikādibhedato tividhā. tathā suññatavimokkhādibhedato tividhā.

[03] paṭipadādivibhāgena catubbidhā. indriyādhikavibhāgena pañcavidhā. tathā paṭipattiyādivibhāgena pañcavidhā. animittavimuttādivasena chabbidhā. adhimuttibhedena sattavidhā. dhurapaṭipadādivibhāgena aṭṭhavidhā. vimuttivibhāgena navavidhā dasavidhā ca. tā panetā yathāvuttena dhurabhedena vibhajjamānā vīsati honti, paṭipadāvibhāgena vibhajjamānā cattālīsa honti. puna paṭipadābhedena dhurabhedena vibhajjamānā asīti honti. atha vā suññatāvimuttādivibhāgena vibhajjamānā cattālīsādhikāni dvesatāni honti. puna indriyādhikavibhāgena vibhajjamānā dvisatuttarasahassaṃ hontīti. evametāsaṃ therīnaṃ attano guṇavaseneva anekabhedabhinnatā veditabbā. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana heṭṭhā theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva gahetabboti.
[22] tā sabbā ekato katvā, theragāthāti saṅgahaṃ..
[22] sā tattha paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ..
[21] ``iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā.
[22] tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino..
